id_details.name: a citrine
special_abilities: When embedded, it greatly reduces the mana cost of locate spells.

a citrine.name: a citrine

a white metal breastplate.examine: This heavy, thick metal breastplate was obviously crafted by a master armourer. It will protect its owner from all but the mightiest blows.
a white metal breastplate.name: a white metal breastplate

a piece of raw bear meat.examine: This piece of fat-marbled, raw meat is dark-red in colour. One of the edges is covered with a strip of bright, clean white fat. Dark blood seeps through the tissue, indicating that the animal was recently butchered.

id_details.name: a piece of raw bear meat

a piece of raw bear meat.name: a piece of raw bear meat

a piece of paper.examine: There is no writing on the note.
a piece of paper.name: a piece of paper

Leonard's notes on getting through a scr.examine: Leonard's notes on getting through a scrap 1. I have to change my mood to fit the fight. Aggressive to finish the fight quickly, wimpy to protect myself, the old warrior said. 2. If I get hurt, there is no shame in fleeing. Set a wimpy, the old warrior said - is that a state of being I wonder? Whatever he meant, it sounded important. 3. A dented blade deals little damage. I'll have to find myself a whetstone to whet my blades and keep a keen edge on them. 4. My armour, though, I can't mend that myself! I'll have to drop by a smith to help me mend those. 5. Best learn how to tend to a wound, the ranger said. Practice bandaging with me was his advice. Even though I have no desire to become a doctor, I guess being able to at least stop the bleeding is wise.

id_details.name: Leonard's notes on getting through a scrap

Leonard's notes on getting through a scr.name: Leonard's notes on getting through a scrap

a crystal orb.examine: This is one of the crystal lamps, made by Noldor in days of past and rarely even seen in Middle-earth. Apart from their creators, only Aule is said to know their secret. This one gleams with a pale, white light and is brighter when the weather is worse.
a crystal orb.name: a crystal orb

a pair of soft leather sleeves.examine: These sleeves are made of soft leather, which will allow for a basic protection of the arms, as well as protect them partially against forces of nature. A few scratches mar the leather, and the stitching does not look like quality work.

id_details.name: a pair of soft leather sleeves

a pair of soft leather sleeves.name: a pair of soft leather sleeves

a pair of chain mail sleeves.examine: The sleeves are made of small metal rings linked together to form a tight but pretty stiff chainmail. In general, each ring is connected to four others, yet quite some errors in the pattern can be spotted.

id_details.name: a pair of chain mail sleeves

a pair of chain mail sleeves.name: a pair of chain mail sleeves

a pair of chain mail gloves.examine: These gloves are made of iron rings. Even while smaller rings for the fingers than for the area near the wrists have been used, these gloves are still a bit bulky and handling anything with them seems a bit clumsy.

id_details.name: a pair of chain mail gloves

a pair of chain mail gloves.name: a pair of chain mail gloves

a pair of metal boots.examine: These boots are crafted out of skilfully hardened strips of a dark-coloured leather. Several iron plates are attached to the boots by the aid of steel nails, which leaves the feet protected by durable metal. Long laces are inserted in the upper part of the boots allowing them to be closed around the foot. The toes of the boots have been steel-tipped.
a pair of metal boots.name: a pair of metal boots

a pair of rigid leather trousers.examine: Thin thigh and shin guards of hardened leather have been joined together with a set of thick knee guards, to create a pair of trousers-come-greaves that will offer the wearer nice protection, whilst allowing some flexibility.

id_details.name: a pair of rigid leather trousers

a pair of rigid leather trousers.name: a pair of rigid leather trousers

a rigid leather helmet.examine: This cap is moulded from four pieces of dried, hardened leather. The pieces have been stitched tightly together with two further flaps that you can fasten under your chin.
a rigid leather helmet.name: a rigid leather helmet

a pair of blue trousers.examine: These trousers are designed for durability. They are mostly worn by farmers and their ilk to protect against stains from soil and mud. They are also moderately moisture repellent because of the tight stitching.
a pair of blue trousers.name: a pair of blue trousers

a pair of soft leather boots.examine: These calf-high boots have been fashioned from a thin brown leather, lined with soft fur to add some comfort for the wearer.

id_details.name: a pair of soft leather boots

a pair of soft leather boots.name: a pair of soft leather boots

a pair of chain mail leggings.examine: Many rings have been locked into each other to form this armour. This piece of work offers ample protection for the legs, but is only of minor quality.

id_details.name: a pair of chain mail leggings

a pair of chain mail leggings.name: a pair of chain mail leggings

a pair of metal greaves.examine: These greaves are forged out of thin, steel plates. They cover the entire leg except for the knees, where small interwoven chains attach to the upper and lower leg parts. Leather laces at the back of the greaves enable them to be adjust to the size of the leg. Some small buckles at the top allow attachment to other pieces of armour.
a pair of metal greaves.name: a pair of metal greaves

a white robe.examine: These are simple robes, made for everyday wear by those who favour this kind of apparel. The fabric of the robes is a rough and lacking in any patterns to distinguish, while the appearance of loose threads and small wear patterns to the cloth suggests that the robe has been washed many a time.
a white robe.name: a white robe

a soft blue dress.examine: This dress is stitched from cotton and has been patched with several pieces of linen. It looks like the belongings of a commoner or peasant.
a soft blue dress.name: a soft blue dress

a pan.examine: Made from cast-iron, it is quite obvious this pan will withstand high heat and provide quite a good cooking surface.
a pan.name: a pan

a shortbow.examine: This bow is made of flexible wood and a strong tendon has been attached to both ends. The bow roughly measures three feet from one end to the other and is suitable for mobile or small archers.
a shortbow.name: a shortbow

a chain mail hauberk.examine: This chain mail hauberk consists of an uncountable amount of iron-rings. Upon closer inspection some half of the rings has a small gap between their begin and end, while the other half is solid; thereby compromising between overall qualtity and time as well as cost to create this armour.
a chain mail hauberk.name: a chain mail hauberk

a wooden push-toy.examine: This is a small wooden cart, with four working wheels. From the front hangs a team of carved wooden horses, and from its back a long pole stands up, with a handle on the end.
a wooden push-toy.name: a wooden push-toy

an arrow.examine: The roughly three feet long shaft of this arrow is quite thin and straight. It is made of pine and has a fletching of grey goose feathers at one end while on the other one a sharp head of metal is attached.
an arrow.name: an arrow

a bejewelled oak staff.examine: About six feet long, this staff was crafted from a perfect branch of oak by a master woodworker. Runes are carved on its sides, and its surface is smoothly polished. Truly this is a masterwork of carpentry. Looking closer, you are able to see some more details: namely, a polished white stone has been set in the staff, surrounded by arcane runes, a shining gemstone embedded near its top shimmers with many colours, and a lustrous fire opal has been inlaid in it. Atop the staff, a bronze claw holds a large blue crystal, which glows faintly. You realise that this staff is owned by you.

id_details.name: a bejewelled oak staff
special_abilities: It can call a great eagle to carry you long distances.

a bejewelled oak staff.name: a bejewelled oak staff

some short, black fur.examine: This patch of short black fur is partially covered with clotted blood. A few marks, left by a sharp tool such as a knife, are visible on the edges.
some short, black fur.name: some short, black fur

some white, egg-shaped berries.examine: These white, egg-shaped berries, are about half an inch long, with a smooth and slightly waxy skin. The seeds within are black and shiny, and the berries themselves have a slightly acrid odour.
some white, egg-shaped berries.name: some white, egg-shaped berries

a soot-black bear hide.examine: The hide has a dark colour to it, full of scars from old battles of its original owner. Tufts of soot-black hair cover it here and there. It is light in weight and hearty in durability. Whoever or whatever killed the bear to apprehend the fur must have gone a tough round.
a soot-black bear hide.name: a soot-black bear hide

a fletched arrow.examine: The base of this arrow contains feathered fletching. A silvery arrowhead adorns the top of it and assuredly adds to the deadliness if the arrow is used in combat. The shaft feels silk smooth to the hand and seems to be of an incredibly old yet still sturdy wood. This is truly the product of a meticulous and skilled craftsman.
a fletched arrow.name: a fletched arrow

a pair of soft leather gloves.examine: These gloves have been fashioned from a delicate thin leather. They seem to offer little or no protection, save perhaps from the elements.

id_details.name: a pair of soft leather gloves

a pair of soft leather gloves.name: a pair of soft leather gloves

a soft leather jerkin.examine: This snugly fitting jerkin is fashioned from thin pieces of softened leather, carefully stitched together using brown twine. The jerkin is constructed in a manner that allows the wearer flexibility at the cost of protection, save maybe from the elements.
a soft leather jerkin.name: a soft leather jerkin

an egg.examine: This is an ordinary egg, laid by a hen. It is oval-shaped, with small cracks in the shell.
an egg.name: an egg

a chicken and chestnut pie.examine: You see a large pie, filled with a steaming hot mixture of hearty chicken and chestnuts floating in a rich gravy and topped with a golden crust.
a chicken and chestnut pie.name: a chicken and chestnut pie

id_details.name: a large piece of smoked, cured pony meat

a horse-crested helm.examine: This expertly crafted helm was forged from a solid piece of metal, curled and hammered and into a formidable design. An ornate nose guard extends from the rim of the helmet. Etched across the entire helm are decorative accents symbolic of Rohan. From atop the helm a mighty silver Rohir steed rises up, as if rearing for battle.

id_details.name: a horse-crested helm
id_details.value: seven lauren, nineteen celeb, and ninety busc

a horse-crested helm.name: a horse-crested helm

a strip of dried meat.examine: Cured and dried so it will not go bad, this meat is tough and unappetizing. It tastes smoky, and is reminiscent of Dwarf.
a strip of dried meat.name: a strip of dried meat

some greater parts of a broken weapon.examine: The fragments of a heavy blade suggest that these are the remains of a large sword. But it is impossible to be sure.

id_details.name: some greater parts of a broken weapon

some greater parts of a broken weapon.name: some greater parts of a broken weapon

an infusion.examine: The infusion has a yellow-greenish colour. Fragments of healing herbs float in it. Its smell reminds you of the medicine used by grandma to cure her flu.

id_details.name: an infusion
special_abilities: It purges all other potion effects and cures flu and amibia.
It increases mana regeneration by six and mana by twelve for one hour.
After that, it increases mana regeneration by three and mana by six for one hour.

an infusion.name: an infusion

a piece of smoked, cured lynx meat.examine: This piece of meat is coloured dark brown by smoking and its outside is slightly dry due to salting. These treatments keep this piece of meat edible for a long time.

a loaf of white bread.examine: The crust of the loaf is golden-brown and crisp, but the bread itself is white and soft without being too airy and seems as fresh as if it has just been taken out of an oven and cooled. It does not appear to be sweet, but it smells of honey and spices, among which you can recognise cinnamon and cardamom.
a loaf of white bread.name: a loaf of white bread

a savoury baked dumpling.examine: This is a small, round dumpling. The exterior is a golden-brown crust and it is packed densely with savoury meat and chopped vegetables. Its top outer edges are jagged, having been pinched together to seal in the delicious contents.
a savoury baked dumpling.name: a savoury baked dumpling

a piece of cheese.examine: This piece of cheese has been cut from a much larger, round chunk. It has an orange rind and a yellow texture. Small holes can be seen in the sides.
a piece of cheese.name: a piece of cheese

some wheat cereals.examine: This bundle of wheat has large, hard grains while the yellow stems are strong and straight.
some wheat cereals.name: some wheat cereals

a musty loaf of bread.examine: A strong, musty odour emanates from this loaf of bread. The crust is covered by white and green mould, which is possibly the source of the scent.
a musty loaf of bread.name: a musty loaf of bread

a meat pasty.examine: Barliman's special meat pasty is a delicious wonder to behold. It is made from a square of rolled dough, folded over at a corner and filled with meat, potatoes and vegetables. It is quite the pride of the establishment; travellers come from Archet and beyond to partake of the tasty bake.
a meat pasty.name: a meat pasty

a plate of roast mutton.examine: Thick slices of juicy meat sit amid a pool of dark brown, aromatic gravy. Next to the mutton has been set a heaping pile of roasted potatoes, and the platter is filled out with a generous portion of mixed vegetables.
a plate of roast mutton.name: a plate of roast mutton

a bowl of stew.examine: This hearty stew consists of big chunks of the local game and vegetables, cooked in a brownish gravy and pleasantly spiced. You recognise pork, beef, carrots, turnips, taters, onions, and whatever else is in season.
a bowl of stew.name: a bowl of stew

a bowl of gruel.examine: This is a bowl of cracked corn, barley, and other local grains, boiled up into a thick porridge. Perhaps not the tastiest of meals but cheap and filling.
a bowl of gruel.name: a bowl of gruel

a small cod.examine: This medium-sized cod looks almost ready to eat. All you need is the fire to start cooking it over. I'd suggest you start building that fire.
a small cod.name: a small cod

some cherries.examine: They are large, ripe and shiny berries, although not very filling unless you ate a huge number of them.
some cherries.name: some cherries

some hollyberries.examine:
CONSIDER:
They are some hollyberries.
They weigh about an ounce.
some hollyberries.name: some hollyberries

some beans.examine: These brown beans have been removed from their hulls and seem to be ready for cooking. Boiled in a dish aside with some cheese and vegetables they could form a good meal.
some beans.name: some beans

some barley.examine: A double row of small golden grains runs up and down the tip of each stalk. The barley is ripe and ready for use.
some barley.name: some barley

some acorns.examine: These acorns are the simple fruits from an oak. They are oval shaped and of a light to dark brown colour. They seem edible, yet maybe only squirrels can truly appreciate their flavour.
some acorns.name: some acorns

a toadstool.examine: It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds. The top surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime that emits a weak, musty smell. Not the most delicious thing you have seen.
a toadstool.name: a toadstool

a green slime mould.examine: This certainly does not look appetizing, but it may be edible.
a green slime mould.name: a green slime mould

a nice fresh salmon.examine: This salmon looks quite tasty. You are very tempted to take this right to the frying pan and start cooking it. It is not particularly large, but it will provide a good solid meal.
a nice fresh salmon.name: a nice fresh salmon

a bowl of salad.examine: The salad bowl has lettuce which is green and crisp, with small, sliced carrots and little tomatoes tossed into the mix to make a nutritious meal.
a bowl of salad.name: a bowl of salad

some pine nuts.examine: These nuts are varying in size, ranging from barely an inch to one and a half. The actual nut is hidden inside a brown, hard shell, serving as protection from anyone who might want to eat it.
some pine nuts.name: some pine nuts

a plate of roast venison.examine: A pleasant gamey smell assails your nostrils from this sizeable platter of roasted meat. Thick gravy steams atop and beside the meat, and partially covers a pile of mashed potatoes. A generous helping of redcurrant chutney and a large portion of mixed vegetables fill out the plate.
a plate of roast venison.name: a plate of roast venison

a beet.examine: Brownish-purple and round, this tuber still has a thick dusting of dirt. Three stems stick out of the top, purple with vivid, green leaves. If it were washed and roasted, it would probably taste delicious.
a beet.name: a beet

a small piece of soft candy.examine: The sticky candy is wrapped in a sheet of very thin paper. The brown colour of butterscotch is mixed with lighter bands of yellow from a honey-mixture.

id_details.name: a small piece of soft candy

a small piece of soft candy.name: a small piece of soft candy

a small piece of chocolate.examine: A few squares of dark chocolate are wrapped in a glittering wrapper with bright flowers painted on it.
a small piece of chocolate.name: a small piece of chocolate

a turnip.examine: This nicely shaped round turnip is quite large. While mostly white-skinned, its upper part is of a reddish colour. It appears quite wholesome to eat.
a turnip.name: a turnip

a cabbage.examine: The leaves of this cabbage have a dark green colour. Some small holes, possibly made by larvae, can be seen on the younger innermost leaves. Near the root of the plant the outer leaves smell rotten.
a cabbage.name: a cabbage

a perfect oak branch.examine: It is about the length of a man and a handspan across. You can see no blemish or crack on its surface. In your hands, it is almost warm, almost living.
a perfect oak branch.name: a perfect oak branch

a mince-pie.examine: This pie has a light and flaky crust. The meat of the pie smells well seasoned with a nutty flavour.
a mince-pie.name: a mince-pie

Leonard's notes on staying well fed.examine: Leonard's notes on staying well fed 1. There's no point staying hungry or thirsty out there. Tired legs won't get any fresher on an empty stomach or dry throat! 2. I must remember to pour water into my water skins whenever I come across a spring or stream of fresh water in the wild. 3. Hunting deer or even something smaller like a rabbit is a great way to renew my food supply. Just as long as I keep a knife handy for the butchering. 4. If I remember to bring a pan I can cook meat in it. Cooked meat always lasts longer than raw. Besides, I don't really want raw meat - yuck! And if I cook with salt, even better. Cured meat practically lasts forever!

id_details.name: Leonard's notes on staying well fed

Leonard's notes on staying well fed.name: Leonard's notes on staying well fed

a sealed clay jar.examine: This hefty jar stands about four feet in height, and has been sculpted from a resolute burnt-red clay. Its girth is fairly large, tapering in size to top and bottom.
a sealed clay jar.name: a sealed clay jar

a candle.examine: A tall golden candle is crafted of the finest beeswax from the Anduin Vale. The comb-patterned candle is lightly scented with a sweet honey fragrance. The wick is protected with a thin reflective tin collar.
a candle.name: a candle

some sticky gooseberry preserve.examine: The gooseberries are floating in a sticky greenish syrup. The oval berries are green and semi-transparent, with tiny seeds visible through the soft skin.
some sticky gooseberry preserve.name: some sticky gooseberry preserve

some curdled milk.examine: What once was fresh milk has now turned into something else. The liquid has started to solidify into coagulated lumps of a yellow-green cheese.
some curdled milk.name: some curdled milk

a number of blackberries.examine: A short stem is still fastened to the berries, breaking of the smooth, round surface. The berries are dark in colour and they look very tasty indeed.
a number of blackberries.name: a number of blackberries

some wild strawberries.examine: These are indeed strawberries. They are smaller in size than the garden variety, but what they lack in size they make up in taste. It might be that when Yavanna made wild strawberries she put forth all her skill. So delicate and subtle yet wholesome, fresh and sweet is their taste.
some wild strawberries.name: some wild strawberries

some crimson raspberries.examine: These wild aggregate berries have been torn carelessly for they still have the conical bits attached to them from which they grew on the mother-shrub. Those tasty looking raspberries are of a marvellous red colour, and one wonders if they taste every bit as sweet as they look.
some crimson raspberries.name: some crimson raspberries

a smoked piece of meat.examine: This cut of meat has been spared of the flame, but not from the hot billowing smoke rising forth from the fire. The surface has been rendered a dark tan colour, indicating it was smoked using a hardy wood.
a smoked piece of meat.name: a smoked piece of meat

a bunch of chanterelles.examine: This small bunch of chanterelles contains mushrooms ranging in size from button to finger-length. Club-like stems turn smoothly into vase-shaped caps, their underside covered with thin pale folds. The tasty-looking round caps have inrolled irregular margins, and the remaining parts of the mushrooms range in colour from cream to deep yellow. A pleasant smell wafting from them bodes well for their culinary value also.
a bunch of chanterelles.name: a bunch of chanterelles

a handful of blackcurrant berries.examine: These small, dark berries look very tasty.
a handful of blackcurrant berries.name: a handful of blackcurrant berries

a large yellow apple.examine: The apple is glossy, honey-coloured, and almost transparent. Looking through it at a light, you can see its core and seeds, and when it is shadowed from light, it seems to shine from the inside. Its smell is fresh, yet richer and sweeter than the smell of an ordinary apple.
a large yellow apple.name: a large yellow apple

a broad silver belt.examine: It is a broad belt made from tiny silver rings woven together.
a broad silver belt.name: a broad silver belt

a leather pouch.examine: You see a small leather bag, ideally suited to keep slingstones. A long strip of leather has been added, so that you can wear it on your back. To get more ammunition, just wear the pouch and reveal stone.
a leather pouch.name: a leather pouch

a piece of silvery metal.examine: You recognise this piece of silvery metal as a nugget of mithril, that priceless treasure which was the source of the dwarves' great wealth of old.
a piece of silvery metal.name: a piece of silvery metal

a pair of rigid leather sleeves.examine: These sleeves are crafted from rigid leather, offering solid protection for the arms. The tough material ensures durability, although it limits flexibility somewhat. The stitching appears robust, promising to withstand significant wear and tear.

id_details.name: a pair of rigid leather sleeves

a pair of rigid leather sleeves.name: a pair of rigid leather sleeves

a round shield of the Mark.examine: Measuring more than three feet in diameter, this rounded shield can defend against any number of frontal or flanking attacks. Its round rim is reinforced with steel and the face of the armour is field green in colour. The shield's crest bears a running horse, white upon green, the emblem of the House of Eorl.

id_details.name: a round shield of the Mark

a round shield of the Mark.name: a round shield of the Mark

a set of lock picks.examine: There is a variety of tools, including slim, flat pieces and long, thin pieces, as well as strangely hooked and flattened pieces.
a set of lock picks.name: a set of lock picks

a shepherd's crook.examine: This oak crook measures about four feet from the arch of the handle to its base. Carved long ago from what had to have been a single piece of wood the wood now shows marks of weather and age.
a shepherd's crook.name: a shepherd's crook

a smelly bladder.examine: This crude container has been fashioned poorly from the bladder of some unfortunate creature. It is tied together with a thin, black string, recklessly crossing back and forth over the folds of yellow-grey skin. The seams of the skin pieces are damp, a result of the shoddy worksmanship and recent leaking.
a smelly bladder.name: a smelly bladder

a flute of bone.examine: This long, white flute was made from the lower arm bone of an Elf. While the carving has been carried out with a lot of patience and skill, a line of orkish runes on the backside makes clear of what origin the craftsman was. The flute has five holes for the fingers, and it is attached to a string of pale leather, so that it can be worn around the neck or on a belt.
a flute of bone.name: a flute of bone

a longbow.examine: Spanning the height of a small man and made of reddish-brown wood, it has a taut string tied with knots on both ends and a sturdy grip in the middle.
a longbow.name: a longbow

a soft leather helmet.examine: Rabbit fur lines the inside of this skullcap making it both comfortable and warm. Two small straps at the back of the cap can be tightened to ensure a snug fit, which will be useful in high winds.
a soft leather helmet.name: a soft leather helmet

a long, sticky bit of flesh.examine: This foul smelling bit of severed flesh is slimy, vile and very sticky. The surface is grey with some pink patches.

id_details.name: a long, sticky bit of flesh

a long, sticky bit of flesh.name: a long, sticky bit of flesh

a barbed fang.examine: This wicked weapon is essentially a long and slender knife whose edges have been notched like a harpoon, ensuring the formation of gaping bloody wounds when ripped out of a victim.
a barbed fang.name: a barbed fang

a bolt.examine: The quarrel is made from hard wood and has a sharp head of iron. The rear end is square and has a slight notch which allows it to be used in a crossbow.
a bolt.name: a bolt

a fine pair of soft leather sleeves.examine: These excellent sleeves have been constructed from thick pieces of high quality leather sewn together using a strong brown twine. They are lined with a delicate soft fur providing the wearer with warmth and protection, whilst also allowing a great deal of flexibility.

id_details.name: a fine pair of soft leather sleeves

a fine pair of soft leather sleeves.name: a fine pair of soft leather sleeves

a fine pair of soft leather gloves.examine: These gloves have been constructed from a high quality leather, lined with fine rabbit fur to offer comfort as well as protection.

id_details.name: a fine pair of soft leather gloves

a fine pair of soft leather gloves.name: a fine pair of soft leather gloves

a topaz.examine: This transparent gemstone is a topaz, of the rare blue variety. Topazes as large as this are quite difficult to cut, since they cleave easily; the jewel-smith who worked on this gem must have been quite experienced, perhaps one of the most skilled Dwarves of Khazad-dum, in order to obtain such a wondrous result.
a topaz.name: a topaz

a glittering spearhead.examine: A sharp and heavy spearhead, created in a silvery metal. It is almost the size of a grown man's hand and vaguely serrated along the edges. Runes are embedded along the sides of the head and where normally a shaft would be fitted is a hole, about an inch wide.
a glittering spearhead.name: a glittering spearhead

a scrap of silver.examine: A scrap made from some smithing process, there is not much of it left. It shines like silver, although it is very strong for its small size.
a scrap of silver.name: a scrap of silver

a brilliant adamant.examine: This faceted gemstone seems to capture the faintest glimmers of light, and to transform them into marvellous rainbows. Truly this must be the legendary adamant, harder and brighter than diamond; a jewel not made by the forces of nature, but crafted by one of the great Noldorin smiths - Celebrimbor, or perhaps Feanor himself.
a brilliant adamant.name: a brilliant adamant

a plain bracelet.examine: This bracelet is made of several simple chains linked together to six settings. Three of the settings are teardrops and three are diamond-shaped, diamond and tear following each other. No clasp adorns the bracelet, thus it needs to be pulled over the hand to be worn.

id_details.name: a plain bracelet
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a plain bracelet.name: a plain bracelet

a bracelet with deep green gems.examine: This bracelet is made of several simple chains linked together to six settings. Three of the settings are teardrops and three are diamond-shaped, diamond and tear following each other. No clasp adorns the bracelet, thus it needs to be pulled over the hand to be worn. The bracelet has been embedded with lustrous green emeralds.

id_details.name: a bracelet with deep green gems
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a bracelet with deep green gems.name: a bracelet with deep green gems

a plain pendant.examine: Over a hundred small rings have been linked together form a chained necklace with a small hook clasp on one side, and a pendant on the other end. On examining the chain further, it appears to be quite sturdy despite its rather diminuitive size. The pendant is shaped like a teardrop and has room for a gem to be mounted.

id_details.name: a plain pendant
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a plain pendant.name: a plain pendant

a plain ring.examine: The ring is round and perfectly shaped to fit around a finger. Only a small marking can be found on the inside of the ring, a signature of the silversmith that forged it. The top of the ring features a square, silver setting with room for a gem.

id_details.name: a plain ring
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a plain ring.name: a plain ring

an iron ring.examine: This ring, clearly designed to fit the fingers of a man, is quite heavy for its size and could be worn by creatures both larger and smaller than a man. Made of solid iron it lacks any decoration or other distinguishing features.
an iron ring.name: an iron ring

a long and scaly snakeskin.examine: It is thick and tan, covered with tough scales. The criss-cross formation of the black stripes, makes a diamond pattern up its length. You also notice how supple it is, perhaps the hide could be tanned and formed into a garment of some sort.
a long and scaly snakeskin.name: a long and scaly snakeskin

a chunk of metal.examine: At first sight, this amorphous chunk of metal looks like the botched result of an apprentice smelter's first attempt at making an iron ingot. A closer look at the evenly smoothed surface, however, reveals the presence of a grid of thin straight lines, faintly coloured, crossing each other at regular angles.
a chunk of metal.name: a chunk of metal

a porcelain vase.examine: This is a beautiful and delicate vase. It is made of a grey, translucent material, with smell glittery specks shining within it. The Dwarves jealously guard the secret of its making.
a porcelain vase.name: a porcelain vase

a saddlebag.examine: This bag attaches to the saddle of a mount. It has enough room for smaller items. It is made of sturdy leather, with brass locks.
a saddlebag.name: a saddlebag

a worn clay bowl.examine: This bowl measures nearly two feet across it has clearly been made for someone of large stature. While the inside of the bowl is extremely smooth the outer side shows signs of wear. There are chips around the rim of the bowl and a small crack is beginning to form.
a worn clay bowl.name: a worn clay bowl

an archer's wrist guard.examine: This wrist guard is made of decoratively patterned leather. The quality of the handiwork is impressive and the decorations are etched with great skill and precision. Birds aflight between two tall, luminous trees adorn the centre of the leather band. Strong cords evoking leafy vines thread two sets of aglets used to fasten the guard upon the wearer's arm. The aglets are camouflaged amidst embellishments of branches and leaves. It looks very comfortable to wear around the wrist.
an archer's wrist guard.name: an archer's wrist guard

a tawny bear fur.examine: Warm but light, this fur appears to be a skin of a large, tawny bear. Its hairs are thick and light brown at the roots, sand-coloured in the middle and thin, light golden at the ends. The former owner of this fur must have been able to easily blend with the ground and trees in sunlit forests.
a tawny bear fur.name: a tawny bear fur

a bejewelled shield.examine: This shield is not exceptionally large, but it is very maneuverable. It is very light for its size, and on its front is a brilliant collage of gems and precious metals.
a bejewelled shield.name: a bejewelled shield

a black pair of metal vambraces.examine: These vambraces have been masterfully forged out of steel. The reinforced shoulders are connected to a durable metal cylinder to protect the upper arm. The elbow section is made out of concentric telescoping bands that are fitted together to allow free movement without leaving a gap. The smaller metal tubes for the forearms have strong hooks to securely attach gauntlets.

id_details.name: a black pair of metal vambraces

a black pair of metal vambraces.name: a black pair of metal vambraces

a crimson pair of metal gauntlets.examine: These gauntlets have been masterfully forged out of steel. The metal of the wrists flare out to overlap the armour of the forearm. There are straps to attach the gauntlets securely. The back of each knuckle on every finger is protected by thick metal, and is hinged to allow free movement of the fingers.

id_details.name: a crimson pair of metal gauntlets

a crimson pair of metal gauntlets.name: a crimson pair of metal gauntlets

a pair of rabbit fur shoes.examine: This pile of fur is nothing more than a pair of shoes.

id_details.name: a pair of rabbit fur shoes

a pair of rabbit fur shoes.name: a pair of rabbit fur shoes

a fine, soft leather helmet.examine: This conical leather helmet is joined together with two strips of stiff cowhide, and fastened with four rather dull metal studs. The rim fits rather low on your head, just above your eyebrows.
a fine, soft leather helmet.name: a fine, soft leather helmet

a soft cloth cap.examine: The cap is little more than a thin piece of fabric, which has been shaped into the simplest headwear. The material is dark, and a little dirty, so it is hard to see the pattern, but it appears to be a simple check. The rim has been stiffened slightly, so that it might protect the wearer's eyes from the sun.
a soft cloth cap.name: a soft cloth cap

a black metal breastplate.examine: This heavy, thick metal breastplate was obviously crafted by a master armourer. It will protect its owner from all but the mightiest blows.
a black metal breastplate.name: a black metal breastplate

a copper key.examine: This little key is made from copper.
a copper key.name: a copper key

a leaf-shaped arrow.examine: This arrow is about two feet and a half long pine shaft, but more noticeable is its finely crafted leaf-shaped tip.
a leaf-shaped arrow.name: a leaf-shaped arrow

a broad girdle.examine: This is a large and broad belt, not only holding up the wearer's pants but also supporting his back. Its leather backing is reinforced with metal plates and studs, and ornamentation covers each one.
a broad girdle.name: a broad girdle

a spiked horsehide buckler.examine: This buckler has a diameter of slightly more than a foot. Its most noticeable feature is a sharp metal spike at its centre which is bound to the circular wooden backing by numerous strips of brown, tanned horsehide. Two hide straps on the inner side provide a grip for the shield.
a spiked horsehide buckler.name: a spiked horsehide buckler

a black blouse.examine: The blouse is made from linen cloth and looks quite ordinary. Upon closer inspection, a few simple decorations along the sleeves can be spotted.
a black blouse.name: a black blouse

a sun-emblazoned shield.examine: This large rounded metal shield looks able to protect almost the full length of a soldier's body, when used properly. The shield's face has been painted a grassy green colour. The embossed crest portrays a golden sun blazoned upon the green background.
a sun-emblazoned shield.name: a sun-emblazoned shield

a crimson metal breastplate.examine: This heavy, thick metal breastplate was obviously crafted by a master armourer. It will protect its owner from all but the mightiest blows.
a crimson metal breastplate.name: a crimson metal breastplate

a set of reed pipes.examine: This simple musical instrument is made of seven dried reeds of varying lengths bound together with a length of cord. Though crude, it can produce haunting melodies in skilled hands.
a set of reed pipes.name: a set of reed pipes

a rickety wooden chest.examine: Once, long ago, it may have been a stout and sturdy chest. However, as the years have passed the wood has been bitten by frost and dried by wind, and it seems to be only barely holding on to itself. However, the ancient craftsmanship proves stronger than expected.
a rickety wooden chest.name: a rickety wooden chest

a fur-cloak with a silvery streak.examine: A black fur, lined with streaks of silver, has been fashioned into a furred cloak. A few clasps can be spotted on the fur, as well as a few strings so it can be well-attached to its owner.

id_details.name: a fur-cloak with a silvery streak

a fur-cloak with a silvery streak.name: a fur-cloak with a silvery streak

a dark-blue cloak.examine: This large cloak is made of dark-blue cloth and is lined with soft fabric. When worn it is fastened below the neck with two long woven braids.
a dark-blue cloak.name: a dark-blue cloak

a crimson pair of metal vambraces.examine: These vambraces have been masterfully forged out of steel. The reinforced shoulders are connected to a durable metal cylinder to protect the upper arm. The elbow section is made out of concentric telescoping bands that are fitted together to allow free movement without leaving a gap. The smaller metal tubes for the forearms have strong hooks to securely attach gauntlets.

id_details.name: a crimson pair of metal vambraces

a crimson pair of metal vambraces.name: a crimson pair of metal vambraces

a pair of reddish-brown pants.examine: A well made pair of russet coloured pants, made for years of usage by a skilled tailor.
a pair of reddish-brown pants.name: a pair of reddish-brown pants

a crimson pair of metal greaves.examine: These greaves are forged out of durable, polished steel plates. They cover the entire leg except for the knees, where strong, interwoven chains attach to the upper and lower leg parts. Black leather laces at the back of the greaves enable them to be adjusted to the size of the leg. An engraved set of buckles at the top allows attachment to other pieces of armour.

id_details.name: a crimson pair of metal greaves
id_details.value: twelve lauren, one celeb, and eighty busc

a crimson pair of metal greaves.name: a crimson pair of metal greaves

a brown hat.examine: This large hat has a wide brim that slopes downward in the front and curves upward in the back. Simple but sturdy, it was stitched together from rough pieces of leather, with a cloth hat band encircling the junction between crown and brim.
a brown hat.name: a brown hat

a wolf fur vest.examine: The pile of fur here is a simple vest made of wolf fur.
a wolf fur vest.name: a wolf fur vest

a Daedeltiri robe.examine: This Noldorin robe is woven from the finest white wool. The sleeves and hem are elaborately stitched with golden thread.
a Daedeltiri robe.name: a Daedeltiri robe

a hardened leather breastplate.examine: A large number of small, neatly cut pieces of leather have been sewn together to make this armour breastplate. Covering the whole chest, the sturdy plate offers decent protection while not being too cumbersome.
a hardened leather breastplate.name: a hardened leather breastplate

a spiked collar.examine: A hefty iron collar, it has short, sharp spikes all the way around.
a spiked collar.name: a spiked collar

an orkish shortbow.examine: Carved out of a stave of wood slightly over three feet long, this bow had been stained a dark, almost black, colour, as if the wood had been charred in a fire. The workmanship is simple yet not crude; all lengths and proportions appear carefully measured, giving the bow a look of a swift, deadly weapon. Attached to the nocks is a dark bowstring made of a narrow strip of leather.
an orkish shortbow.name: an orkish shortbow

a magic mushroom.examine: A mushroom lies here, pale brown in colour. On its cap there are white patches of skin that are loosely attached. It looks safe to eat, and seems to glow faintly.
a magic mushroom.name: a magic mushroom

an iron brooch.examine: This brooch is a small replica of a battle axe, made of dull grey iron. It has a clasp on the back.
an iron brooch.name: an iron brooch

a metal-cased bolt.examine: The shaft of this bolt is encased in metal, as is the tip which is composed entirely of metal. The shaft is hollow, which makes this type of missile light enough to travel far, but hit with more accuracy and force than its wooden equivalent.
a metal-cased bolt.name: a metal-cased bolt

a Zaugurz shield.examine: Crafted from thick wood, the design resembles the man-made wall shields, but it is clearly a lot more crude. The front is covered with Zaugurz tribal symbols of winter wolves, white bears and snow.
a Zaugurz shield.name: a Zaugurz shield

a cup.examine: It is a small white throwaway cup that has 'Keep MudLand tidy' written on its side and 'Quifatronic C-1000 mk I' on its bottom.
a cup.name: a cup

a vial of preserved blood.examine: It looks like an old glass vial, whose surface has withstood the passage of time. It is almost full of a reddish fluid, which looks like blood - but which hasn't coagulated in the meantime.
a vial of preserved blood.name: a vial of preserved blood

a wooden top.examine: This top is oval in shape, starting thin before bulging out, then rapidly diminishing to a metal point. It is painted green, with a yellow stripe running up and around it.
a wooden top.name: a wooden top

a coach ticket.examine: +----------------------------+ A red sign says:        |  Cry & Co.  Coach Company  |                         |  Tharbad - Bree - Fornost  |                         +----------------------------+
a coach ticket.name: a coach ticket

a fragile parchment.examine: When you carefully unfold the fragile, almost crumbling page, your eyes are treated with a storm of dancing ancient runes, scribbled all over. The letters continuously morph between different languages, and a slight blue glow can be noticed along the edges of the parchment.
a fragile parchment.name: a fragile parchment

a metal file.examine: This long thin piece of metal is covered with small grooves, except for a handle at one end. It is useful for woodwork.
a metal file.name: a metal file

a brown leather scroll.examine: This wide sheet of thin, soft leather has been wrapped around an ornate rod carved of dark wood. There is no parchment enclosed within, but a large illustration, or rather a map of sorts, has been imprinted into the leather itself. A number of small crosses, scribbled with charcoal, is also visible. It seems like there used to be some writing at the bottom edge of the scroll, but the text is now unreadable due to some moisture that has made the leather blotched. A single rune, however, stands out in the lower right corner.
a brown leather scroll.name: a brown leather scroll

a tincture.examine: This small bottle contains a heavy-scented oil, used for anointing people or massaging.
a tincture.name: a tincture

a short, moist tail.examine: This fleshy tail is covered with a moist, slimy coating; it is white in colour and the sides are flecked with silver. The tail is oval at the base, becoming more flat towards the tip.
a short, moist tail.name: a short, moist tail

a brightly painted skiff.examine: This boat is long and shallow in shape, masterfully built to be both light and strong. It has been painted with bright, flowing patterns and intricate elven runes that shine in hues of silver and gold and green. Two white-painted seats, one in front and one in back, have been woven from flexible reeds and attached between the walls of the skiff. Several short-handled paddles with broad, leaf-shaped blades are to be used for steering the boat.
a brightly painted skiff.name: a brightly painted skiff

a narrow grey boat.examine: This narrow, grey skiff is constructed from a species of wood that is notably thin, strong, and buoyant. The individual planks have been put together so skilfully that it is nearly impossible to see the seams between them. It is said that the boats built by the elves of Lorien are unsinkable, albeit wayward if navigated by untrained hands. Several short-handled paddles with broad, leaf-shaped blades lie in the bottom of the craft.
a narrow grey boat.name: a narrow grey boat

a buttoned cassock.examine: Made of a heavy cloth, this coat could easily cover a man, sheltering him from the weather. Down the front are buttons made from brass, with the symbol of Arnor on each one.

id_details.name: a buttoned cassock
special_abilities: It is efficient against water and cold.

a buttoned cassock.name: a buttoned cassock

a large wooden wall shield.examine: Crafted from the finest sturdy oak, this huge wall shield garners you a protection that ranges from head to toe. Lighter than its metal counterpart, it still affords a great deal of cover from melee and missile weapons alike.
a large wooden wall shield.name: a large wooden wall shield

a basinet.examine: This is a light steel helmet, pointed at the top.
a basinet.name: a basinet

a fishing net.examine: It is woven of a strong thread, in a fine mesh that will ensnare the smallest fish unfortunate enough to be caught in it.
a fishing net.name: a fishing net

a snakeskin belt.examine: The belt looks very tough, as it is made out of a long snakeskin. You notice the black stripes form a diamond pattern, and surmise that the hide once covered a large rattlesnake. Its colour is light brown, almost leading into a light grey. The scales on it are very strong and form a durable material.
a snakeskin belt.name: a snakeskin belt

a studded leather belt.examine: A thick leather belt, with silver studs evenly spaced.
a studded leather belt.name: a studded leather belt

a small fluid-sack.examine: This appears to have been taken from some creature, or the corpse of that creature. It is sealed, and contains some liquid.
a small fluid-sack.name: a small fluid-sack

a grey fluid-sack.examine: This was undoubtedly once a part of some creature. It is not large, and inside you can clearly see some dark fluid.
a grey fluid-sack.name: a grey fluid-sack

a broken pickaxe.examine: This old pickaxe is no longer of use to anyone. The head is rusty and rather blunt by long use. The handle completes the image of uselessness by being broken in two places.
a broken pickaxe.name: a broken pickaxe

a bright red amulet.examine: The amulet is forged from a vibrant red metal, its surface smooth but marked with faint, ancient runes that catch the light. It feels unnaturally warm to the touch, as though alive with hidden power. Suspended from a silver chain that gleams as if untouched by time, the amulet radiates an aura both unsettling and compelling, drawing the eye.
a bright red amulet.name: a bright red amulet

a guild-guard uniform.examine: It is a long robe, made of a golden and silver fabric. The emblem of the guild is embroidered on its front and back.
a guild-guard uniform.name: a guild-guard uniform

a wolfskin wristband.examine: You see a beautifully knit piece of wolfskin. The wristband must have been made by a craftsman of Old.
a wolfskin wristband.name: a wolfskin wristband

a plain vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a plain vest.name: a plain vest

some yellow petals.examine: They are yellow, with a greenish tint. They must have come from very small, tightly bunched flowers.
some yellow petals.name: some yellow petals

a bushy flowering plant.examine: About a yard high, it is almost as wide. Intermingled with the green leaves you see long clusters of flowers, looking vaguely like a tail of some kind.
a bushy flowering plant.name: a bushy flowering plant

an iron ore fragment.examine: This heavy chunk of ore is not very useful in its present state, but once it has been smelted a good craftsman could make good use of the metal within.
an iron ore fragment.name: an iron ore fragment

a chunk of ore.examine: Despite its small size, this piece of iron ore weighs heavily in your hand.
a chunk of ore.name: a chunk of ore

a chunk of copper ore.examine: This is a piece of deep grey rock with some bluish-green intrusions, somewhat crystalline and at the same time powdery.
a chunk of copper ore.name: a chunk of copper ore

a pair of metal gauntlets.examine: This pair of gauntlets is forged from several thin pieces of steel. While the hand itself is composed of one solid piece of steel, the fingers are constructed out of several small ring-like parts that maintain the flexibility of the fingers. A metal clip allows closure of the gauntlet around the hand.
a pair of metal gauntlets.name: a pair of metal gauntlets

a pair of metal vambraces.examine: Several plates of thin metal are attached to each other to form this piece of armour. It covers the complete arm except for the elbow, which is covered with small iron links. Leather strips encircle the vambraces, providing a way to close them around the arm. A couple of metal buckles at the ends of the vambraces enable attachment to other pieces of armour.
a pair of metal vambraces.name: a pair of metal vambraces

a dark shield.examine: The light seems to play tricks with your eyes as you strain to make out the intricate design etched on the shield's surface. The shield itself is light and made of some dark metal. The fine tracery embossed upon it is dominated in the centre by a bright red lidless eye that seems to fix you in its gaze.
a dark shield.name: a dark shield

id_details.name: a map of the freehold of the Shire

a map of the freehold of the Shire.name: a map of the freehold of the Shire

id_details.name: a map of the Tower Hills

a map of the Tower Hills.name: a map of the Tower Hills

a small piece of venison.examine: The surface of this meat still shows traces of blood. Whether it was briefly cooked or just browned from age, it will not keep edible for long.
a small piece of venison.name: a small piece of venison

a small piece of swan meat.examine: The surface of this meat still shows traces of blood. Whether it was briefly cooked or just browned from age, it will not keep edible for long.

id_details.name: a small piece of swan meat

a small piece of swan meat.name: a small piece of swan meat

a small piece of squirrel meat.examine: The surface of this meat still shows traces of blood. Whether it was briefly cooked or just browned from age, it will not keep edible for long.

id_details.name: a small piece of squirrel meat

a small piece of squirrel meat.name: a small piece of squirrel meat

a small piece of raw squirrel meat.examine: The small piece of meat is dark red and veiny. Blood can be seen seeping from the middle and bits of white, fatty tissue are hanging off the outer edges.

id_details.name: a small piece of raw squirrel meat

a small piece of raw squirrel meat.name: a small piece of raw squirrel meat

a small piece of raw rabbit meat.examine: The small piece of meat is dark red and veiny. Blood can be seen seeping from the middle and bits of white, fatty tissue are hanging off the outer edges.

id_details.name: a small piece of raw rabbit meat

a small piece of raw rabbit meat.name: a small piece of raw rabbit meat

a delicious bannock.examine: The light and brown bannock looks delicious.
a delicious bannock.name: a delicious bannock

a bright red mushroom.examine: It is a bright orange-red, with yellow spots covering its top. It has a sweet and alluring smell.
a bright red mushroom.name: a bright red mushroom

a mashed honey-wax mixture.examine: It seems this yellow comb of honey was violently crushed to a messy mixture of wax and honey.
a mashed honey-wax mixture.name: a mashed honey-wax mixture

a bulb of garlic.examine: This ivory coloured bulb of garlic consists of several sections. A spicy, pungent aroma, emanating from the partly crushed sections of the bulb, flows in the air around it.
a bulb of garlic.name: a bulb of garlic

a small ball of dough.examine: The round raw dough needs to be cooked to be made into a brown bannock.
a small ball of dough.name: a small ball of dough

a carrot.examine: The carrot is long and reddish yellow with still a few strands of green leaves attached to the top. It is still quite dirty and upon closer examination it appears as if a small creature has taken a number of bites out of the juicy carrot.
a carrot.name: a carrot

some violet berries.examine: The spherical berries are half an inch large. Their dark violet aspect reminds you of a black cherry, but you doubt they would be that tasty.
some violet berries.name: some violet berries

a sticky honeycomb.examine: This is a large golden honeycomb with the soft sticky feel of wax, dripping with sweet honey.
a sticky honeycomb.name: a sticky honeycomb

an onion.examine: The surface of this onion is coloured light brown. Some small fragments of dirt are attached to the roots. The odour of this vegetable is quite noticeable.
an onion.name: an onion

a juicy plum.examine: The plum is mostly coloured purple, with some touches of blue here and there. It is egg-shaped and about two inches in diameter.
a juicy plum.name: a juicy plum

a potato.examine: This humpy potato is still dusty and covered with soil. Its skin is brown-red and its pulp is yellow. It can accompany meat or fish for a complete meal.
a potato.name: a potato

a crushed stem.examine: This stem has been broken and crushed. Sap oozes from point where it has been snapped and crushed. The soggy mish-mash is shaped into a small ball.
a crushed stem.name: a crushed stem

a light boat of reeds.examine: Though light, the boat looks sturdy. It is only big enough to carry one.
a light boat of reeds.name: a light boat of reeds

a canoe.examine: The canoe is light and sturdy, made of teakwood. It is six feet in length, and can easily be carried by a single person if need arises.
a canoe.name: a canoe

a raft.examine: This raft looks like nothing more than a couple of tree-branches lashed together.
a raft.name: a raft

an ornate scabbard.examine: The leather of this scabbard has been inlaid with gold and silver designs, gracefully swirling around precious stones.
an ornate scabbard.name: an ornate scabbard

a bracelet with cerise gems.examine: This bracelet is made of several simple chains linked together to six settings. Three of the settings are teardrops and three are diamond-shaped, diamond and tear following each other. No clasp adorns the bracelet, thus it needs to be pulled over the hand to be worn. The bracelet has been embedded with rubellites.

id_details.name: a bracelet with cerise gems
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a bracelet with cerise gems.name: a bracelet with cerise gems

a jade bracelet.examine: This delicate bracelet is embedded with many small jades. They surround a large perfect jade of a green hue slightly darker than the smaller gems. The bracelet itself is golden and appears warm to the touch. Clearly this is work of the dwarven master smiths of old.
a jade bracelet.name: a jade bracelet

a huge silvery bracer.examine: Large enough to fit a giant's wrist, this bracer's surface is heavily ornate, bearing chiselled runes, geometrical shapes and inlaid spirals of bronze. Judging from the weight and colour, the bracer could be made of silver; yet it seems far harder.
a huge silvery bracer.name: a huge silvery bracer

a chunk of honey-coloured amber.examine: The glossed chunk of amber has a triangular shape to it, rounded at all ends. At a closer look at the honey-coloured amber, you can see something deep inside it, something dark, but you can't quite make out its shape.

id_details.name: a chunk of honey-coloured amber
special_abilities: When embedded, it can greatly reduce the damage from some magical attacks.

a chunk of honey-coloured amber.name: a chunk of honey-coloured amber

a corberyl.examine: This clear, faceted gem plays wondrous tricks with the light it receives: depending on external conditions, its colour changes from bluish-green to orange to purple-red. It seems as if the gem were a living creature itself, waking up and sleeping as time passes.
a corberyl.name: a corberyl

an onyx.examine: This small gem is a deep glossy black, with a few bands of white and pale grey sweeping across its surface. It is highly polished, and seems to both absorb and reflect light at the same time.

id_details.name: an onyx
special_abilities: When embedded, it can be used to weaken an enemy.

an onyx.name: an onyx

a pitch-black spinel.examine: Cut into a a multifaceted teardrop, the spinel shines with a mirror finish of pitch-black brilliance. The base of the gem is smooth, while the point at the top of the teardrop is as sharp as a needle and as strong as steel.

id_details.name: a pitch-black spinel
special_abilities: When embedded, it can be used to shroud yourself in shadows.

a pitch-black spinel.name: a pitch-black spinel

a large skin.examine: This large skin looks well constructed. It is made of two leather hides that have been thoroughly sewn together with strips of leather. The nozzle, which can be opened easily to quench one's thirst, is closed shut with a cork that is tethered to the side of the bag.
a large skin.name: a large skin

a bottle.examine: The bottle of dark-brown glass is wider at the base then at the top and could contain all sorts of liquids. A big cork seals the bottle.
a bottle.name: a bottle

a bright green shrub.examine: This shrub is around three feet high, and is clearly an evergreen. The leaves on its branches are bright green, lacy, delicate near the top, and lobed near the bottom. There are clusters of small, spherical and ribbed seeds which emit an unpleasant odour.
a bright green shrub.name: a bright green shrub

a clay pipe.examine: A simple pipe, though it looks as though it was made with great care. There are no ornate decorations, but the smooth texture and curves are of great quality. The potter that made this pipe must blow a few smoke rings in his spare time.
a clay pipe.name: a clay pipe

a white blouse.examine: The blouse is made from linen cloth and looks quite ordinary. Upon closer inspection, a few simple decorations along the sleeves can be spotted.
a white blouse.name: a white blouse

a plain robe.examine: These are simple robes, made for everyday wear by those who favour this kind of apparel. The fabric of the robes is a rough and lacking in any patterns to distinguish, while the appearance of loose threads and small wear patterns to the cloth suggests that the robe has been washed many a time.
a plain robe.name: a plain robe

a spiked metal helmet.examine: This helmet has some mean looking spikes mounted on the front. It looks like it could provide the wearer with good protection against all kinds of violence.
a spiked metal helmet.name: a spiked metal helmet

a large metal wall shield.examine: The sheer size of this huge shield affords you a wide range of protection, if you have the strength to wear it without overly fatiguing yourself. Thick leather straps are riveted to the inside allowing you to grip the handle enough to lift this monumental shield.
a large metal wall shield.name: a large metal wall shield

a red-skull shield.examine: An orkish shield, it is designed for the regular troops to fight with. Light and not too cumbersome in size, it provides protection without sacrificing mobility. The face of the shield is blackened to avoid reflections, while the inner surface has a crude leather covering. On the sable face is the crude design of a red skull, the effigy of the Ohurk-uai tribe.
a red-skull shield.name: a red-skull shield

a spiked shield.examine: This round shield is certainly gruesome. From the centre projects a large and sharp, although rusty, spike. The spike is bathed in dried blood and gore from unfortunate opponents, and in fact the entire shield has many layers of blood encrusted upon it. The shield has apparently never been washed or cleaned in any way, and it would be impossible to remove the 'decorations'.
a spiked shield.name: a spiked shield

a wooden wall shield.examine: Crafted from sturdy oak, this wall shield offers you a moderate range of protection. Leather straps riveted to the inside provide you with a sturdy grip, allowing you to lift the shield.
a wooden wall shield.name: a wooden wall shield

a dirty apron.examine: A small apron can be worn as a protection so other clothes do not dirty. It has served that purpose very well, as many stains of varying sizes and colours cover it almost completely, effectively hiding its original colour.
a dirty apron.name: a dirty apron

a fine grey cloak.examine: The cloak is a light, grey, hooded cloak with a red circle on the back and on the hood.

id_details.name: a fine grey cloak
id_details.value: fifty lauren, three celeb, and sixty busc

a fine grey cloak.name: a fine grey cloak

a black warg fur.examine: This dark fur is composed of black hairs which, when observed closely, are somewhat reflective against the light. It is not very heavy, but the skin is surprisingly tough. It is slightly warm to the touch, as though imbued with its original owner's strength.
a black warg fur.name: a black warg fur

a black and red robe.examine: The robe is made of a heavy and rough black fabric, which would probably irritate the skin of an unaccustomed wearer. Still, it is a good protection against the adverse elements. On the back, painted in red, the lidless eye of Sauron stares menacingly.
a black and red robe.name: a black and red robe

a grey wool hat.examine: This hat seems very warm, as it is made out of rough wool. Soft enough not to make it uncomfortable, yet strong enough not to wear out quickly. It is tightly woven, guaranteed to keep out the elements of wind and cold.
a grey wool hat.name: a grey wool hat

a white wolf fur.examine: This heavy fur is much lighter in colour than usual wolf fur, it is nearly white and has a dark stripe running along the back. Its original function was to protect the wolf against scratches, bites and other damage.
a white wolf fur.name: a white wolf fur

a crossbow.examine: This large bow is fashioned of ironwood, being very sturdy in its construction. The bow is bound, and supported by thick straps of leather to the large crosspiece of ironwood. A crank is fashioned to the end of the bow, enabling the user to pull the bow back to a loading position. Bolts are launched by the release lever on the underside of the bow. Such a weapon is designed to deliver its missile to a target with great amounts of force. It is currently not loaded.
a crossbow.name: a crossbow

a fine pair of metal greaves.examine: These greaves are forged out of durable, polished steel plates. They cover the entire leg except for the knees, where strong, interwoven chains attach to the upper and lower leg parts. Black leather laces at the back of the greaves enable them to be adjusted to the size of the leg. An engraved set of buckles at the top allows attachment to other pieces of armour.

id_details.name: a fine pair of metal greaves
id_details.value: twelve lauren, one celeb, and eighty busc

a fine pair of metal greaves.name: a fine pair of metal greaves

a fine metal breastplate.examine: This heavy, thick metal breastplate was obviously crafted by a master armourer. It will protect its owner from all but the mightiest blows.
a fine metal breastplate.name: a fine metal breastplate

a sickly green mushroom.examine: It is a small and frail mushroom, which partially crumbles into a greenish dust as soon as you touch it.
a sickly green mushroom.name: a sickly green mushroom

a patch of phosphorescent moss.examine: The patch of moss glows in the shadow with a yellow-green light.
a patch of phosphorescent moss.name: a patch of phosphorescent moss

a metal shield.examine: The shield is made from metal of some kind. It is a good compromise between a large, cumbersome metal shield and a lighter, yet much smaller shield.
a metal shield.name: a metal shield

a dark violet vial.examine: The vial is partially filled with a dark violet liquid, in which partially crushed berries can be seen.

id_details.name: a dark violet vial
special_abilities: It contains oil, poisoned with level five poison that would last for four hours.

a dark violet vial.name: a dark violet vial

a dirty note.examine: Strange glyphs have been drawn on a now crumpled and dirty note. Their meaning is difficult to understand, but they could describe a medical formula of some sort.
a dirty note.name: a dirty note

an ash arrow.examine: This fine arrow has been made from light ash-wood, well renowned for its qualities of durability and strength.
an ash arrow.name: an ash arrow

a blackened bolt.examine: It is a shorter quarrel than most, with the vanes in green and orange. Along the sides are slight grooves, made of perhaps darker wood or stained darker. The head is smaller than the other quarrels, but three small holes puncture it.

id_details.name: a blackened bolt
special_abilities: It is efficient against Dwarves and Elves.

a blackened bolt.name: a blackened bolt

an elven shortbow.examine: This bow has been carefully crafted out of a single solid piece of wood. The surface of the wood is perfectly smooth, but has been neither stained nor painted, its only ornament the fine lines of the growth rings. Slightly over three feet long, this elegant weapon bears a silvery bowstring.
an elven shortbow.name: an elven shortbow

a twisted iron key.examine: According to the small, flat dents and sharp corners in the blade, the key seems to be hammered and filed from a single piece of iron. The key has a strange twist at the end of the shaft, which leaves the blade upside down compared to the handle.
a twisted iron key.name: a twisted iron key

a silvery key.examine: Finely wrought and with delicate engravings, this key seems to signify great status. However, ages of disuse have formed a blackish layer over the entire key, and any flesh it touches quickly becomes numb.
a silvery key.name: a silvery key

an old iron key.examine: The workmanship is strange, heralding back from the northern realms. It has been blackened by the centuries, yet it has not rusted in the least. Strangely, it is very cold to the touch.
an old iron key.name: an old iron key

a rusted key.examine: The key is four inches long and is totally rusted.
a rusted key.name: a rusted key

a black and silver key.examine: This key is made of black metal. Silver inlays form small lines from the handle all the way to the blade where they split and follow the edges.
a black and silver key.name: a black and silver key

a large Zaugurz axe.examine: This axe was forged from very dark iron. The blade produces a rough impression and is covered with slight dents, deep scratches, old blood, and the occasional spot of rust. The edge is somewhat jagged and the only part of the weapon that is well-tended - and thus quite shiny and very, very sharp.
a large Zaugurz axe.name: a large Zaugurz axe

some red petals.examine: These petals are red and pink, and still hold a potent and beautiful scent.
some red petals.name: some red petals

a metal breastplate.examine: Plates of thin, steel-like metal are bent and mended to resemble the shape of a torso. It exists out of two pieces, a front and a back, that can be attached to each other by leather bands. Metal buckles are pinched to the neck, the shoulders and the lower belly, allowing attachment for other pieces of metal armour.
a metal breastplate.name: a metal breastplate

a pair of rigid leather boots.examine: These calf-high boots are made from thick, inflexible leather. They offer superior protection at the expense of some comfort.

id_details.name: a pair of rigid leather boots

a pair of rigid leather boots.name: a pair of rigid leather boots

a pair of soft leather trousers.examine: These trousers have been constructed from thin leather pieces joined together by a set of slightly thicker knee guards. They have also been lined with a soft delicate fur of dubious nature allowing the wearer scarce protection on a cold winter day, whilst be granted a great deal of flexibility.

id_details.name: a pair of soft leather trousers

a pair of soft leather trousers.name: a pair of soft leather trousers

a rigid leather breastplate.examine: This breastplate is made from thick, inflexible leather, meticulously crafted to provide maximum protection. Its rigid nature offers substantial defense, though it restricts the wearer's mobility.
a rigid leather breastplate.name: a rigid leather breastplate

a small piece of hard candy.examine: This round candy is white coloured, with bright red stripes encircling it. It has a minty smell.

id_details.name: a small piece of hard candy

a small piece of hard candy.name: a small piece of hard candy

a small biscuit of cram.examine: The crumbly biscuit is made of tightly pressed flour, which is kept together with a tiny bit of milk and honey. It is dry and nutricious, which makes it useful to carry on long journeys in the wilderness.
a small biscuit of cram.name: a small biscuit of cram

a pork-pie.examine: This pie is fully covered with dough, but exudes a distinct smell of pork. The crust of the pie is flaky and unsweetened. The meat of this pie is seasoned with salt and pepper, as well as other herbs and spices.
a pork-pie.name: a pork-pie

a blackberry tart.examine: You see a small golden-brown tart, sprinkled generously with cinnamon and filled with blackberry jam which is oozing from the cracks in its crust.
a blackberry tart.name: a blackberry tart

an apple tart.examine: This delicate pastry shell is filled to the top with a mixture of cut apples and other juicy ingredients.
an apple tart.name: an apple tart

a straw pallet.examine: A straw pallet lies here, looking very warm and inviting. It is about an inch thick, and is malleable enough to mould to the contours of your body quite well, providing some insulation against the cold.
a straw pallet.name: a straw pallet

a large wooden box.examine: The box has been expertly assembled, and the top hinges perfectly with the rest. The sides have been carven into a relief of a great feast, and the front has a decoration inlaid with great skill.
a large wooden box.name: a large wooden box

a silver goblet.examine: The outer surface of the silver goblet is polished to be perfectly smooth. It catches light, and disperses across its surface. The inside of the goblet is a slightly darker, yet still highly finished silver with a crimson hue.
a silver goblet.name: a silver goblet

a leather baldric.examine: This special type of harness is made entirely of leather except for the metal buckle that is used to adjust for the height of the wearer, and two metal rungs at each end of the baldric. The baldric is meant solely as a holder of long bladed weapons, such as two-handed swords rather than a protecter like a normal sheath. The baldric is worn on the back and uses the rungs as holders for the sword.
a leather baldric.name: a leather baldric

a wine glass.examine: This is your typical sized wine glass. The wine is deep red in colour and looks quite tasty. Its rich full aroma tempts your tastebuds. You should probably have a sip now. I'm sure many more will follow.
a wine glass.name: a wine glass

a sturdy weapon harness.examine: This harness is built to hold larger weapons than a normal harness. It is meant to be worn on the back and has several leather straps to adjust for height. There are metal rungs attached to the harness that are meant to further secure the weapon.
a sturdy weapon harness.name: a sturdy weapon harness

a weapon harness.examine: This combination of leather straps and bands is shaped to hold a larger weapon, like an axe. Some strings can be used to fasten this harness to a belt.
a weapon harness.name: a weapon harness

a ring.examine: You notice intricate runes woven onto a strangely light-weight ring.

id_details.name: a ring
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a ring.name: a ring

a sun-emblazoned cloakpin.examine: Measuring three inches in diameter, this bronze cloakpin bears the signet of Rohan - a fiery sun engraved upon the centerpiece. The pin has been cleverly crafted to securely fasten to almost any cloak.
a sun-emblazoned cloakpin.name: a sun-emblazoned cloakpin

a necklace of bones.examine: The necklace is made of the skeletal remains of various creatures. You recognise the teeth of a boar, the skull of a squirrel, and finger bones of a humanoid. Others look so alien to your eyes that you can't even imagine what creatures they come from. The bones are strung along a twisted rope apparently made from the inner organs of some unfortunate animal.
a necklace of bones.name: a necklace of bones

a shiny flute.examine: A long silver tube with several holes cut along its length.
a shiny flute.name: a shiny flute

a golden cup.examine: This cup of polished gold is embossed with the sigil of the House of Durin: a hammer surmounted by a crown with three stars.
a golden cup.name: a golden cup

a jewel-encrusted goblet.examine: The large cup is meant large enough to be held with two hands. It is fashioned from a bright silver alloy and set with lapis lazuli and sapphires arranged in a floral motif.
a jewel-encrusted goblet.name: a jewel-encrusted goblet

a small jewel-box.examine: This beautiful little box is crafted from solid cherry wood, rich in colour with a smooth finish. Tiny white gemstones line the top of the box just below the lid, while slightly larger dark green stones border the base. Upon the lid, set in the very centre, lies a dark-blue sapphire, sparking with delight.
a small jewel-box.name: a small jewel-box

a belt of pearls and crystals.examine: This elegant belt was probably never meant to be worn in battle, although it is far from fragile. It seems to be formed from a silver mesh to which somehow many lustrous pearls and amber crystals have been affixed.

id_details.name: a belt of pearls and crystals

a belt of pearls and crystals.name: a belt of pearls and crystals

a gold ring.examine: This fine golden ring glitters with a bright shine. It is engraved with many wonderful patterns. It is composed of three pure golden bands that encircle each other intertwining into a spiral.
a gold ring.name: a gold ring

a ring of silver.examine: Clean straight lines converge with curves in this striking sterling silver ring. Several fine icons are skilfully carved in the silver, creating a fascinating mixture of both sturdiness and beauty.
a ring of silver.name: a ring of silver

a silver wedding ring.examine: It's a plain silver wedding band.
a silver wedding ring.name: a silver wedding ring

an engagement ring.examine: A nice small ring with inscriptions inside.
an engagement ring.name: an engagement ring

a jade amulet.examine: The jade is carefully cut into the shape of the trunk of a tree not more than two inches high. A light and solid metal pierces through the jade, forming the necklace and the clasp. The crown is of thin silvery bands and its blue leaves of another metal, giving it a very beautiful and desirable impression.
a jade amulet.name: a jade amulet

a mallorn-leaf brooch.examine: Carefully crafted, this small and delicate golden brooch is shaped into the likeness of a mallorn leaf. The brooch is exquisitely detailed, giving the illusion of a just fallen spring leaf, glittering in golden splendour.
a mallorn-leaf brooch.name: a mallorn-leaf brooch

a sword-shaped brooch.examine: This small, finely shaped brooch of silver is created in the form of a splendid sword, sharp and finely crafted. The intention of the small brooch is to keep a soldier's cloak fastened together, sheltering him from the wind and the rain. The sword itself is a fine broadsword, its blade having a thin inlaid golden thread, with a small rune carved in the hilt.
a sword-shaped brooch.name: a sword-shaped brooch

a silver cloakpin.examine: This is a smallish, round piece of solid metal, that shines like silver but is heavier and stronger. The oval-shaped pin has been cleverly crafted to securely fasten a cloak of almost any size.
a silver cloakpin.name: a silver cloakpin

a bronze medallion.examine: Suspended by a fine, yet strong, chain, it is reasonably heavy. The metal is tarnished, and dully reflects any light, adding to it a bronze hue. A strange design has been carved into the front of the medallion, and on the back you can decipher some writings.
a bronze medallion.name: a bronze medallion

a golden necklace.examine: This finely wrought necklace seems dwarven in origin. The delicate links have been forged to intertwine with small gems: rubies, emeralds, sapphires, and diamonds, which add to the lustre of this valuable piece of art and jewellery.
a golden necklace.name: a golden necklace

an emerald pendant.examine: Delicate links of gold form a light chain of about sixteen inches in length. At the midpoint of the chain is set a small, green emerald giving off a heavy aura.
an emerald pendant.name: an emerald pendant

a fine silver bracelet.examine: A gleaming bracelet made of the truest silver offers no sign of age or damage. Intricate patterns are finely inlaid onto its otherwise flawless surface. Never hot or cold to the touch, it seems to possess a quality that distinguishes it from other metals.
a fine silver bracelet.name: a fine silver bracelet

a silver bracer.examine: Even though it is made of silver, it seems constructed sturdily. The metal has been moulded into a flowing, almost wave-like shape, reminiscent of underwater currents or wind.
a silver bracer.name: a silver bracer

a small bracelet.examine: It is a very nice bracelet indeed, carefully crafted in an old traditional way.
a small bracelet.name: a small bracelet

an amethyst.examine: This small multi-faceted gem is a deep violet in colour. It is of an ideal cut and size to be fitted into rings or necklaces, whatever is needed by the gem smith.
an amethyst.name: an amethyst

a bar of gold.examine: This heavy bar has been carefully moulded, allowing it to be easily transported.
a bar of gold.name: a bar of gold
