an enamelled cloakpin.examine: This is an intricately shaped cloakpin made of strong steel. It has been decorated with black and white enamel, displaying a blazing S-rune against a dark background. Despite its lordly appearance, the pin seems equally fitting for the thick cloak of a traveller.
an enamelled cloakpin.name: an enamelled cloakpin

a beautiful diamond.examine: You see a tiny, sparkling diamond, reflecting the light from all around like a heavenly rainbow.
a beautiful diamond.name: a beautiful diamond

a lustrous green emerald.examine: This faceted gem bears a deep green hue, and in the light shines brightly. Each side of the gem is perfectly aligned with the others, making this gem one of quality and value.
a lustrous green emerald.name: a lustrous green emerald

a large garnet.examine: Deep sparkling maroon, this garnet is unusually large and beautiful. It is also likely to be quite valuable.

id_details.name: a large garnet
id_details.value: six lauren, two celeb, and fifty busc

a large garnet.name: a large garnet

a golden harp.examine: This delicate musical instrument represents the height of Dwarven manufacture. The strings are formed from filaments of pure silver, somehow stretched impossibly thin, and plucking them results in a chorus of beautiful sounds.
a golden harp.name: a golden harp

a nugget of gold.examine: Although heavy, and gold, this nugget contains many impurities. With some care and skill, however, it could be refined to pure gold.

id_details.name: a nugget of gold
id_details.value: one lauren, seven celeb, and fifty busc

a nugget of gold.name: a nugget of gold

a silver nugget.examine: This is a small, lumpy piece of metal. Its lustre and colour denote it as silver.
a silver nugget.name: a silver nugget

a red ruby.examine: This large ruby would fit nicely into your hand. It has been cut by some very skilled craftsman and its sides are perfectly symmetrical. The ruby glows in a mysterious red light; a closer look at the inside reveals a million small rays and sparks of red, which are reflected and broken more often than there are glowing sparks in a great fire.
a red ruby.name: a red ruby

a small, green stone.examine: This is a small, prismatic stone with a dark-green surface that dimly reflects the light. It is a beryl, an elven stone, one of the tokens that the elven folk use as signs. For those that know what to look for, it can be easily spotted, but its faint gleam will not be enough to catch the attention of the casual passer-by.

id_details.name: a small, green stone
special_abilities: When embedded, it can be used to create a temporary sanctum.

a small, green stone.name: a small, green stone

a lustrous opal.examine: Within this jewel, you can see a fire dancing as if it was living. Although the fire is coloured blue from the gem, it is obvious it is the light in the room, trapped within the opal's crystal.
a lustrous opal.name: a lustrous opal

a polished white quartzite.examine: This quartzite has a glossy finish to it, with most of the stone being a brilliant white. At a closer glance, there are slender bevels of dark grey within the centre of the stone that branch into finer traces of a lighter grey until the swirls of colour fade away.

id_details.name: a polished white quartzite
special_abilities: When embedded, it can be used to call upon the Valar.

a polished white quartzite.name: a polished white quartzite

a tiger's eye.examine: The gemstone is golden to red-brown with a silky lustre. It is chatoyant, as a few sharply defined bands of light show across the stone due to aligned inclusions.
a tiger's eye.name: a tiger's eye

an apple.examine: This large apple has a deep red colour with a bit of a shine and a short firm brown stem. It looks very tasty from the outside.
an apple.name: an apple

some juicy grapes.examine: These large purple grapes look quite tasty. Saving them for later would be a bad idea, since they are quite fresh now. You would not want them to lose any of their fantastic flavour. You should definitely sit down and have a snack.
some juicy grapes.name: some juicy grapes

a torch.examine: Tapered on one side to better fit your grip, this large wooden torch is specially designed to burn for hours on the fuel applied on the end of it.
a torch.name: a torch

a large barrel.examine: This large barrel is constructed of carefully-fitted wood bound together with iron hoops.
a large barrel.name: a large barrel

a stout barrel.examine: Assembled from thick wooden planks and held together by two strong iron hoops, this barrel has a scent of beer floating around it.
a stout barrel.name: a stout barrel

an oak barrel.examine: The wood of the barrel is coarse and aged. Three hoops of iron, one in the middle and one placed around each top and bottom hold it together.
an oak barrel.name: an oak barrel

a small barrel.examine: This miniature barrel is made of many straight pieces of wood which are wrapped around the middle with two metal bands. A solid wooden lid is tightly secured over the top.
a small barrel.name: a small barrel

a pint.examine: This is a large, frosty mug. From one side sprouts a sturdy handle.
a pint.name: a pint

a big bottle.examine: The bottle itself is plain, just an ordinary brown container. From inside the bottle, whether empty or full, comes the aroma of a stout fermented beverage. The tales of Dwarven ale say that it is a strong brew, and from the smell you can only agree.
a big bottle.name: a big bottle

a dark bottle.examine: Made from dark-brown clay, this ceramic piece is quite heavy for a bottle. Its base is large and wide and gets thinner towards the neck. The bottle is kept sealed by a large cork.
a dark bottle.name: a dark bottle

a fine bottle.examine: A fine layer of dust coats this bottle, and the label proclaims it is of distinctive vintage, aged handsomely.
a fine bottle.name: a fine bottle

a firebreather.examine: It is an old green bottle.
a firebreather.name: a firebreather

a flagon.examine: The flagon is made of a clear glass. Rainbows play in it as it catches light.
a flagon.name: a flagon

an aged silver flask.examine: This small rectangular container made of refined silver, has corners carefully rounded so it may be worn on a belt without snagging cloth or skin. A small silver cap made to cover the carefully etched spout is attached by a thin silver rope chain.
an aged silver flask.name: an aged silver flask

a large glass jug.examine: This is a large jug made of clear glass, with a handle near the neck that allows it to be easily carried.
a large glass jug.name: a large glass jug

a beer mug.examine: It is a mug of fine porcelain, with a golden lid.
a beer mug.name: a beer mug

a dented pail.examine: This cylindrical container is mainly used to hold liquids. It can be carried about by its handle and is made of poor metal. Its many dents imply it has been handled carelessly in the past.
a dented pail.name: a dented pail

a simple chest.examine: It is a small, simple chest made out of wood.
a simple chest.name: a simple chest

an evergreen shrub.examine: This shrub is around three feet high, and is clearly an evergreen. On each of the branches, which cover a significant area around the base of the shrub, there grow fragrant leaves. Each leaf is approximately two inches long and oval. They are velvety, with a grey-green colour, and grow off of long stalks.
an evergreen shrub.name: an evergreen shrub

a skeleton.examine: These bleached bones, covered in all sorts of dirt, used to belong to some humanoid. All flesh has withered away from the bones quite some time ago, and they are now beginning to crumble.
a skeleton.name: a skeleton

a leather satchel.examine: This old and beaten satchel seems able to hold a good amount with ease. It is equipped with a leather strap which allows you to wear it over your shoulder.
a leather satchel.name: a leather satchel

a large sack.examine: This coarsely stitched sack of sturdy miscellaneous fabric patches can be slung over a shoulder for the hauling of daily goods. Its generous size enables the user to tie it shut at the opening with the excess material.
a large sack.name: a large sack

a crude-looking bag.examine: The bag is full of crude stone and metal tools to cut and grind herbs and other ingredients, mix them and distil their juices. The smell of the rotting leftovers from the previous brew still hangs in the air around the bag.
a crude-looking bag.name: a crude-looking bag

a moneybag.examine: Comprised almost entirely of leather, this small sack can be used to safely store a large amount of coins out of the reach of others. A single leather tie around the top of the bag allows for easy and secure closing.
a moneybag.name: a moneybag

a leather saddle.examine: The saddle is made of a dark brown leather, with two adjustable stirrups and a wide cinch which fastens with a simple buckle.

id_details.name: a leather saddle
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a leather saddle.name: a leather saddle

a small box.examine: Made from several narrow pieces of wood, this small box is a handy container for little items. The box has a lid that can be closed firmly to protect stored articles.
a small box.name: a small box

a soft pelt.examine: It is very soft to touch and the hair seems to shimmer in a light brown. The fur is relatively small and darker streaks run along its outer edges.
a soft pelt.name: a soft pelt

a bale of hay.examine: A large bundle of ripe hay, harvested and tied up into a practical bale. Spanning about two times two feet and about a foot high, the dried bale is a considerable mass of food for livestock, ready to be stored for harsher times.
a bale of hay.name: a bale of hay

a bowl of meat ragout.examine: The contents of the bowl have a very tender appearance although it does not look like meat of superior quality if you eye it critically. Instead the cook must have found some way to soften the meat up during the cooking process. Should one try to catch its smell the suspicion which arises from fine stains on the meat would quickly turn into certainty as the smell has an unmistakable touch: this ragout must have been cooked for quite a while in beer. Surely this would make a great gift when visiting a dwarf, but it also will impress most other people with its taste.
a bowl of meat ragout.name: a bowl of meat ragout

a large pumpkin.examine: This is a huge orange pumpkin, covered with vertical insets. The remains of crushed, rotten leaves stick onto its wide bottom and its staggering size is sure to draw attention to it.
a large pumpkin.name: a large pumpkin

a portion of creamy pumpkin soup.examine: The soup is made from a smashed pumpkin which seems to have been carefully cleared of all pips. Here and there are a few tiny pieces of pumpkin swimming around in the soup, but most of it is homogenously creamy. It has a golden-yellow colour, indicating that the pumpkin used for it was very ripe, and the smell arising from it confirms this impression. Although this meal is not among the most difficult to create, it looks and smells flavoursome.

id_details.name: a portion of creamy pumpkin soup

a portion of creamy pumpkin soup.name: a portion of creamy pumpkin soup

a cooking book.examine: This appears to be a compilation of recipes. The writing is very familiar, making it appear more of a personal collection than a professional book. Many of the recipes have become illegible due to various reasons, such as water stains, ink smudges and some being coated by dried bits of food. One page near the end has been ripped out.
a cooking book.name: a cooking book

an inscribed wooden box.examine: This beautiful little box is crafted from solid cherry wood, rich in colour with a smooth finish. Tiny white gemstones line the top of the box just below the lid, while slightly larger dark green stones border the base. Upon the lid, set in the very centre, lies a dark-blue sapphire, sparking with delight. The box is open.
an inscribed wooden box.name: an inscribed wooden box

a Dwarven beard-comb.examine: This comb is made of carved animal horn, and the handle is covered in gold. Numerous runes have been engraved into the golden handle indicating this comb was crafted in the Iron Hills, where combs like these are greatly prized. Often, Dwarven beard-combs are inlaid with gems and bear seals of the house of the owner; prized family heirlooms handed down from father to son over many generations.
a Dwarven beard-comb.name: a Dwarven beard-comb

a pair of orkish war-drums.examine: This pair of drums is crudely fashioned with mismatched pieces of wood. Skin from a humanoid, still reeking of dead flesh, has been stretched across them. The drums make a hollow noise of terrible pitch, which resounds effectively enough that it can be heard for miles around.
a pair of orkish war-drums.name: a pair of orkish war-drums

a hunting horn.examine: A medium sized horn has been hollowed out and fashioned to emit sound when blown at its tip. The horn has been shod in metal to prevent it from breaking and a strap has been attached at both ends.
a hunting horn.name: a hunting horn

a lute.examine: The lute is perhaps three feet long, with a long, flat neck comprising of the most of the length. The bottom is a hemisphere, with the lute-strings attached to the flat side, and a hole beneath the strings. Several tuning keys are on the head.
a lute.name: a lute

a large biscuit.examine: This biscuit is bigger than a usual one. The baking has given the biscuit its brown colour and it will remain edible for many days and may replace a frugal meal.
a large biscuit.name: a large biscuit

a loaf of bread.examine: This large loaf of white bread has a thick brown crust and smells faintly of flour.
a loaf of bread.name: a loaf of bread

a seed-cake.examine: A small cake which is seasoned with different seeds, it smells delightful and is light and fluffy in texture.
a seed-cake.name: a seed-cake

a belt pouch.examine: Soft deer leather and suede make the little sack comfortably light and simple to wear. Small loops on the back are designed to thread onto most belts with ease. A little flap closure protects the contents adequately, when secured.
a belt pouch.name: a belt pouch

a plain blouse.examine: The blouse is made from linen cloth and looks quite ordinary. Upon closer inspection, a few simple decorations along the sleeves can be spotted.
a plain blouse.name: a plain blouse

a soft plain dress.examine: This dress is stitched from cotton and has been patched with several pieces of linen. It looks like the belongings of a commoner or peasant.
a soft plain dress.name: a soft plain dress

a goat skin jacket.examine: A brown and white goat gave her skin for this jacket. The seams and design of the jacket are crude and purely functional. This garment was made for cold nights out in the wilderness.
a goat skin jacket.name: a goat skin jacket

a black robe.examine: These are simple robes, made for everyday wear by those who favour this kind of apparel. The fabric of the robes is a rough and lacking in any patterns to distinguish, while the appearance of loose threads and small wear patterns to the cloth suggests that the robe has been washed many a time.
a black robe.name: a black robe

a plain silk cap.examine: The only protection this cap offers is against a chilly morning breeze. It is made of many coloured silk pieces. The rich silk shimmers slightly and two thin strings can be used to secure the cap on the head.
a plain silk cap.name: a plain silk cap

a plain hat.examine: This large hat has a wide brim that slopes downward in the front and curves upward in the back. Simple but sturdy, it was stitched together from rough pieces of leather, with a cloth hat band encircling the junction between crown and brim.
a plain hat.name: a plain hat

a jester's cap.examine: Made of fine velvet and cotton, this cap boasts bright and cheerful colours. From its top, several long, tube-like strands of cloth dangle, and upon each a single bell has been fastened. Called the liripipe in some cultures, this is surely only for jesters and fools.
a jester's cap.name: a jester's cap

a sacred cloak.examine: This delicate white cloak was woven by the Noldor craftsmen of old. Thinner than parchment, the cloak almost seems to resonate with a strange glory. The spirit of the ancient Noldor can almost be felt deep within the warm fabric.
a sacred cloak.name: a sacred cloak

a plain leather belt.examine: You see a fairly long piece of cured leather, with an iron buckle attached to one end.
a plain leather belt.name: a plain leather belt

a plain silken sash.examine: Long and sleek, this piece of silk is shiny and smooth to the touch.
a plain silken sash.name: a plain silken sash

a silver-tipped arrow.examine: The arrow is laced with a mithril lining, but more noticeable is its bright shining silver tip that has a glowing hue about it.

id_details.name: a silver-tipped arrow
id_details.value: one lauren, twelve celeb, and fifty busc

a silver-tipped arrow.name: a silver-tipped arrow

an orange bracket fungus.examine: This large bracket fungus has grown horizontally from the piece of decaying wood it has been feeding upon. Its round disc-like body is eight inches in diameter and is painted a flourescent orange colour in the centre. This vivid colour fades with the numerous concentric rings that show the seasons of its growth and at its rim the fungus has a pallid yellow hue.
an orange bracket fungus.name: an orange bracket fungus

a hemlock plant.examine: It is a man-sized plant with very finely dissected leaves and large umbels of small, white flowers. Flowers and leaves are borne on a sturdy stem, and the top of the root is visible at ground level.
a hemlock plant.name: a hemlock plant

a swamp iris.examine: It is a beautiful plant, with a long, slender stem, sword-shaped leaves and a small number of big, bright yellow flowers. It sprouts from a heavy rhizome.
a swamp iris.name: a swamp iris

some pipe-weed.examine: The dried and crumbled pieces of Halfling's Leaf are very small and have a light to dark brown colour, some of them nearly black. The weed does seem to smell only lightly, yet if it is crushed, the scent becomes strong and aromatic.
some pipe-weed.name: some pipe-weed

a long, scented, brown bean.examine: It is long, with many bumps. It smells distinctly like vanilla.
a long, scented, brown bean.name: a long, scented, brown bean

a bag of cinnamon.examine: Looking into this waxed paper bag, you see a small amount of a reddish-brown powder. It has a fine texture and is pungent in odour.
a bag of cinnamon.name: a bag of cinnamon

a purple flower with a fluffy red centre.examine: A daisy-like flower raises atop a dark green plant with stiff, bristly hairs and lance-shaped leaves. It has long pale to deep purple spreading rays, drooping around a prominent fluffy red centre. The whole plant emits a faint, aromatic scent.

id_details.name: a purple flower with a fluffy red centre

a purple flower with a fluffy red centre.name: a purple flower with a fluffy red centre

a bright white flower.examine: This delicate flower is less than an inch across with seven very bright white petals surrounding a cluster of tiny yellow stamens.
a bright white flower.name: a bright white flower

a cluster of purplish-pink flowers.examine: It is a cluster of purplish-pink flowers that are shaped like large grapes.
a cluster of purplish-pink flowers.name: a cluster of purplish-pink flowers

a short flower, with a purple bloom.examine: The flower is under ten inches tall, with a wide-petaled purple bloom. The leaves, growing at its base, are wide and near three inches long, and several large bulbs grow off of slender stalks.

id_details.name: a short flower, with a purple bloom

a short flower, with a purple bloom.name: a short flower, with a purple bloom

a cluster of bright orange flowers.examine: Half a dozen bright orange flowers with yellow centres cling to the end of a single long green stem covered in short, stiff hairs.

id_details.name: a cluster of bright orange flowers

a cluster of bright orange flowers.name: a cluster of bright orange flowers

a handful of fragile flowers.examine: They are small and white, with a yellow stamen. From them comes a very heavy and sweet smell.
a handful of fragile flowers.name: a handful of fragile flowers

a many-branched stem of bright yellow fl.examine: A single long stem branches out into several tips, each one of which ends in a bright yellow flower. The stem is over two feet long, but each flower is less than half an inch across.

id_details.name: a many-branched stem of bright yellow flowers

a many-branched stem of bright yellow fl.name: a many-branched stem of bright yellow flowers

some orange-red flowers.examine: These brightly coloured flowers look like crinkled sheer silk. The orange- red petals have opened out until the blossom is almost flat, exposing the darker, almost black blotches which can be seen toward the base of each.
some orange-red flowers.name: some orange-red flowers

a tall yellow iris.examine: The remaining stem of this flower is about a foot long, much shorter than the orginal length indicated by the size of the sparkling yellow head. The flower is beautifully balanced, symmetrically displaying its golden petals.
a tall yellow iris.name: a tall yellow iris

a bundle of fresh-scented leaves.examine: A slightly sharp, very fresh scent floats up, especially when the leaves are bruised. Dark green, slender, and tapering to a point, they are also slightly wrinkled.
a bundle of fresh-scented leaves.name: a bundle of fresh-scented leaves

several splayed leaves.examine: The coriander leaves differ in shape. Some are broadly lobed, others slender and feathery. The small berries smell a bit of anise.
several splayed leaves.name: several splayed leaves

a water lily.examine: It is actually just the flower of the plant, the stem and roots being hidden underwater, and the leaves being not attractive. It has soft, delicate whitish-pink petals with long stamens that shed a shining gold pollen. The flower also has a sweet perfume which makes you feel dizzy.
a water lily.name: a water lily

a stinging nettle.examine: The bright green inviting colour of this nettle bush belies its true nature. Its pointed deeply toothed leaves and narrow three-span tall stems are covered with long stinging hairs, as well as short bristly ones. Nettles feel most at home in wet, wooded areas, but they are mostly known for the sting of their hairs and bristles, their rumoured medicinal uses - their only redeeming quality.
a stinging nettle.name: a stinging nettle

a violet orchid.examine: A delicate flower sits here, looking as if it could fall apart if touched yet surviving the occasional strong gust of wind. The petals are a deep violet in the centre, surrounded by white borders. The fragrance of the orchid is light and ephemeral.
a violet orchid.name: a violet orchid

a sack of pepper.examine: This sack smells heavily of spices. It is made of linen and contains a large amount of slightly crushed black peppercorns. Examining it this closely makes your nose itch.
a sack of pepper.name: a sack of pepper

some white petals.examine: The petals are white, and slightly yellow. They seem to have been broken from larger petals. A faint and pleasant scent still surrounds them.
some white petals.name: some white petals

a sticky mass of stems, leaves and sap.examine: This mass of vegetal material has been obtained by crushing and mixing all the parts of a plant. It is wet and sticky and there can easily some stems and leaves be discerned.

id_details.name: a sticky mass of stems, leaves and sap

a sticky mass of stems, leaves and sap.name: a sticky mass of stems, leaves and sap

a slender flowering plant.examine: The stem is about three feet tall, and is covered with fine hairs. Its lance- shaped leaves are about six inches long, growing in opposing pairs, and one of these is broken, exuding some pale sap. A cluster of tiny, pale pink flowers tops the stalk of this upright plant.
a slender flowering plant.name: a slender flowering plant

some bluish-white petals.examine: The petals are white, with a slight darkening to blue at one end. A very subtle scent is associated with them.
some bluish-white petals.name: some bluish-white petals

a slender plant.examine: This plant is under a yard tall, and reasonably slender. At its base grow opposing pairs of leaves, and up long stalks bulbous white flowers sprout. The bases of the petals are slightly bluish.
a slender plant.name: a slender plant

some grey petals.examine: They are grey-blue, lightening to pink at the centre of one end.
some grey petals.name: some grey petals

a tall, grey-green plant.examine: It grows to the height of a man's chest, with pairs of opposing, serrated leaves. The flowers are grey-blue, fading to a pink near the stem.
a tall, grey-green plant.name: a tall, grey-green plant

several needlelike leaves.examine: These leaves are very slender and have retained their colour even though they have been picked. They give off a faint scent of rosemary.
several needlelike leaves.name: several needlelike leaves

a woody, many-stemmed plant.examine: Its pine-scented evergreen branches reach nearly three feet. They are covered in needlelike leaves, and are dotted with small, pale blue flowers. The stems cascade about the ground.
a woody, many-stemmed plant.name: a woody, many-stemmed plant

a woody, stemmed plant.examine: Its branches bear short and thin leaves, of which there are plenty. Some branches hang low near the ground, and from all of the leaves an appetizing aroma comes.
a woody, stemmed plant.name: a woody, stemmed plant

some dark-green moss.examine: This moss is much darker than most varieties, appearing nearly black in some places. It has an odd, almost oily sheen that seems to both absorb and reflect light simultaneously.
some dark-green moss.name: some dark-green moss

some grey-brown powder.examine: The grey-brown cardamom powder emits a strong flavor. Only small amounts of it are needed to spice up dishes. A few darker dots, remains of the seeds, can be spotted in the fine powder.
some grey-brown powder.name: some grey-brown powder

some pungent red powder.examine: This is a small pile of a very fine powder. It emits a distinctive, pungent frangrance. The powder is dark red, almost brown in colour.
some pungent red powder.name: some pungent red powder

a long hollow stem.examine: This is a long, brown-coloured reed between four and five feet long. The stem is about three-quarters of an inch thick at the bottom and tapers slightly towards the top end. The inside of the reed is hollow and has a feathery appearance, while the walls are spongy, but seem to be quite strong.
a long hollow stem.name: a long hollow stem

a foul-smelling root.examine: About the shape and size of a carrot, this pale rhizome, with crinkled flesh also bears numerous tiny rootlets. But what is most distinctive about it is its strong smell, which could easily earn it a name such as phew plant.
a foul-smelling root.name: a foul-smelling root

a chunk of salt.examine: It is composed of coarse granules of a translucent white substance. You gather that it is salt, as it has a distinct odour and feel. Perhaps its origin is Cardolan, a region south of the Shire that is known for its salt exporting.
a chunk of salt.name: a chunk of salt

a many-branched shrub.examine: This shrub is more bush-like, with no central stalk. The leaves on each stem are opposing, and stalkless. Overall, this shrub is under a foot in height, but spreads out to almost a foot in diameter.
a many-branched shrub.name: a many-branched shrub

a small vine sprig.examine: The mistletoe is an attractive plant with small waxy berries and light green fleshy leaves along its vine.
a small vine sprig.name: a small vine sprig

a tough green weed.examine: It is small, but contains a thick stem. On its leaves are small burrs which stick to clothing and fur. At the top is a small flower with five yellow petals.
a tough green weed.name: a tough green weed

a small plant, with long leaves.examine: It is a small plant with long, arrow-shaped leaves. It has a hairy stem with a few flowers near its top.

id_details.name: a small plant, with long leaves

a small plant, with long leaves.name: a small plant, with long leaves

a thin, hairy plant.examine: Its stem is square and purplish, with fine hair. Sporadically another stem sprouts from the main one, or a clump of small, oval leaves and small lavender flowers grows from the end of a stem.
a thin, hairy plant.name: a thin, hairy plant

a ticket for a trained horse.examine: This is a brownish stable ticket. Across the back of it, someone has written "a trained horse with a leather saddle".

id_details.name: a ticket for a trained horse

a ticket for a trained horse.name: a ticket for a trained horse

a ticket for a warhorse.examine: This is a brownish stable ticket. Across the back of it, someone has written "a warhorse Naurroch with a leather saddle".
a ticket for a warhorse.name: a ticket for a warhorse

a ticket for a cat.examine: This is a brownish stable ticket. Across the back of it, someone has written "a cat Ashcat".
a ticket for a cat.name: a ticket for a cat

a ticket for a pack horse.examine: This is a brownish stable ticket. Across the back of it, someone has written "a pack horse with a leather saddle".

id_details.name: a ticket for a pack horse

a ticket for a pack horse.name: a ticket for a pack horse

a ticket for a horse of the Rohirrim.examine: This is a brownish stable ticket. Across the back of it, someone has written "a horse of the Rohirrim with a leather saddle".

id_details.name: a ticket for a horse of the Rohirrim

a ticket for a horse of the Rohirrim.name: a ticket for a horse of the Rohirrim

several cloves.examine: Small, brown, wrinkled spheres, they give off a strong mint-like smell. These exotic spices could not have been grown from around here.
several cloves.name: several cloves

a man-like root.examine: The shape of this root is rather odd. One thick root stem sprouts several smaller stringy roots which form what could be the limbs of a man.
a man-like root.name: a man-like root

a cluster of hard, round, black berries.examine: They are round, yet somewhat irregular. They are scaly, aromatic, and approximately an eighth of an inch in radius.

id_details.name: a cluster of hard, round, black berries

a cluster of hard, round, black berries.name: a cluster of hard, round, black berries

some sweet-smelling dried mauve petals.examine: These petals have been removed from the plant and have carefully been dried. Their colour is pink-lilac and they diffuse a strong, distinctive scent.
some sweet-smelling dried mauve petals.name: some sweet-smelling dried mauve petals

a handful of clover.examine: Growing in clusters covering the ground, these short clover plants take root in the upper layer of soil and spread along the ground rather than growing both upward or further downward into the soil. Between six and eight inches in height, each stem has leaves that consist of three to six leaflets. When in season, these small yet hearty plants sport clusters of tiny flowers in white, yellow and a variety of red shades.
a handful of clover.name: a handful of clover

a handful of narrow leaves.examine: They are each about an inch long, and of roughly uniform width. At each end, the leaf rounds to a point. A heavy, sweet scent vaguely reminiscent of liquorice comes from the leaves.
a handful of narrow leaves.name: a handful of narrow leaves

a pinch of pale-green, crushed leaves.examine: The leaves are pale, but in places are darker. Their aroma is distinctive and unmistakable, that of marjoram.

id_details.name: a pinch of pale-green, crushed leaves

a pinch of pale-green, crushed leaves.name: a pinch of pale-green, crushed leaves

some scented crushed leaves.examine: These moist, crushed leaves give off a distinct aroma of thyme.
some scented crushed leaves.name: some scented crushed leaves

some grey-green leaves.examine: These oval, grey-green leaves emanate a fragrance that soothes your lungs.
some grey-green leaves.name: some grey-green leaves

a sable pouch.examine: Made of simple leather, this pouch is supported by bluish-green metal bands coiling up from the base to its lip. Studded between these mildly hued bands, black faceted jewels reflect off the glowing metal and sparkle with an unmarred lustre.

id_details.name: a sable pouch
special_abilities: It is efficient against fire and cold.

a sable pouch.name: a sable pouch

a faintly glowing stone.examine: The thin necklace is wrought from finest silver chain, with a glowing, blue stone hanging from it.
a faintly glowing stone.name: a faintly glowing stone

a bowl of colourful mushroom soup.examine: Inside the bowl is a liquid which reflects the light in all colours of the rainbow. The colours seem to shimmer and shift whenever the soup is viewed from different angles, and sometimes even when viewed from the same angle! In the soup are a few sliced, pale-brown mushrooms swimming around, glowing faintly and creating swirls of colours.

id_details.name: a bowl of colourful mushroom soup

a bowl of colourful mushroom soup.name: a bowl of colourful mushroom soup

a lembas wafer.examine: The thin wafer doesn't look very filling, but it smells fresh and slightly sweet. It is wrapped in a silvery leaf of rare beauty.
a lembas wafer.name: a lembas wafer

a quill pen.examine: Made from the tail feather of a bird of flight, this pen is suitable for writing notes or messages.
a quill pen.name: a quill pen

a fishing rod.examine: This is a long rod, with a hooked string at one end. Used to catch fish in water, it will allow the holder to 'fish'.
a fishing rod.name: a fishing rod

a sturdy rope.examine: This is a 50 foot rope made of woven fibres. It looks like it can support a lot of weight and can be easily tied into knots.
a sturdy rope.name: a sturdy rope

a spoon.examine: It is made of a plain metal, but looks durable. No designs or engravings mark it in any way; it is simply an eating utensil, nothing more.
a spoon.name: a spoon

a walking stick.examine: A simple stick, with a curved handle. Useful for supporting anyone who may be unsteady on their feet.
a walking stick.name: a walking stick

some alchemical supplies.examine: This is a very valuable set of equipment used by the practitioners of alchemy and herb lore. A variety of alembics, crucibles and glassware beakers make this quite versatile.
some alchemical supplies.name: some alchemical supplies

a pair of tongs.examine: This tool is used for holding items too hot to handle properly.
a pair of tongs.name: a pair of tongs

a wooden pipe.examine: This pipe is carefully crafted to hold a good quantity of pipe-weed. It has a rather large bowl and the stem is over seven inches in length. The stem of the pipe is slanted and curved. Both the stem and the bowl seem to have been taken from the same piece of wood and fit perfectly together.
a wooden pipe.name: a wooden pipe

some steamed crabs.examine: These steamed crabs and the vegetables served with them look delicious.
some steamed crabs.name: some steamed crabs

a plate of roast duck.examine: An entire roast duck is here waiting to be eaten. The plate is also filled up with many types of vegetables. It smells and looks delicious. I hope you are hungry since this is a big meal.
a plate of roast duck.name: a plate of roast duck

some grilled swordfish.examine: This plate of spicy grilled swordfish, rice and vegetables looks very tasty. The smell is very aromatic. It appears that the fish has been seasoned quite well, but what is that seasoning? Well, stop thinking about it and eat your meal.
some grilled swordfish.name: some grilled swordfish

a pastry.examine: This light and fluffy pastry has been baked to a golden brown. It looks perfect to top with any number of jams or jellies or even eaten plain.
a pastry.name: a pastry

a softly glowing green cup.examine: The transparent cup is shaped like a half-closed lily resting on a large leaf. It is full of a liquid that has the scent of fresh grass and pine-needles. The fragrant liquid is golden-green like sunlight filtered through the crowns of the trees of the Golden Wood. It is not clear whether the cup itself or the liquid in it is the source of the soft green glow emanating from the potion.

id_details.name: a softly glowing green cup
special_abilities: It increases mana regeneration by ten and mana by ten for two hours.
After that, it increases mana regeneration by five and mana by five for four hours.
After that, it decreases mana regeneration by three and mana by five for six hours.

a softly glowing green cup.name: a softly glowing green cup

a small metal flask.examine: The flask contains a thick, black liquid. It smells strongly of mildew and alcohol. On the back of the flask there is a clasp, making it possible to hang it from a belt.
a small metal flask.name: a small metal flask

a flask of miruvor.examine: Simple yet elegant in its shape, this flask is obviously of Noldorin make. Its contents cannot amount to more than a few mouthfuls: the draught beneath the silvery cork must be rare and precious, to be sipped on special occasions. The flask is almost full of miruvor.
a flask of miruvor.name: a flask of miruvor

a die.examine: This cube of ivory has black dots on each face. It is obviously meant to be held and thrown.
a die.name: a die

a star sapphire.examine: Cut in a cabochon, this deep blue gemstone displays a blue-white, six-rayed star in its middle. Unless kept in total darkness, the star seems to shine as bright as Helluin in a clear night.
a star sapphire.name: a star sapphire

an unfinished band of gold.examine: Construction of this golden ring seems to have begun long ago. The band is smooth and polished, forming an unending circle. Miniature gold vines with intricately engraved leaves weave around to form a small inset, the perfect resting place for a finely cut gem.
an unfinished band of gold.name: an unfinished band of gold

some long, slender green leaves.examine: They have a pungent scent that clears your head. The leaves themselves are a very dark green, about the length of a man's thumb, and no wider than a fingernail.
some long, slender green leaves.name: some long, slender green leaves

a stout oaken stick.examine: The stick is finely carved from an oak bough. Its upper end has a small knobby extension for a better grip, and its lower end is stumpy, fit to support its users steps. a stout oaken stick.name: a stout oaken stick

a fine elven pipe.examine: This light pipe is perfect for carrying in the pocket. Carved from a rich black wood embellished with leaves and trees made of fine silver and fitted with a pearl stem, this pipe is surely worthy of even the great Elf lords of Rivendell.
a fine elven pipe.name: a fine elven pipe

a small green bottle.examine: This small green bottle is simple, yet elegant in shape. A faint smell comes out of its stopper, sweet and slightly inebriating.

id_details.name: a small green bottle
special_abilities: It purges all other potion effects and cures flu, plague, amibia, and poison.
It decreases mana regeneration by ten and willpower by two for two hours.
After that, it decreases mana regeneration by five and willpower by one for four hours.

a small green bottle.name: a small green bottle

a water skin.examine: This is a piece of thin leather which has been shaped and sewn tightly so as to hold over a quart of water. It can be filled or drunk from using an opening which can be drawn shut and fastened with a lace.
a water skin.name: a water skin

a beer bottle.examine: This bottle is made of brown glass and can contain any fluid. It is kept closed by a dark yellow cork and its label is so dirty that it is impossible to read.

id_details.name: a beer bottle

a beer bottle.name: a beer bottle

a riding whip.examine: This whip comprises a long, slender leather cord attached to a thick, plaited leather handle.
a riding whip.name: a riding whip

a ceramic cup.examine: This cup is small and of simple construction. It is made from clay, glazed and fired to produce a fine but utilitarian container.

id_details.name: a ceramic cup

a lynx pelt.examine: This pelt is mostly grey fur, gradually darkening to black in the centre, although the fur from the legs and underbelly of the lynx is a sandy white. The pelt retains the cat's short, stubby tail. It feels soft and silky.
a lynx pelt.name: a lynx pelt

a weapon sheath.examine: This sheath is meant to carry swords or daggers, or other slim-bladed weapons. It is enlaid with metal, but has a leather outside which protects the blade from normal corrosion and weathering. It is meant to be girded to the belt or worn on the back of the user.
a weapon sheath.name: a weapon sheath

a bolt-case.examine: This case is a tube of stiff leather, sewn together along one edge. A hard plug at the bottom helps maintain its shape, and a soft leather strap allows it to be worn over the shoulder.
a bolt-case.name: a bolt-case

a war arrow.examine: This arrow is longer and wider than most, and made from a heavier wood. It seems designed to damage the opponent more.
a war arrow.name: a war arrow

a slingstone.examine: You see a small pellet of metal, very light but very deadly if it is thrown using a sling.
a slingstone.name: a slingstone

a round stone.examine: You see a very common little stone. The stone is grey, hard and round. It could certainly be used as missile with a sling.
a round stone.name: a round stone

a sling.examine: The strip of leather is extremely light and can be used to hurl small stones. To get more ammunition, just hold the sling and reveal stone.
a sling.name: a sling

a light crossbow.examine: A simple crossbow, fashioned of timber with an iron bow. It is loaded with a simple crank-lever keeping the weapon fast and light, although somewhat limited in its firing power. It is currently not loaded.
a light crossbow.name: a light crossbow

a yew longbow.examine: This marvellous piece of carpentry has been carefully carved from a single, dark-reddish branch of the yew tree, well-known amongst foresters for its incredible flexibility and pliancy. At each end of the seven foot long bow you see a sharp notch, to which a tough string has been tightened.

id_details.name: a yew longbow
id_details.value: nine lauren, eighteen celeb, and ninety busc

a yew longbow.name: a yew longbow

an embellished longbow.examine: This ancient-looking six-foot longbow has been embellished and ornamented with lines and glyphs of mithril and silver. The inlaid metals sparkle and shimmer in the light, especially under star- or moonlight. The bow appears to be more a work of art than a tool of war; however, when you draw the string, you realize the bow is quite lethal and capable of inflicting great damage.
an embellished longbow.name: an embellished longbow

a black horn shortbow.examine: This is a very strange looking bow made from two horns of some animal. Surprisingly, it is very strong.

id_details.name: a black horn shortbow
id_details.value: twenty-four lauren, sixteen celeb, and sixty busc

a black horn shortbow.name: a black horn shortbow

a plain scarf.examine: This scarf is approximately five feet in length and meant to protect the neck and chest from the cold. It is a good quality scarf and will last a long time without being worn out.
a plain scarf.name: a plain scarf

an embroidered blouse.examine: Sewn from a fine, white fabric, this thin, soft blouse is embroidered with silver-white threads.
an embroidered blouse.name: an embroidered blouse

a blood-encrusted breastplate.examine: The metal of the armour is coated with sticky flakes of dried blood, deliberately smeared over all exposed surfaces. Many sharp hooks and barbs have been attached to the armour as well, presumably for inflicting painful and bloody wounds when grappling with an unprotected opponent.
a blood-encrusted breastplate.name: a blood-encrusted breastplate

a fine, rigid leather breastplate.examine: This high-quality breastplate is crafted from the finest rigid leather, offering exceptional protection and a refined appearance. The craftsmanship ensures both durability and a slightly more comfortable fit compared to standard rigid leather.
a fine, rigid leather breastplate.name: a fine, rigid leather breastplate

a sturdy metal breastplate.examine: This iron breastplate shows some craftsmanship, although it is by no means perfect. It provides a good protection from enemy weapons to whomever wears it.
a sturdy metal breastplate.name: a sturdy metal breastplate

a sturdy, rigid leather breastplate.examine: This breastplate is constructed from exceptionally tough leather, designed to offer superior protection and durability. The reinforced structure ensures it can withstand significant impacts while providing reliable defense.
a sturdy, rigid leather breastplate.name: a sturdy, rigid leather breastplate

a fine plain dress.examine: This dress is woven together from fine cotton and has no flaws. It would fit a lady in good standing or nobility.
a fine plain dress.name: a fine plain dress

a fine chain mail hauberk.examine: Countless small, yet very hard rings form this armour. The rings are linked together and have been riveted shut, reducing the chance of being split open. A very complicated six-to-one pattern offers good protection while maintaining the freedom to move for the wearer.
a fine chain mail hauberk.name: a fine chain mail hauberk

a sturdy chain mail hauberk.examine: This hauberk is composed of small, interlinked iron rings. Roughly half of the rings are soldered solid at their ends while the other half was riveted. They are interwoven tightly in a sturdy four-to-one pattern which leaves only little space between the rings.
a sturdy chain mail hauberk.name: a sturdy chain mail hauberk

a fine, soft leather jerkin.examine: This tightly fitting jerkin is constructed from thick pieces of leather sewn together using strong brown twine. The suppleness of the leather, however, allows flexibility and comfort as well as protection.
a fine, soft leather jerkin.name: a fine, soft leather jerkin

a sturdy, soft leather jerkin.examine: This jerkin has been constructed using softened leather pieces sewn together using a form of brown twine. It is lined with a delicate soft fur providing the wearer with warmth and protection, whilst also allowing a great deal of flexibility.
a sturdy, soft leather jerkin.name: a sturdy, soft leather jerkin

a white chain mail jerkin.examine: The metal it is made from is somewhat strange. It is of a matte white colour and also does not seem to grow warm or cold to the touch. All in all, the jerkin is heavier than could be expected, yet seems only little encumbering.

id_details.name: a white chain mail jerkin
id_details.value: twenty-three lauren, one celeb, and fifty busc

a white chain mail jerkin.name: a white chain mail jerkin

an enruned robe.examine: The robe is made from a strange material, which keeps you neither too warm nor too cold. Along its borders and its cuffs, a spidery writing can be seen. Along the back and front strange runes are embroidered, crafted to help protect the wearer against hostile sorcery.
an enruned robe.name: an enruned robe

a black shirt.examine: A common shirt which is designed to be worn outside the pants. It has heavy stitches that will prevent it from getting torn easily and a laced V-neck that can be adjusted for warmth and comfort.
a black shirt.name: a black shirt

a chequered shirt.examine: It is an extra large, chequered shirt made from heavy cloth.
a chequered shirt.name: a chequered shirt

a guardsman's shirt.examine: This plain grey shirt is designed to hang loosely on the body.

a plain shirt.examine: A common shirt which is designed to be worn outside the pants. It has heavy stitches that will prevent it from getting torn easily and a laced V-neck that can be adjusted for warmth and comfort.
a plain shirt.name: a plain shirt

a russet shirt.examine: This is a red-brownish coloured shirt with some yellow lines on the front.
a russet shirt.name: a russet shirt

The lands of Cardolan are heavy in sheep populations, and the people make a living exporting the wool from them. Perhaps that is where the sweater came from.
a thick wool vest.name: a thick wool vest

a fine chain mail coif.examine: Even a quick examination reveals this coif is a very good piece of armour. The rings are very smooth and form a tight and perfect six-in-one pattern which offers good protection and does not hinder the free movement of the head.
a fine chain mail coif.name: a fine chain mail coif

an ancient metal helmet.examine: Made from a dull, almost blackened metal, and forged by dwarven hands in an era now long gone by, this helmet is a true masterpiece. The brim, crafted from some unknown metal, is inset with a sequence of jewels, ranging from sapphires at the edges, topazes in the middle, and opals closest to the hole where the centrepiece once rested. Judging by the size of the cavity, it must have once housed a great jewel indeed.

id_details.name: an ancient metal helmet

an ancient metal helmet.name: an ancient metal helmet

a tower shield.examine: It is made of an exceptionally heavy metal, easily capable of warding off the most fearsome blows. id_details.name: a tower shield
id_details.value: 137 lauren, six celeb, and fifty busc

a pale blue stone.examine: A pale blue stone that fits nicely in the palm of your hand. Upon closer examination, it seems to have an inner light, pale and only very faintly glowing. While you hold it, you can feel a strange sensation, as if it draws upon the forces of nature somehow.

id_details.name: a pale blue stone

a carved oak staff.examine: About six feet long, this staff was crafted from a perfect branch of oak by a master woodworker. Runes are carved on its sides, and its surface is smoothly polished. Truly this is a masterwork of carpentry.

a raccoon fur hat.examine: Black and white rings circle a long grey tail which hangs down from the back of a furry grey cap.

a blood-encrusted helm.examine: Spikes protrude from the helm at regular intervals. The helm itself is covered with dried, brown blood, and a fresher layer covers that.

a fine pair of metal vambraces.examine: These vambraces have been masterfully forged out of steel. The reinforced shoulders are connected to a durable metal cylinder to protect the upper arm. The smaller metal tubes for the forearms have strong hooks to securely attach gauntlets.

id_details.name: a fine pair of metal vambraces

a letter of recommendation.examine: To: The Secretary of Bree Dear cousin, How have you been? Nat and the girls keep on asking me the next time you can come over for a visit. a great helm.examine: This helm is reinforced with an additional layer of darker metal in the form of a cross which covers a large part of the sides and face. Two square slots for the eyes and some holes for breathing are surrounded by some simple, decorative runes.

a pair of cotton pants.examine: The pants are delicately made of cotton.

a large piece of raw venison.examine: This piece of meat has been butchered from the corpse of some big animal. A bit of blood still drips from it. Once cooked it could be the main course of a big meal.

a black fur with silvery streaks.examine: Even if it is marred by the signs of a prolonged fight, this thick, huge fur is still almost as beautiful as when it belonged to its fearsome owner. a cluster of soft pink flowers.examine: A group of soft pink flowers blossom amidst several tiny green leaves. Their extremely sweet fragrance lingers upon everything they touch.

an exquisite wine glass.examine: This has been made of the finest crystal, with intricate and beautiful engravings. It stands about eight inches tall, with the fragile stem broadening at one end to a stand, at the other to the glass itself.

the fine silvery morningstar.examine: Crafted by the Dwarves of Khazad-dum during the Second Age, this weapon of ancient times is surely a fine piece of workmanship. a glittering pendant.examine: Over a hundred small rings have been linked together form a chained necklace with a small hook clasp on one side, and a pendant on the other end. On examining the chain further, it appears to be quite sturdy despite its rather diminuitive size. The pendant is shaped like a teardrop and has room for a gem to be mounted.

id_details.name: a glittering pendant
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a glittering pendant.name: a glittering pendant

a white pair of metal vambraces.examine: These vambraces have been masterfully forged out of steel. The reinforced shoulders are connected to a durable metal cylinder to protect the upper arm. The elbow section is made out of concentric telescoping bands that are fitted together to allow free movement without leaving a gap. The smaller metal tubes for the forearms have strong hooks to securely attach gauntlets.

id_details.name: a white pair of metal vambraces

a white pair of metal vambraces.name: a white pair of metal vambraces

a white pair of metal greaves.examine: These greaves are forged out of durable, polished steel plates. They cover the entire leg except for the knees, where strong, interwoven chains attach to the upper and lower leg parts. Black leather laces at the back of the greaves enable them to be adjusted to the size of the leg. An engraved set of buckles at the top allows attachment to other pieces of armour.

id_details.name: a white pair of metal greaves
id_details.value: twelve lauren, one celeb, and eighty busc

a white pair of metal greaves.name: a white pair of metal greaves

a pink robe.examine: These are simple robes, made for everyday wear by those who favour this kind of apparel. The fabric of the robes is a rough and lacking in any patterns to distinguish, while the appearance of loose threads and small wear patterns to the cloth suggests that the robe has been washed many a time.
a pink robe.name: a pink robe
