a sack of flour.examine: You see a small sack of flour.
a sack of flour.name: a sack of flour

a crimson robe.examine: These are simple robes, made for everyday wear by those who favour this kind of apparel. The fabric of the robes is a rough and lacking in any patterns to distinguish, while the appearance of loose threads and small wear patterns to the cloth suggests that the robe has been washed many a time.
a crimson robe.name: a crimson robe

a black metal shield.examine: A large shield made from an unfamiliar black metal alloy. It is reinforced by a metal rim of deepest red colour. In the centre of the shield a hideous red eye stares out at you.
a black metal shield.name: a black metal shield

an iron, horse-shaped key.examine: This key, masterfully fashioned from robust iron, boasts an antique finish and a handle designed in the likeness of a horse's head. The horse's mane elegantly transitions into the shaft, adorned with delicately etched fine lines and elaborate patterns. The body of the key, crafted from sturdy, darkened iron, exudes a time-honoured, vintage appearance.
an iron, horse-shaped key.name: an iron, horse-shaped key

a tiny stone key.examine: This very small key is made from solid granite; multi-coloured, hard and resistant to any weather. Since the key is so tiny it also is pretty simple, the blade does not have any cut notches or milled grooves in it.
a tiny stone key.name: a tiny stone key

a huge black bear fur.examine: This is the fur of a great bear. For its enormous size and its extremely black colour, it must have belonged to one of the giant and ancient mountain bears, and specifically to the last one among them. There is no warg nor goblin in the Misty Mountains who has never shivered upon the mention of Beorn, the skin-changer.

id_details.name: a huge black bear fur
special_abilities: It is efficient against fire and cold.

a huge black bear fur.name: a huge black bear fur

a pitch-black robe.examine: The robe is as black as pitch, and woven throughout with a dark thread that seems to absorb any light that falls upon it. The robe's ends are slightly ragged, and although it is light in weight, the robe carries a noticeable heaviness with it, a corrupted weariness.

id_details.name: a pitch-black robe
special_abilities: It returns mana after a short period of time when casting certain spells.
This effect does not stack for multiple uses of the same spell, but can be active for several spells at the same time.

a pitch-black robe.name: a pitch-black robe

a leaf-embossed shield.examine: Impeccable craftmanship went into the creation of this shield. It is made of a peculiarly light but hard wood, secured within a moulded circle of silvery metal that has been meticulously engraved with delicate vines. The wood is a crosscut from a tree trunk with the telling growth rings visible. It looks fresh, as if it was recently cut from living tree. On the front, an emerald green, three-pronged leaf has been carved into the wood. A handle and straps on the back allow for a secure grip.
a leaf-embossed shield.name: a leaf-embossed shield

an icy ring.examine: The ring, barely visible beneath the layers of ice that cover it, is made of a silvery metal and elegantly engraved. While the details of the engraving are not distinguishable beneath the ice, it is still evident that the ring was crafted with utmost care. The ice consists of several layers all uniformly covering the ring, with the top layer forming a smooth sharp edge. It shows no sign of melting - indeed its cold seems to radiate from within with a deep brilliance of whiteness. Yet it does not shine, casting no light that illuminates the surroundings. The light, and the cold, seem only to hit your eyes.

id_details.name: an icy ring
id_details.value: eighty-nine lauren, nine celeb, and fifty busc
special_abilities: It has three hundred charges left.

an icy ring.name: an icy ring

a barbed thorny spear.examine: This spear is made from one long thorn, almost seven feet in length. A small section of the shaft has been cut away and wrapped in leather, making it possible to wield this otherwise awkward weapon. The barbs that cover the thorn look capable of tearing flesh at the slightest brush.
a barbed thorny spear.name: a barbed thorny spear

a pair of rigid leather gloves.examine: These gloves are crafted from tough, inflexible leather, designed to provide significant protection. The rigid material ensures durability, though at the cost of some dexterity.

id_details.name: a pair of rigid leather gloves

a pair of rigid leather gloves.name: a pair of rigid leather gloves

a metal wall shield.examine: Crafted with great skill this shield offers you good protection. Thick leather straps have been riveted on the inside to allow a sturdy grip to the handle of this huge shield.
a metal wall shield.name: a metal wall shield

a steel-shafted mattock.examine: The hilt of this three foot long weapon is delicately wrapped with leather for a fine grip, while a sharply chiselled steel spike forms the tip of a broad crushing surface on the reverse side. While it is possible to wield the weapon with only one hand, the hilt is long enough to allow grasping it with both.
a steel-shafted mattock.name: a steel-shafted mattock

an old metallic key.examine: Covered in cobwebs, this key seems to be very old indeed. The metal of the key has a blue hue to it, possibly made from the same stone of the Blue Mountains.
an old metallic key.name: an old metallic key

a simple metal key.examine: Made of a dull metal, it looks as if it could only open the least complicated of locks.
a simple metal key.name: a simple metal key

a rigid metal key.examine: The surface of the key is rough, with no sign of corrosion or any other type of damage. It is quite heavy, about five inches long with a large handle and small, sharp wards.
a rigid metal key.name: a rigid metal key

a stone.examine: You see a small grey stone sparkled with white spots. This stone seems to be very hard, maybe harder than iron. The whetstone is barely scratched and evidently has not been used much.
a stone.name: a stone

an ancient dagger.examine: So ravaged by the passage of time that it has become barely useable in combat, this ancient weapon, perhaps a relic of the First or Second Age, still retains some of its original elegance. The hilt is finely chiselled, and the blade - some thousand years ago - must have been extremely sharp.
an ancient dagger.name: an ancient dagger

a fine elven rope.examine: Skilfully woven from a silky, grey fibre, this rope is slender yet strong, and amazingly light.
a fine elven rope.name: a fine elven rope

a misty plant.examine: These tall coin-thick silvery pillars are usually found growing stiffly upright in swampy ground, the ancient guardians of springs and waterways. Their fine stalks are made of interwoven semi-translucent white threads that end with palm-wide stretches sticking out in all directions, each one of them crowned by a delicate sky-blue bloom. A trick of eye, a play of light reflecting off the threads, a strange distortion, makes for this plant's misty look, as if it was engulfed in its own cloak of fog, guarding it from those who want to look at it directly.
a misty plant.name: a misty plant

a massive dwarven waraxe.examine: This huge axe is several feet in length. The curved blade at the end gleams as if on its own accord, and strange runes lie embedded on the side. The shaft is made of smooth black metal, culminating in a handle made from tightly wound leather at the base.
a massive dwarven waraxe.name: a massive dwarven waraxe

a black-thorned wristband.examine: This wristband is made from a length of dry, thorn-covered vine. The vine is as thick as an arrow's shaft and as black as the sharp thorns that cover it. It is meant to be looped around a wrist several times and does not look either comfortable or particularly safe to wear. Long cracks cover the surface of the wristband, exposing unraveling bands of fiber.
a black-thorned wristband.name: a black-thorned wristband

a small, worn book.examine: Only about seven inches by four, this thick little, leather-bound book appears to be some sort of a diary or journal. Almost all of its yellowed pages have been utterly destroyed. Of those that remain the majority are so badly damaged as to be completely illegible. But a few fragile leaves, some of them whole, and others with but a fragment or the paper clinging to the binding, still bear text in a small, neat script that remains readable despite the deterioration of the pages.
a small, worn book.name: a small, worn book

an elegant white key.examine: The key, skilfully crafted from a white-speckled stone, reflects the precision of elvish artistry. Its surface, smooth to the touch, bears intricate carvings that dance along its edges. The slender notches, painstakingly chiselled, align flawlessly. Despite its petite size, the key exudes an undeniable sense of elegance and grace.
an elegant white key.name: an elegant white key

a burnished iron key.examine: This iron key has somehow been burnished, creating a surface that appears shinier than normal. It is average-sized, and has a loop on the handle that allows it to fit on a keyring.
a burnished iron key.name: a burnished iron key

an elven heirloom.examine: This heirloom is precious to the family that owns it, for it has been passed along from older members of the house to younger members for many generations. It resembles a green leaf with veins with silver. It seems to belong to a larger collection of items and as such does not seem to be valuable by itself.
an elven heirloom.name: an elven heirloom

a slender dagger.examine: This is an extremely sharp and slender dagger with a hilt made of silver.
a slender dagger.name: a slender dagger

a brown wool tunic.examine: Here is a comfortable tunic of thick wool, that covers from shoulders to knees. It is dyed in an uniform brown colour, and it is wide enough as to not hinder its wearer's movements, yet it still has a very warm look.
a brown wool tunic.name: a brown wool tunic

a small steel key.examine: The steel key is in good shape. The metal teeth are as crisp as when the key was first made.
a small steel key.name: a small steel key

a small copper key.examine: A simple key made of copper, it is very light and delicate. Patches of green can be seen where the key has begun to decay.
a small copper key.name: a small copper key

a dark broadsword.examine: The hilt of the sword is carved out of a single piece of shining black stone. Its blade is of a strange dark metal, which lacks lustre and seems to absorb all light that falls on it.
a dark broadsword.name: a dark broadsword

a grey arrow.examine: Made of grey wood and less than two feet long, this arrow has a triangular head of metal and slots in the end for the bow's string. The wood is smooth and light, making it a good choice for archers.

id_details.name: a grey arrow
id_details.value: one lauren, eleven celeb, and twenty busc

a grey arrow.name: a grey arrow

a glass flask.examine: The sticky brownish mixture in the flask is lumpy, with semi-solid chunks of what seems to be rotten fruit and some tough fibres, possibly pieces of plant stems, which haven't been completely mashed to paste. The mush oozes an oily reddish liquid with a nauseating smell, which seems to be a mixture of the smell of swamp with the smell of decaying corpses and a sharp unpleasant flowery aroma that makes your eyes water.
a glass flask.name: a glass flask

a supple pair of leather gloves.examine: These gloves are made of supple black leather, almost silky to the touch. Though thin, light, and malleable, they still seem very durable. Trefoil leaves, stitched in green thread, cover the fingers and the palm. On the back, a large, stately tree has been embroidered in green, brown, and gold.

id_details.name: a supple pair of leather gloves

a supple pair of leather gloves.name: a supple pair of leather gloves

a quiver.examine: This quiver has been carefully crafted from supple leather. It is moderately large, and could probably hold quite a number of arrows. A soft leather strap is attached and can be adjusted to allow you to wear this quiver over your shoulder or attached to a belt.
a quiver.name: a quiver

a relucent ring with a brilliantly clear.examine: The ring is round and perfectly shaped to fit around a finger. Only a small marking can be found on the inside of the ring, a signature of the silversmith that forged it. The top of the ring features a square, silver setting with room for a gem. The ring has been embedded with a corberyl.

id_details.name: a relucent ring with a brilliantly clear gem
id_details.value: 111 lauren, seventeen celeb, and fifty busc
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a relucent ring with a brilliantly clear.name: a relucent ring with a brilliantly clear gem

a pile of sunflower seeds.examine: Hundreds of seeds, shaped like miniature teardrops, are wrapped in hard shells marked with black-and-white lines. The exterior of the shell is slightly coarse, typically needing a small crack to reveal the treasure inside. Inside, a soft and creamy seed waits, offering a gentle hint of a nutty flavour.
a pile of sunflower seeds.name: a pile of sunflower seeds

a tall, radiant sunflower plant.examine: This majestic flower stands over six feet tall. It is crowned with bright yellow petals encircling a disc of brown seeds. The thick, coarse, and vertically ridged stem is blanketed in a prickly layer of hair. Along the stalk, rough leaves with heart-shaped, serrated edges sprout at alternating angles, giving it a tiered, elegant appearance.
a tall, radiant sunflower plant.name: a tall, radiant sunflower plant

an ornate, steel-shafted warhammer.examine: The hammer is heavy and solid to the touch, untouched by rust and time. The hammer-head is covered by engraved ornaments, tinted with a bluish metallic glow, and the shaft is made of bright, solid steel.
an ornate, steel-shafted warhammer.name: an ornate, steel-shafted warhammer

a long rope with a hook tied to the end.examine: A strong iron hook is attached to one end of a long coil of rope. Perhaps this might be used to help you climb, if thrown over something high above.

id_details.name: a long rope with a hook tied to the end

a long rope with a hook tied to the end.name: a long rope with a hook tied to the end

a small egg.examine: Even a casual glance reveals this is no hen's egg, since it is rounder and a bit smaller. The surface feels relatively rough and the colour varies from a light to a darker tone of brown.
a small egg.name: a small egg

a bowman's arm guard.examine: Crafted from supple, full-grain leather, this classic arm guard offers dependable protection and timeless style. Two sets of metal eyelets and a braided cord allow for a precise, comfortable fit, while the hand-stitched construction ensures years of dependable wear.
a bowman's arm guard.name: a bowman's arm guard

an engraved warhammer.examine: This warhammer is very heavy. The metal it is made from is dark and strange; the handle is inlaid with silver and gold. It is so massive that only the strongest Naugrim could use it, delivering deadly force when it strikes a foe. The sides of the head are covered in silvery runes, surrounding a depiction of an anvil.
an engraved warhammer.name: an engraved warhammer

a lantern.examine: It is a moderately sized and robust but somewhat battered oil lantern made from brass, and it is equipped with a handle to make it handy and a hood to protect its flame. There is enough oil for more than half a week.
a lantern.name: a lantern

a hooded brass lantern.examine: It is a large and robust but somewhat battered oil lantern made from brass, and it is equipped with a handle to make it handy and a hood to protect its flame. Some letters have been scratched on its bottom. There is enough oil for more than half a week.
a hooded brass lantern.name: a hooded brass lantern

a black leather belt.examine: You see a fairly long piece of cured leather, with an iron buckle attached to one end.
a black leather belt.name: a black leather belt

a plaid leather belt.examine: You see a fairly long piece of cured leather, with an iron buckle attached to one end.
a plaid leather belt.name: a plaid leather belt

an orange leather belt.examine: You see a fairly long piece of cured leather, with an iron buckle attached to one end.
an orange leather belt.name: an orange leather belt

an ornamented sabre.examine: This narrow, single-edged blade has been inlaid with gold filigree from point to pommel. The grip is black leather, embossed with the image of a red hill against a setting sun. An intricately fashioned guard of silver cages the handle.
an ornamented sabre.name: an ornamented sabre

an engraved broadsword.examine: This weapon has a broad polished silver blade upon which many strange runes and symbols have been carved. The hilt is bound with fine leather through which threads of gold have been entwined. A solid silver pommel protects the wielder's hand in combat. The weapon is perfectly balanced and can be swung with an ease belying its deadliness.

id_details.name: an engraved broadsword
id_details.value: fifty lauren, three celeb, and sixty busc

an engraved broadsword.name: an engraved broadsword

a crude metal key.examine: This key is roughly fashioned from metal, with an uneven surface and an unrefined shape. Its edges are jagged and its teeth are irregular, indicating it was made with minimal tools and skill. Despite its crude appearance, the key is sturdy and functional, suggesting it was designed for practical use rather than aesthetic appeal.
a crude metal key.name: a crude metal key

a soft, thick, white fur.examine: Lush, long white strands are held aloft by the generous padding of its downy undercoat of fuzzy white fur. The size of the skin seems large enough to carpet the major portion of an average sized room.
a soft, thick, white fur.name: a soft, thick, white fur

a herbal kit.examine: This bag is made of thin, soft leather. Inside, the bag holds several simple tools wrapped in woolen cloth, and an assortment of small containers, bottles, vials, and bowls. Seven pockets line the inside of the bag.
a herbal kit.name: a herbal kit

a gem-inlaid knife.examine: This slim hunting knife has been inlaid with several dazzling gemstones of various shapes and colours. The feel is light, yet sturdy in the hand.
a gem-inlaid knife.name: a gem-inlaid knife

a golden belt.examine: Golden and green strands, woven into the likeness of a branch of golden leaves, make up this fine belt. The buckle is in the shape of an exquisitely detailed golden mallorn leaf.

id_details.name: a golden belt
id_details.value: 292 lauren, two celeb, and fifty busc

a golden belt.name: a golden belt

a laced quiver.examine: A beautiful quiver of obvious elven craftsmanship, it is laced with a lining of gems and rubies that make your eyes sparkle.
a laced quiver.name: a laced quiver

a grey leather belt.examine: You see a fairly long piece of cured leather, with an iron buckle attached to one end.
a grey leather belt.name: a grey leather belt

an ornate parchment.examine: The parchment is made of a maggot skin pulled over a support of birch rind and pine bark. Several pictures have been drawn in the first half of it and elven runes cover the remaining space. The drawings are easy to decipher: In the centre stands a tall man clad in white, who holds three lightning bolts in his right hand and throws a ball of fire from the other. Lying at his feet are several horses and blond-haired men, you figure to be dead Rohirrim. On either side are men wearing furs, the Dunlendings, impaling the corpses with long poles. Another picture shows the same white man at the foot of a huge tower, donating treasures and a crown to the Dunlendings. Below this is a short text written with decorated elven runes. At the bottom is a large elven S rune.
an ornate parchment.name: an ornate parchment

a green pair of metal gauntlets.examine: These gauntlets have been masterfully forged out of steel. The metal of the wrists flare out to overlap the armour of the forearm. There are straps to attach the gauntlets securely. The back of each knuckle on every finger is protected by thick metal, and is hinged to allow free movement of the fingers.

id_details.name: a green pair of metal gauntlets

a green pair of metal gauntlets.name: a green pair of metal gauntlets

a golden ruby ring.examine: An exceptionally smooth, polished band of gold wraps around in an unending circle to form this ring. Miniature gold vines with intricately engraved leaves weave around to form a small inset, in which rests a finely cut ruby.

id_details.name: a golden ruby ring
special_abilities: It can call a great eagle to carry you long distances.

a golden ruby ring.name: a golden ruby ring

a golden quartzite ring.examine: This plain ring is made of gold. The band has been tarnished lightly by time, but no scratches or other visible marks of use can be found on it. It has no other decorations than a small stone of quartzite attached to it. The ring feels quite heavy for its size.

id_details.name: a golden quartzite ring
special_abilities: It has fifty charges left for a level eighteen bless.

a golden quartzite ring.name: a golden quartzite ring

a Tharbad gate key.examine: This huge key is wrought in dark iron, and lacks all kinds of ornaments.
a Tharbad gate key.name: a Tharbad gate key

a strange set of lock picks.examine: There is a variety of tools, including slim, flat pieces and long, thin pieces, as well as strangely hooked and flattened pieces. Two of the lockpicks have shallow notches on them. Several of the picks have long, smooth grooves along their length.

id_details.name: a strange set of lock picks

a strange set of lock picks.name: a strange set of lock picks

a Dnadan blade.examine: Forged long ago by the Men of Westernesse, this blade still gleams as new. A relic of the wars against the men of Carn Dm and their Witch-king, it has waited long years for the chance to shed the blood of the Dark Lord's servants once again.

id_details.name: a Dnadan blade
id_details.value: forty-one lauren, fifteen celeb, and ninety busc

a Dnadan blade.name: a Dnadan blade

a keyring.examine: This keyring is fashioned from a shiny silver metal. It consists primarily of a large circle from which to hang keys and has a small but sturdy looking hook attached to the top.
a keyring.name: a keyring

a small daisy chain.examine: Strung around a thin piece of vine, the daisies look to be slightly aged. It was made to fit around the wrist of a young human, but the vine can be stretched to fit by a skilled arteficer.
a small daisy chain.name: a small daisy chain

a necklace.examine: This is a thin, fine-linked silver chain to which a small white stone has been attached so that it can be worn around the neck. The stone is a thin round of sparkling white marble, in which has been etched a drawing of a ship sailing on a calm sea under fluffy clouds.
a necklace.name: a necklace

a dark stone.examine: The thin necklace is wrought from finest silver chain, with a dull, black stone hanging from it.
a dark stone.name: a dark stone

a pair of smooth, black boots.examine: These boots are dark black and smooth on the surface. One of them has a small sheath sewn on the outer side, serving as a holder for a dagger or another equally small weapon.

id_details.name: a pair of smooth, black boots

a pair of smooth, black boots.name: a pair of smooth, black boots

a shining pair of chain mail leggings.examine: Although very light, the leggings are made with a surprisingly strong metal. They don't restrict movement in any way while worn.

id_details.name: a shining pair of chain mail leggings

a shining pair of chain mail leggings.name: a shining pair of chain mail leggings

a fine pair of chain mail gloves.examine: Countless very small rings of hard steel have been used to create this armour. Around the wrists the gloves consist of two layers of mail, while the fingers are formed by many complicated patterns, which nearly offer as much feeling and control as a piece of chainmail can.

id_details.name: a fine pair of chain mail gloves

a fine pair of chain mail gloves.name: a fine pair of chain mail gloves

a shining pair of chain mail sleeves.examine: The metal of the sleeves is very light, but very strong. The links are very fine, and the sleeves seem as comfortable as normal cloth.

id_details.name: a shining pair of chain mail sleeves

a shining pair of chain mail sleeves.name: a shining pair of chain mail sleeves

a russet cloak.examine: The cloak is made from a finely-woven fabric of a deep reddish-brown colour. Thin strands of darker browns, and minute flecks of silver-grey lend to the fabric a richer look, which complements the superior workmanship and subtle styling of the garment.
a russet cloak.name: a russet cloak

a shining chain mail shirt.examine: It is exceptionally light, and can fit even under normal clothes. However, the mesh of the shirt does not seem as though it would break easily.
a shining chain mail shirt.name: a shining chain mail shirt

a mithril circlet.examine: This circlet is simple, yet elegant. A small but flawless ruby is set into a plain band of shimmering mithril, crafted to fit comfortably around one's head.
a mithril circlet.name: a mithril circlet

a ceremonial dagger.examine: The silvery blade is heavier and thicker than most daggers and is obviously ancient. Miniature carvings on its surface depict battles against a dark army, resulting in the fall of Eregion.
a ceremonial dagger.name: a ceremonial dagger

a steel claymore.examine: Shorter and lighter than the normal two-handed sword, the claymore is still close to five feet long and heavy enough to cause severe damage when striking a target. The grip, carefully bound with finest leather, is large enough to allow the wielder to grasp the great sword in either one or two hands, depending on the style with which the owner prefers to fight. The sword is set with a wheel pommel, capped by a crescent shaped nut and a guard with straight, down sloping arms ending in quatrefoils and enruned langets running down the centre of the blade from the guard. A faint glow emanates from the metal, and sometimes a slight tremble runs down the length of the exceptionally sharp blade.
a steel claymore.name: a steel claymore

a backsword.examine: This sword is long and thin, having a slight curve to it. The blade is restricted to one side, the back of the sword being somewhat thickened. The hilt offers moderate protection to the hand that wields it.
a backsword.name: a backsword

a sturdy pair of rigid leather sleeves.examine: These sleeves are constructed from high-quality rigid leather, reinforced for added durability. The inner lining is designed to offer some comfort, while the outer layer provides excellent protection against physical harm.

id_details.name: a sturdy pair of rigid leather sleeves

a sturdy pair of rigid leather sleeves.name: a sturdy pair of rigid leather sleeves

a sturdy pair of metal boots.examine: These hardened leather boots are completely covered with large and heavy plates of pure steel. Long iron vises attach the plates to the leather, preventing them from slipping off. Several metal clips enable enclosure of the boots.

id_details.name: a sturdy pair of metal boots

a sturdy pair of metal boots.name: a sturdy pair of metal boots

a foetid green vial.examine: The green vial drips with a disgusting mixture which smells like rotten flesh.

id_details.name: a foetid green vial
special_abilities: It contains oil, poisoned with level twenty venom that would last for three hours.

a foetid green vial.name: a foetid green vial

a green stinking vial.examine: Carvings forming detailed patterns cover the thin glass bottle, and a foul smell seeps past the dark-brown cork stoppering it. A green fluid has tainted the glass.

id_details.name: a green stinking vial
special_abilities: It contains oil, poisoned with level twenty poison that would last for three hours.

a green stinking vial.name: a green stinking vial

a dirty reddish vial.examine: The vial is filled with a dark red liquid in which are floating dead spiders.

id_details.name: a dirty reddish vial
special_abilities: It contains oil, poisoned with level twenty-two arachnia that would last for one hour.

a dirty reddish vial.name: a dirty reddish vial

a bowl of brew.examine: This bowl holds a dark, aromatic brew, its surface occasionally disturbed by floating bits of herbs. The scent is a complex blend of juniper berries, clover, marjoram, and cloves, offering a fresh and earthy fragrance.

id_details.name: a bowl of brew
special_abilities: It increases movement point regeneration by ten and decreases willpower by three for twenty-four hours.
After that, it increases movement point regeneration by five and decreases willpower by one for one hundred twenty hours.
After that, it increases movement point regeneration by three and decreases willpower by one for twenty-four hours.

a bowl of brew.name: a bowl of brew

a mug of brew.examine: The wooden mug contains a brown liquid with a strong tint of green. There are small clovers floating around in the brew, and tiny parts of root beneath the surface can be made out. The aroma is very strong.

id_details.name: a mug of brew
special_abilities: It increases movement points by ten and movement point regeneration by ten for one hundred twenty hours.
After that, it increases movement points by seven and movement point regeneration by seven for twenty-four hours.
After that, it increases movement points by three and movement point regeneration by three for twenty-four hours.

a mug of brew.name: a mug of brew

a fine pair of metal boots.examine: Made from thick metal these boots offer great protection, yet are quite heavy. With the various metallic parts neatly linked together by chains, this pair makes out an extremely sturdy foot-wear for a warrior.

id_details.name: a fine pair of metal boots

a fine pair of metal boots.name: a fine pair of metal boots

a sombre bottle.examine: This bottle is made of dark, stained glass which upon closer inspection yields an almost smokey complexion. A simple cork stopper plugs the mouth of the bottle. The shape is quite unnatural; no sides are the same, and it is even only on its bottom.

id_details.name: a sombre bottle
special_abilities: It decreases willpower by one and perception by three for ten hours.
After that, it increases defensive bonus by two and decreases perception by two for sixty hours.
After that, it increases defensive bonus by one and decreases perception by one for thirty hours.

a sombre bottle.name: a sombre bottle

a leaf-cake.examine: The cake is made of a sweet and sticky paste, containing various parts of plants, and wrapped in lance-shaped hairy green leaves. Flower fragments of a purple-like colour, with occasional fluffy red brushes, are barely visible in the mixture. It emits a sweetish and faintly aromatic smell, inviting you to take a mouthful of it.
a leaf-cake.name: a leaf-cake

a black wolf fur.examine: A heavy fur with long black outer hairs and a softer, black undercoat. This wolf fur looks as if it could keep someone warm in the cold.
a black wolf fur.name: a black wolf fur

an old plain dress.examine: Looking very old and ragged, this dress was once a nice piece of clothing. Now it is just a tattered piece of decaying cloth.
an old plain dress.name: an old plain dress

a black pair of metal gauntlets.examine: These gauntlets have been masterfully forged out of steel. The metal of the wrists flare out to overlap the armour of the forearm. There are straps to attach the gauntlets securely. The back of each knuckle on every finger is protected by thick metal, and is hinged to allow free movement of the fingers.

id_details.name: a black pair of metal gauntlets

a black pair of metal gauntlets.name: a black pair of metal gauntlets

a green pair of metal boots.examine: Made from thick metal these boots offer great protection, yet are quite heavy. With the various metallic parts neatly linked together by chains, this pair makes out an extremely sturdy foot-wear for a warrior.

id_details.name: a green pair of metal boots

a green pair of metal boots.name: a green pair of metal boots

a green pair of metal vambraces.examine: These vambraces have been masterfully forged out of steel. The reinforced shoulders are connected to a durable metal cylinder to protect the upper arm. The elbow section is made out of concentric telescoping bands that are fitted together to allow free movement without leaving a gap. The smaller metal tubes for the forearms have strong hooks to securely attach gauntlets.

id_details.name: a green pair of metal vambraces

a green pair of metal vambraces.name: a green pair of metal vambraces

a green pair of metal greaves.examine: These greaves are forged out of durable, polished steel plates. They cover the entire leg except for the knees, where strong, interwoven chains attach to the upper and lower leg parts. Black leather laces at the back of the greaves enable them to be adjusted to the size of the leg. An engraved set of buckles at the top allows attachment to other pieces of armour.

id_details.name: a green pair of metal greaves
id_details.value: twelve lauren, one celeb, and eighty busc

a green pair of metal greaves.name: a green pair of metal greaves

a green metal breastplate.examine: This heavy, thick metal breastplate was obviously crafted by a master armourer. It will protect its owner from all but the mightiest blows.
a green metal breastplate.name: a green metal breastplate

a black pair of metal boots.examine: Made from thick metal these boots offer great protection, yet are quite heavy. With the various metallic parts neatly linked together by chains, this pair makes out an extremely sturdy foot-wear for a warrior.

id_details.name: a black pair of metal boots

a black pair of metal boots.name: a black pair of metal boots

a black pair of metal greaves.examine: These greaves are forged out of durable, polished steel plates. They cover the entire leg except for the knees, where strong, interwoven chains attach to the upper and lower leg parts. Black leather laces at the back of the greaves enable them to be adjusted to the size of the leg. An engraved set of buckles at the top allows attachment to other pieces of armour.

id_details.name: a black pair of metal greaves
id_details.value: twelve lauren, one celeb, and eighty busc

a black pair of metal greaves.name: a black pair of metal greaves

a crimson vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a crimson vest.name: a crimson vest

a violet vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a violet vest.name: a violet vest

a scarlet vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a scarlet vest.name: a scarlet vest

an orange vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
an orange vest.name: an orange vest

a grey vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.

id_details.name: a crimson pair of metal boots

a crimson pair of metal boots.name: a crimson pair of metal boots

a pink vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a pink vest.name: a pink vest

a brown vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a brown vest.name: a brown vest

a black vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a black vest.name: a black vest

a white vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a white vest.name: a white vest

a red vest.examine: The vest is made from fine and expensive silk.
a red vest.name: a red vest

an elven dagger.examine: The steel blade of this dagger is of triangular section and about eight inches long. Both of its slightly curved edges have been sharpened, ending in a dangerous-looking point. The metal part continues through the nearly inexistent quillons and the wooden hilt, finally enlarging into a smooth piece that balances the weight of the weapon.
an elven dagger.name: an elven dagger

a nimble blade.examine: This dagger is slender and appears delicate, but despite its looks it has remarkable balance. Both sides of the thin, double-edged blade are engraved with intricate, softly shimmering patterns that seem to rest impossibly deep within the metal.
a nimble blade.name: a nimble blade

a chain mail coif.examine: Many small rings have been interwoven to form a decent armour for the head. Long chains hang over the neck and the cheeks, improving protection but also hindering sight as well as the head's freedom of movement.
a chain mail coif.name: a chain mail coif

a filthy, bent key.examine: This small metal key is covered in filth and has started to rust. It is slightly bent and dented from careless use, but might still work on a lock somewhere. The design is very crude and likely of orkish origin.
a filthy, bent key.name: a filthy, bent key

a lightning-shaped pendant.examine: Delicate links of gold form a light chain of about sixteen inches in length. At the midpoint of the chain is set a small, glimmering white, lightning-shaped metallic object.

id_details.name: a lightning-shaped pendant
special_abilities: It has one hundred charges left.
It decreases the mana cost of control weather.
Casting control weather may make you conductive and vulnerable to lightning.

a lightning-shaped pendant.name: a lightning-shaped pendant

a blackened dwarven axe.examine: This ancient weapon emanates an aura of powerful goodness. The great steel head, sharpened and polished, still bears the burn-marks of the balrog's flame.
a blackened dwarven axe.name: a blackened dwarven axe

a Beorning sword.examine: Although it has the length of a regular longsword, from its weight and thin blade it is evident that this sword is lighter. Moreover, its hilt is not pure metal, but rather has two large, dark, wooden pieces assembled upon a thin steel sheet. Even so, it looks finely tempered and thoroughly balanced. Metals are scarce in the Anduin Vales, and thus weapon smiths there prefer to forge lighter, handier weapons.
a Beorning sword.name: a Beorning sword

a root ring.examine: The withered ring is made of a single root that is surprisingly sturdy and was somehow coaxed to grow into a near perfect circle that solidly reconnects back into itself. Its brown surface is becoming increasingly weathered with cracks and some of the terminated lateral shoots along its meandering path have broken off. The root is still alive even though it is starting to show signs of decay.

id_details.name: a root ring
id_details.value: eighty-nine lauren, nine celeb, and fifty busc
special_abilities: It has one hundred eighty charges left.
It is infused with Entish magic and will keep the wearer rooted when the earth is in upheaval.
It can be used to nourish a tree and encourage it to grow.

a root ring.name: a root ring

a blackened spear.examine: Almost six feet tall, and rather heavy for a spear, this odd weapon is made entirely out of metal. The shaft is created out of a black, dull metal which hardly reflects any light. A bright contrast is the serrated head, sparkling and glittering silver, whose point is lethally sharp.
a blackened spear.name: a blackened spear

a grey leather-bound book.examine:
The book seems to be quite old, but its battered leather binding is still sturdy. Embossed on the grey leather is a round emblem which looks like a heraldic device: a cornflower pattern with twelve slender petals in shades of blue and white. You can look at the table of contents and the copyright notice, or hold the book and then read book page
.
a grey leather-bound book.name: a grey leather-bound book

a strange white skull.examine: The skull is smelling to high heavens, and some remains of flesh and other slimy substances are still visible deep within it.

id_details.name: a strange white skull
special_abilities: It is a cursed and unsellable object.

a strange white skull.name: a strange white skull

a brown leather belt.examine: You see a fairly long piece of cured leather, with an iron buckle attached to one end.
a brown leather belt.name: a brown leather belt

a wicked Durbk-hai axe.examine: This axe has an iron head crafted for raw brutality. The attention of whoever wrought it was clearly focused on the cruelly-honed edge of the blade rather than on the aesthetic form of the head. The axe-head is bound by thick leather straps to a dark shaft of twisted wood roughly one and a half feet long. Mottled black and red stains discolour the otherwise white colour of the leather.
a wicked Durbk-hai axe.name: a wicked Durbk-hai axe

a steel-tipped spear.examine: This spear has a smooth wooden shaft, about five feet long, with a small metal tip at its top. Quality craftsmanship is obvious in the weapon's balance - it is perfectly weighted and very easy to handle. A leather wrap two feet from the bottom acts as a handgrip, with the emblem of a horse prominent in the wood just above.
a steel-tipped spear.name: a steel-tipped spear

a maul.examine: About a yard and a half long, it is made from a hardened wood, reinforced with metal. Its head is smooth and round, well balanced so that you can move it quickly and accurately.
a maul.name: a maul

a huge spiked club.examine: A crude weapon, this large wooden club has several thick and pointy iron nails driven through its head.
a huge spiked club.name: a huge spiked club

a great warsword.examine: This huge sword stands as tall as most men. Its blade is broad, made of a bluish metal that seems exceptionally sharp and heavy. The hilt is large and can only be grasped with two hands, and then even barely. The whole sword vibrates to some unknown call, perhaps the call of battle that it so yearns for. A slightly glowing red line traces runes up the flat side of the blade.

id_details.name: a great warsword
id_details.value: fifty-four lauren, five celeb, and fifty busc

a great warsword.name: a great warsword

a jagged-edged scimitar.examine: It appears crude, but brutally effective. Its large blade has a jagged edge, giving a toothed appearance.
a jagged-edged scimitar.name: a jagged-edged scimitar

a small spade.examine: This small spade has a short wooden handle attached to an iron head. It could be used for gardening or similar tasks.
a small spade.name: a small spade

a sharp thorn.examine: The thorn is very much like the thorn of a rose, with only a slight difference in size: it is big as a short sword and, in fact, feels quite comfortable in one's hand. Its point is immensely sharp, and a green liquid slowly drips from it. Since it is not made of iron, it is also rustproof.
a sharp thorn.name: a sharp thorn

a long, wicked knife.examine: This weapon is deceptively light and swift and its curved blade seems designed best to eviscerate enemies quickly. Faint traces of dried blood are imbedded between the serrations on the blade. Its hilt seems strangely sticky.
a long, wicked knife.name: a long, wicked knife

a nasty orkish fang.examine: It is a three foot long, thin, single edged, sharp blade, with the shape of a huge fang. A small white skull is engraved on its handle. It is a crude weapon with no aesthetics, as all orkish weapons are, but it looks quite effective.
a nasty orkish fang.name: a nasty orkish fang

a giant spear.examine: This huge spear has a long broad spearhead, its edge stained with blood from several battles. The shaft is dark and made out of hard wood, making it even heavier to fight with. This is a weapon made for strong warriors.
a giant spear.name: a giant spear

a double edged eket.examine: A blade of Nmenrean origin, approximately one and one half feet in length. It appears to be a short, stabbing weapon with a broad blade, pointed and double-edged.

id_details.name: a double edged eket
id_details.value: two lauren, twelve celeb, and ninety busc

a double edged eket.name: a double edged eket

an ancient ruby ring.examine: The ring looks old and elven. It is made of fine Dwarven steel, with several rubies set in a splendid pattern. Crafted during the Second Age, this grey-steel ruby ring reflects a rare period of cooperation between Elves and Dwarves, combining their unmatched skills in metallurgy and gem-setting.
an ancient ruby ring.name: an ancient ruby ring

a grey wolfskin wristband.examine: You see a beautifully knit piece of wolfskin. The wristband must have been made by a craftsman of Old.
a grey wolfskin wristband.name: a grey wolfskin wristband

a white wolfskin wristband.examine: You see a beautifully knit piece of wolfskin. The wristband must have been made by a craftsman of Old.
a white wolfskin wristband.name: a white wolfskin wristband

a black wolfskin wristband.examine: You see a beautifully knit piece of wolfskin. The wristband must have been made by a craftsman of Old.
a black wolfskin wristband.name: a black wolfskin wristband

a steel-tipped lance.examine: This long lance has been carved from a single straight branch. One end was sharpened and covered with hardened steel.
a steel-tipped lance.name: a steel-tipped lance

a twisted spear.examine: About six feet long, it is made of a dark red bone, very light for its size. The haft is wrapped in long strips of hide that twist around the wood for a better grip. About halfway along the length of the spear, it twists and spirals several times, separating then into two sharp points.
a twisted spear.name: a twisted spear

a burnished hewing-spear.examine: This large pole arm is comprised of a burnished metal blade, decorated with a fine pattern of silver threads embedded into the metal. The blade is affixed to a long, polished pole of ash. Its butt end is fitted with a cruel steel spike. Runic adornments wind around the shaft of the spear. It is too hefty to be wielded with a single hand.

id_details.name: a burnished hewing-spear
properties: silver metal stabbing weapon of slashing nature

a burnished hewing-spear.name: a burnished hewing-spear

a black metal staff.examine: This staff appears at first to be made out of a solid dark wood, but at a closer inspection the weight and reflections in the material tell a sure tale. The entire staff, five feet long, is made out of a black metal, almost one inch thick. It is cold to the touch, heavy and unyielding.

id_details.name: a black metal staff
id_details.value: nine lauren, seventeen celeb, and forty busc

a black metal staff.name: a black metal staff

a black waraxe.examine: It is a mid-sized axe, made of a black metal alloy. Orkish runes, carved into the shaft, speak of the gory death that awaits the wielder's foes.
a black waraxe.name: a black waraxe

a rough staff.examine: About six feet long, this wooden staff was crafted from a knotted branch, without paying much attention to the details. Nevertheless it looks like it can parry severe blows, or crush someone's head, without suffering much damage itself.
a rough staff.name: a rough staff

a whip.examine: A whip of braided leather extends over six feet in length from a sturdy wooden hilt. The tip has been frayed into short fingers.
a whip.name: a whip

a lance.examine: The lance is made of a long straight length of timber, with one end flared to guard a grip that has been carved into it. The other end tapers to a keen point.
a lance.name: a lance

an elven hunting-spear.examine: You see an elven hunting-spear with a long and sharp blade.
an elven hunting-spear.name: an elven hunting-spear

a steel-shafted spear.examine: This spear is five feet in length, and the shaft is composed entirely of steel. The head is long and broad and composed of a dark metal. The metal of the head was fused to the shaft with a great amount of heat and force. The spear was never refinished or polished, making the weapon crude looking, but very effective.
a steel-shafted spear.name: a steel-shafted spear

a short spear.examine: This short, rough iron spear was crafted without paying much attention to the details, probably during a period of unrest when it was important to forge many weapons quickly. Its ugliness does not make the spear less lethal.
a short spear.name: a short spear

a longspear.examine: This is an ordinary spear which is about six feet in length. The head of the spear is long and narrow. The butt of the spear is shod in iron to make the spear durable.
a longspear.name: a longspear

a broad spear.examine: This spear has a very broad head made of a dark heavy metal. To complement the head there are two small prongs on either side of the head. The shaft of this weapon is over six feet in length.
a broad spear.name: a broad spear

a pitchfork.examine: The fork consists of a long, wooden handle and a metal cross-bar with four spikes attached to its lower end. Although designed as a farmer's tool, it can nevertheless be quite deadly if used as weapon.
a pitchfork.name: a pitchfork

a pike.examine: This extra long spear is shod in iron at its base, which is used to support the tip when engaged against a mounted opponent. The tip of the spear is rudimentary, but very effective when handled by a skilled warrior.
a pike.name: a pike

a warhammer.examine: This hammer has a tough wooden handle and a solid metal head.
a warhammer.name: a warhammer

a heavy warhammer.examine: The long and heavy shaft of this hammer is topped by a massive head, which is secured and reinforced to the shaft by two strong pieces of metal.
a heavy warhammer.name: a heavy warhammer

a hammer.examine: This is a wooden hammer with a metal head. One side of the head is rounded, the other flat. The wooden handle is roughly a foot long and has a hole at the end. A sturdy leather thong loops through the hole, tied into a circle.
a hammer.name: a hammer

a large warhammer.examine: Quite a bit larger than your average weapon of this type, this warhammer has a great iron-bound handle and a massive iron head.
a large warhammer.name: a large warhammer

a quarterstaff.examine: The staff is about six feet in length and is made from some pale, hard wood.
a quarterstaff.name: a quarterstaff

a shovel.examine: This often useful tool has a wooden handle and a broad metal scoop for digging.
a shovel.name: a shovel

a pick.examine: The pick is a standard type, the one usually used by dwarves.
a pick.name: a pick

a morningstar.examine: This weapon is comprised of a spiked metal ball, attached to a stout wooden handle by a short length of iron chain.
a morningstar.name: a morningstar

a heavy morningstar.examine: This morningstar has a heavy metal ball with large spikes. A length of heavy iron chain joins it to a tough wooden handle which is reinforced with iron straps.

id_details.name: a heavy morningstar
id_details.value: two lauren, five celeb, and fifty busc

a heavy morningstar.name: a heavy morningstar

a war mattock.examine: You judge the steel shaft of this huge weapon to be at least five feet long. A massive head of polished annealed steel is fitted to the head of the shank and a foot long hilt of carved mahogany is fitted to the other. Dwarven runes adorn the weapon, carved into the wood of the handle, the gleaming steel of the shaft, and tempered steel of the weighty head.

id_details.name: a war mattock
id_details.value: forty-nine lauren, nineteen celeb, and seventy busc

a war mattock.name: a war mattock

a mace.examine: This mace bears several iron studs driven into a stout wooden handle.
a mace.name: a mace

a cruelly-spiked mace.examine: It is large and heavy, and its head bears a dozen sharp, iron spikes. It appears as though it was made for the purpose of shredding metal and bone alike.
a cruelly-spiked mace.name: a cruelly-spiked mace

a flail.examine: This flail is just a short stick connected to a wooden handle, from which it can swing freely. Normally used for threshing, in case of emergency it could also become a weapon.
a flail.name: a flail

a cudgel.examine: This short, heavy club is about two and a half feet long. It is little more than part of a thick tree limb which has been crudely finished; the bark has been removed, and one end has been shaped into a hand grip.
a cudgel.name: a cudgel

a wooden club.examine: A simple weapon, merely a carved piece of lumber. It is crude, but still capable of making a point.
a wooden club.name: a wooden club

a spiked war club.examine: A long, heavy club with a wicked, barbed spike at the end surrounded by many smaller spikes. It looks of orkish make.
a spiked war club.name: a spiked war club

a gnarled wooden club.examine: This rough club has been hewn from an old knotted piece of timber.
a gnarled wooden club.name: a gnarled wooden club

a very heavy branch.examine: This branch has been ripped from a large tree. It is very large and heavy and it looks like it would make a suitable club for some gigantic creature.
a very heavy branch.name: a very heavy branch

a very large wooden club.examine: Made of heavy, thick pine and weighted with a centre rod of iron, this club is a dangerous weapon. The base, wrapped tightly in leather strips, allows for two hands to wield this blunt, deadly club.
a very large wooden club.name: a very large wooden club

a very large knotted tree-branch.examine: This very large branch has been ripped from a tree. It is almost eight feet long, making it difficult to swing one-handed. Its base is splintered where it was broken off and is much thicker than the tip. Almost straight, this branch is slightly curved and covered with numerous knots.
a very large knotted tree-branch.name: a very large knotted tree-branch

a poleaxe.examine: This weapon was made by attaching an axeblade to an eight-foot pole. The blade is longer and heavier than that of a halberd, and the pole is longer.

id_details.name: a poleaxe
properties: metal cleaving weapon of stabbing nature

a poleaxe.name: a poleaxe

a hatchet.examine: This light axe is primarily meant as a light wood-axe, being used to clear branches and debris. The blade is backed up by a hammer on the opposite side.
a hatchet.name: a hatchet

a handaxe.examine: The axe has a sharp broad blade on one side and a sharpened hook on the other which balances the weapon. The top of the weapon has a small, sharpened spike at the tip. The handle is shorter than most war axes and it is clear this weapon is meant for close personal combat.
a handaxe.name: a handaxe

a halberd.examine: The blade of this weapon is a small curved axe on one side, and a small hammer attached to its opposite. The tip of this weapon is a sharpened spike which makes it effective versus a mounted opponent. The pole the blade is attached to is well over seven feet in length.

id_details.name: a halberd
properties: metal cleaving weapon of stabbing nature

a halberd.name: a halberd

a butcher's cleaver.examine: This heavy, broad-bladed hatchet would serve well for slaughtering animals.
a butcher's cleaver.name: a butcher's cleaver

a brutal cleaver.examine: The blade is large and roughly square, although it curves slightly. The haft is not very long, but it is sturdy. The weapon looks to be designed to shed the most blood possible, and cause the most pain, in each hit.
a brutal cleaver.name: a brutal cleaver

a woodsman's axe.examine: This axe has a large, stout and heavy iron blade suitable for chopping wood. The long handle is made of hickory wood and wrapped in leather.
a woodsman's axe.name: a woodsman's axe

a two-handed axe.examine: The head of this axe is forged from fine steel. The blade has a deadly curve to it and is polished to a shine. The back of the head forms a sharp spike. The long, wooden haft has been polished to a rich, glossy black. Strips of leather and silvery wire form intricate patterns where the haft is wrapped to provide a sure and firm grip.
a two-handed axe.name: a two-handed axe

a mighty dwarven axe.examine: This axe is very old, but the blade, forged from dwarven steel, is still polished, exposing fine carved dwarven scrollwork and possessing a sharpness like none you've ever seen before. There are some runes etched on the blade.

id_details.name: a mighty dwarven axe
id_details.value: thirteen lauren, nineteen celeb, and fifty busc

a mighty dwarven axe.name: a mighty dwarven axe

a double-headed axe.examine: The favourite weapon of many a dwarf warrior, the double-headed axe is a nimble weapon considering its weight. This one is unadorned and simply crafted - a three foot plain wooden shaft with a curved steel blade running half its length on each side.
a double-headed axe.name: a double-headed axe

a battle axe.examine: This axe bears a single-edge and is balanced by a pointed spike on the opposite side of its handle. The grip is bound with leather to give the wielder ample defensive ability at close quarters.
a battle axe.name: a battle axe

a shiny dagger.examine: This light dagger has a blade that shines with a soft yellow light, its handle is made of beautiful golden coloured metal.
a shiny dagger.name: a shiny dagger

a sharp talon.examine: With its blood-stained claws, this talon can cause nasty wounds.
a sharp talon.name: a sharp talon

a two-handed sword.examine: The great sword has a long, heavy blade nearly measuring five feet in length. Its grip seems straight and allows the use of both hands when swinging it. The quillions slant slightly towards the tip of the blade, providing little or no protection for you.
a two-handed sword.name: a two-handed sword

a sickle.examine: This crude weapon is more suited for harvesting the wheat, than killing. It is cumbersome, with a six foot long pole and a long curved blade attached at the end. A handle at the opposite end can be grasped for better support during harvest, to effectively swipe through the grass. This extra handle would be of no use to an attacker however, and the weapon is meant to be used one-handed.
a sickle.name: a sickle

a serrated scimitar.examine: The edge of the curved blade of this weapon consists of dozens of tiny sharp teeth, so that the scimitar will tend to rip flesh, as well as slashing it.
a serrated scimitar.name: a serrated scimitar

a scimitar.examine: This is a thin and razor-sharp sword. It curves backward and bears a sharp point. The handle and the fashioning of the blade are indicative Orcish craftsmanship.
a scimitar.name: a scimitar

a broad scimitar.examine: This is a huge scimitar, curving and broad. Its weight and size indicates any blow from this weapon would be brutal. It seems of orkish make.
a broad scimitar.name: a broad scimitar

a sabre.examine: A long straight sword, but with only one sharp edge.
a sabre.name: a sabre

a longsword.examine: The sword has a long straight blade, a strong hilt and a sturdy grip.
a longsword.name: a longsword

a broad-bladed knife.examine: This is a broad knife with a rough wooden handle. Apparently, it has other uses than just cutting meat.
a broad-bladed knife.name: a broad-bladed knife

a falchion.examine: This single-edged blade is short and very broad, with a small crosspiece for protection. The tip of the blade is curved, so that a large portion of the blade's edge is exposed.
a falchion.name: a falchion

a cutlass.examine: This sword has a slightly curved blade with a single sharp edge. A single metal bar arcs over the grip to provide a simple guard.
a cutlass.name: a cutlass

a broadsword.examine: This massive flat-bladed weapon has a long protective cross guard. The handle is wrapped with leather; a one-inch ball is set at the end to counterbalance the blade.
a broadsword.name: a broadsword

a brown thorn.examine: This is a thorn, but much larger than anything to be found on an ordinary plant. It is the size of a dagger, in fact, and as sharp. Brown, oily, and slick-surfaced, it must have been shed by a large stem indeed.
a brown thorn.name: a brown thorn

a stiletto.examine: A long and thin knife, or perhaps a short and thin shortsword, the stiletto is long and slim with a dangerously sharp point.
a stiletto.name: a stiletto

a shortsword.examine: This is a short broad-bladed weapon of average quality with a crescent-shaped pommel, which was made of brass. It is good for a quick fighting-style and fast thrusts.
a shortsword.name: a shortsword

a rapier.examine: This sword is short and is very thin, with little to its cutting edge. A crossguard covers the wielder's hand. The weapon is light and meant for thrusting.
a rapier.name: a rapier

a hunting knife.examine: The blade is about 5 inches long, curved at the tip. Along the back of the blade is a serrated portion, perhaps to cut bone.
a hunting knife.name: a hunting knife

a butcher knife.examine: This light knife has a long flat blade made for cutting. The perfect tool for splitting, stripping and cutting meat.
a butcher knife.name: a butcher knife

a horn.examine: It is a long, backwards curving horn with thick, transversal ridges. Although hollow, you feel that it's pretty resistant. Its point is also quite sharp. A horse leaves west.
a horn.name: a horn

a dirk.examine: The dirk has quite a thick blade, which is wide in relation to its length. The blade is set in a black wooden handle with a rough criss-cross pattern carved into it.
a dirk.name: a dirk

a dagger.examine: This blade is two sided, ten inches long and one inch wide. The hilt offers little protection and the handle is large enough for the hand of a man. It is otherwise a well balanced weapon, useful in close quartered combat.
a dagger.name: a dagger

an iron-shod mace.examine: This mace is made of a strong timber handle over which a spiked iron cap with inch-long spikes has been fitted.
an iron-shod mace.name: an iron-shod mace

a honey-scented cake.examine: This round cake is about a hand's span in diameter, and a couple inches high. Its crust has a light burnt shade, but the inside is golden brown, like the honey it has been made of. The Beorning bakers cook these honeycakes twice, to make them more durable. Thus, they turn out to be especially useful for weary travellers.
a honey-scented cake.name: a honey-scented cake

a black, corrupted flower.examine: This flower seems to suck in all of the light that passes near it. The deep gloom that surrounds it blurs its soft, black petals. Its red centre is a stark contrast to the dark petals, though its hue would appear quite muted if compared with that of any other flower. This foul bloom exudes an acrid scent of corruption.
a black, corrupted flower.name: a black, corrupted flower

a filthy straw pallet.examine: The pallet is made of loose feathers and straw and is suitable for a nights' rest. No care is taken in its upkeep however, and over the years it has accumulated a thick layer of dust and grime.
a filthy straw pallet.name: a filthy straw pallet

a few hawthorn berries.examine: The berries have a rusty orange to bright red colour. Each berry is about one half of an inch in diameter, oval shaped with one small seed in the centre.
a few hawthorn berries.name: a few hawthorn berries

a pot of mashed elf.examine: Cracked bones, pulverized flesh and sinew as well as blood are mixed in this clay pot. The mixture is cold and smells very badly.
a pot of mashed elf.name: a pot of mashed elf

a rough, large quiver.examine: Patches of discoloured leather have been roughly stitched together into a cylindrical form and fortified with several leather straps, forming an aqeduate quiver. Many of the stitches appear to have been done in haste, as they are of different lengths and are not very straight either. One of the straps is longer than the others and even features a small buckle, allowing the current owner to fit the quiver on a belt or over the shoulders.
a rough, large quiver.name: a rough, large quiver

a coarse dusky robe.examine: The robe is made of coarse cloth, the colour so dark that it seems to absorb light itself. It has no feature or adornment, but seems to exude an aura of hidden power.
a coarse dusky robe.name: a coarse dusky robe

a crimson silken sash.examine: Long and sleek, this piece of silk is shiny and smooth to the touch.
a crimson silken sash.name: a crimson silken sash

a violet silken sash.examine: Long and sleek, this piece of silk is shiny and smooth to the touch.
a violet silken sash.name: a violet silken sash

a blue silken sash.name: a blue silken sash

a green silken sash.name: a green silken sash

a white silken sash.examine: Long and sleek, this piece of silk is shiny and smooth to the touch.
a white silken sash.name: a white silken sash

a small crystal phial.examine: The phial glows with a warm white light, capable of piercing even the thickest darkness. It is warm and smooth to the touch, and at the same time so hard that it could withstand almost anything, save perhaps the fires of the earth, without even being marred. The silver light of the phial is bright. You realise that this phial is owned by Lumpin.

id_details.name: a small crystal phial
special_abilities: It will cause evil creatures to hesitate before attacking you.
It can be used to shine the light of Elbereth and drain mana from evil.

a small crystal phial.name: a small crystal phial

a crimson cloak.examine: This cloak is designed to stretch from the shoulders of the wearer to just above the ankle. The sewing is well done and will keep anyone who wears this garment warm.
a crimson cloak.name: a crimson cloak

a violet cloak.examine: This cloak is designed to stretch from the shoulders of the wearer to just above the ankle. The sewing is well done and will keep anyone who wears this garment warm.
a violet cloak.name: a violet cloak

a scarlet cloak.examine: This cloak is designed to stretch from the shoulders of the wearer to just above the ankle. The sewing is well done and will keep anyone who wears this garment warm.
a scarlet cloak.name: a scarlet cloak

an orange cloak.examine: This cloak is designed to stretch from the shoulders of the wearer to just above the ankle. The sewing is well done and will keep anyone who wears this garment warm.
an orange cloak.name: an orange cloak

a green brooch.examine: Small green stones are arranged in the pattern of a flower's petals on this small circular brooch. Obviously elf-work, its style is unusual: it looks similar to the craft of the Elves of Gondolin, yet it is not that.
a green brooch.name: a green brooch

an Istari wand.examine: This six feet ancient oak wand has some mithril runic inscriptions on it. On its top a pale glowing blue crystal is fixed by three fine gold claws. Looking closer, you are able to see some more details: namely, an oblong, reddish-orange gemstone has been set in the staff's base, a barely visible piece of honey-coloured amber has been embedded deep into the staff, a small beryl has been embedded into the staff, a small gem, twinkling in shades of gold, red and brown is embedded near the staff's tip, a small oval-shaped gem glittering in shades of pink is inlaid in it, a six-rayed star shines from the middle of a blue stone set in the staff, an orb of black metal surrounds its tip, silvery bands encircle it from top to bottom, and its foot is shod with iron. You realise that this wand is owned by Barinak.
an Istari wand.name: an Istari wand

a crimson pair of sleeves.name: a crimson pair of sleeves

a pair of crimson trousers.examine: These trousers are designed for durability. They are mostly worn by farmers and their ilk to protect against stains from soil and mud. They are also moderately moisture repellent because of the tight stitching.
a pair of crimson trousers.name: a pair of crimson trousers

a crimson hood.examine: This hood has been constructed of good cloth with a competent stitcher. The hood is designed so that it can be tied to the back of shirt, jerkin, or cloak and give warmth to the head. It is also designed not to restrict the neck or head in turning.
a crimson hood.name: a crimson hood

an ebony tunic.examine: This is a rich ebony shirt whose hem falls well below the belt. The fine cloth has a shimmering quality to it that plays tricks on the eyes. There are delicate and fine patterns embroidered along the borders and cuffs of the tunic in a silvery thread.

id_details.name: an ebony tunic
id_details.value: twenty-one lauren, seven celeb, and fifty busc
special_abilities: It confuses attackers and grants a chance of combat elusion.

an ebony tunic.name: an ebony tunic

special_abilities: It is efficient against Trolls and Orcs.

the polished Elven shortsword.name: the polished Elven shortsword

an iron sapphire ring.name: an iron sapphire ring

a thin parchment.examine: Written on a goat skin are strange indecipherable glyphs. Seeing the care which was taken to keep that parchment safe, it must be important.
a thin parchment.name: a thin parchment

a narrow runed awlpike.examine: The haft of this awlpike is crafted from four feet of dark wood etched with Elven runes from top to bottom. A guard of metalworked leaves connects the haft to a steel-pointed shaft almost five feet long. Although only an inch wide at the crossguard, the shaft narrows considerably down to a needle-thin point at the tip.
a narrow runed awlpike.name: a narrow runed awlpike

an ashen blade.examine: The sword is a dull grey colour, lacking any luster or polish. Over three feet long, the double-edged blade appears well crafted despite the ashen hue. At the base of the haft, a small mark has been etched into the metal. A sloping, s-shaped cross-guard connects the blade to a hilt wrapped in black leather.
an ashen blade.name: an ashen blade

a wrinkly map.examine: If you were holding the map, you could examine it closer.
a wrinkly map.name: a wrinkly map

a blighted mushroom.examine: This small mushroom's cap is mostly a healthy, luscious golden-brown hue, but the image of health is dispelled by mottled patches of grey and green. A dark fluid seems to seep from the blight, discolouring the rim and the gills on the underside.
a blighted mushroom.name: a blighted mushroom

a small, black opal.examine: This smooth, round gemstone appears to be black at first glance, but as the light catches it, small specks of crimson, turqoise, and amber glimmer across the surface. The gem is small, about the size of an acorn, but with a solid feel to it.

id_details.name: a small, black opal
special_abilities: When embedded, it can be used to disengage the user from combat.

a small, black opal.name: a small, black opal

a piece of smoked, cured pony meat.examine: This piece of meat is coloured dark brown by smoking and its outside is slightly dry due to salting. These treatments keep this piece of meat edible for a long time.

id_details.name: a piece of smoked, cured pony meat

a piece of smoked, cured pony meat.name: a piece of smoked, cured pony meat

a crock of baked mushrooms.examine: A simple earthenware bowl has been filled to the brim with button mushrooms, braised in their own juices. A small knob of herbed butter is melting atop the vegetables, and a generous hunk of home-made bread sits to one side.
a crock of baked mushrooms.name: a crock of baked mushrooms

a morsel of nightingale meat.examine: This small bit of meat contains some veins which are coloured almost white, which contrasts with the red colour of the meat. The meat itself is a bit tough although it has been cooked.

a bit of raw woodpecker meat.examine: This small bit of bright red raw meat clinging to the bone has almost no visible fat. A drip of dark red blood has already dried on a bone.

id_details.name: a bit of raw woodpecker meat

a bit of raw woodpecker meat.name: a bit of raw woodpecker meat

a large piece of raw pork.examine: This piece of meat has been butchered from the corpse of some big animal. A bit of blood still drips from it. Once cooked it could be the main course of a big meal.

id_details.name: a large piece of raw pork

a large piece of raw pork.name: a large piece of raw pork

a war horn.examine: A solid piece of bronze has been curled and hammered to form a simple horn. A braid of jet black horse hair has been tied to the mouthpiece and looped to form a strap. The surface of the horn is riddled with small scrapes and dents but nothing deep enough to affect the horn's pitch.
a war horn.name: a war horn

a tinted brass key.examine: This key is about the length of a finger, made from yellowish red brass with some green spots.
a tinted brass key.name: a tinted brass key

a small brass key.examine: It is a small, simple brass key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.
a small brass key.name: a small brass key

a small key carved from ebony.examine: This black key was carved from a single piece of dark ebony. The handle is small and round, while the other end is square with distinctive notches.

id_details.name: a small key carved from ebony

a small key carved from ebony.name: a small key carved from ebony

a rusted iron key.examine: Crudely fashioned out of dark iron, this key's age is shown by its poor condition. Chunks of it have rusted off completely, and rough handling may be enough to break it.
a rusted iron key.name: a rusted iron key

a gleaming stone.examine: The stone is formed like a round cabochon, which hints that it might be a lost stone from a piece of jewellery. It has a soft glow which makes it easily noticeable and distinguishable from other stones of value.
a gleaming stone.name: a gleaming stone

a bright carnelian.examine: This irregularly shaped gemstone is very smooth. Its surface is covered with every hue of red and orange. A few lines of dark red and and white cover one bulbous end in circles, almost like a bullseye.

id_details.name: a bright carnelian
special_abilities: When embedded, it gives the healer a portion of the amount the target is healed.

a bright carnelian.name: a bright carnelian

a golden elven bracelet.examine: The bracelet is made with pure gold. Carved on the surface, beautiful samples of elven art ornament the metal. A truly remarkable piece! Closely examined, its easy to guess the age of this kind of work. It has survived the sinking of forgotten lands, a mute witness of a tragedy. This is a bracelet of the ancient Doriath, priceless for any of the elven race!
a golden elven bracelet.name: a golden elven bracelet

an opaque amulet.examine: The amulet is opaque and lozenged. Seven small, ebony-coloured stones have been embedded into the amulet, forming a circle around an empty socket at its centre. An aged silver chain has been attached to the amulet, allowing it to be worn around the neck.

id_details.name: an opaque amulet
special_abilities: It has one hundred thirty-one charges left for a level five detect magic.

an opaque amulet.name: an opaque amulet

a large leather pouch.examine: This leather pouch is larger than most. It is crafted from fine leather and has a small loop of leather strung around its neck, serving both to close the pouch and as a handle.
a large leather pouch.name: a large leather pouch

a severed spider's fang.examine: The slightly curved spider's fang fits perfectly in your hand. The fang is nearly a foot long and half way down it divides into two sharp tips, each measuring four inches. Thin black stripes run down the sides of the otherwise almost transparent blade.
a severed spider's fang.name: a severed spider's fang

a russet hood.examine: A well-made hood in a reddish-brown colour.
a russet hood.name: a russet hood

a dirty formula.examine: Strange signs have been drawn on the bark of the cork oak. They describe the preparation of what could be a medical concoction.
a dirty formula.name: a dirty formula

a key.examine: This key is unremarkable and made of iron, with a utilitarian design and a simple, worn appearance. Its edges are slightly nicked from use, and it lacks any distinguishing marks or embellishments.
a key.name: a key

a black bone key.examine: This is a most strange piece of work. The key seems to be made from a fragment of bone, but where in the world does a creature have black bones? The skull of an unknown creature ornaments the key, its eyes two opaque worthless red stones. On your hand it feels cold, and no matter how long you hold it, the key never seems to warm up.
a black bone key.name: a black bone key

a wide silvery wristband.examine: This wristband is three inches wide and has been hammered out of pure silver. Its surface is so finely polished that it reflects light like a mirror. Small runes are skilfully engraved into its surface around both edges, and a line of small sapphires is set into the central line of the wristband.
a wide silvery wristband.name: a wide silvery wristband

a small piece of cub meat.examine: The surface of this meat still shows traces of blood. Whether it was briefly cooked or did just brow from age, it will not keep edible for long.

id_details.name: a small piece of cub meat

a small piece of cub meat.name: a small piece of cub meat

a beautiful hat.examine: Well you think it's nice, but beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
a beautiful hat.name: a beautiful hat

a scourge.examine: A thick and wickedly barbed whip, this has no use other than to inflict maximum pain on opponents.
a scourge.name: a scourge

a leather collar.examine: The collar is made from a strip of thick leather, which is a little more than two inches wide. The leather is extremely supple, and seems well maintained.  Along the collar there are carved some sort of animal tracks in the form of  huge paw prints. At the front of the collar, the artisan has carved the head of a bear with such skill that it almost seems to be looking back at you, a growling challenge coming from its jaws.
a leather collar.name: a leather collar

a small piece of quail meat.examine: The surface of this meat still shows traces of blood. Whether it was briefly cooked or did just brow from age, it will not keep edible for long.

id_details.name: a small piece of quail meat

a small piece of quail meat.name: a small piece of quail meat

id_details.name: a tiny piece of raw bear meat

a tiny piece of raw bear meat.name: a tiny piece of raw bear meat

a piece of sweet meat.examine: It is whiter than most meat, with a sweet aroma. A fresh, almost sublime taste is held within its tender fibers.
a piece of sweet meat.name: a piece of sweet meat

a piece of raw lion meat.examine: This piece of fat-marbled, raw meat is dark-red in colour. One of the edges is covered with a strip of bright, clean white fat. Dark blood seeps through the  tissue, indicating that the animal was recently butchered.

id_details.name: a piece of raw lion meat

a piece of raw lion meat.name: a piece of raw lion meat

a dead carp.examine: This fresh fish stares lifelessly back at you.  Its scales glisten, and it has not begun to smell bad yet...
a dead carp.name: a dead carp

a large piece of smoked, cured warhorse.examine: Smoked and salted, this large piece of meat is going to last a while without decaying.

id_details.name: a large piece of smoked, cured warhorse meat

a large piece of smoked, cured warhorse.name: a large piece of smoked, cured warhorse meat

a cooked trout.examine: This is a fresh fish which has been skilfully fried and smells delicious! Best to eat it before it spoils.
a cooked trout.name: a cooked trout

a cooked catfish.examine: This is a fresh fish which has been skilfully fried and smells delicious! Best to eat it before it spoils.
