an ivory coloured rose with a tint of cr.examine: You see a delicate looking rose here.

id_details.name: an ivory coloured rose with a tint of crimson

an ivory coloured rose with a tint of cr.name: an ivory coloured rose with a tint of crimson

a braided dwarven beard.examine: This braided length of hair seems to have been cut from the face of some unfortunate Dwarf. The beard is dirty and matted with old blood and bits of torn, rotting flesh.
a braided dwarven beard.name: a braided dwarven beard

a large piece of smoked, cured mule meat.examine: Smoked and salted, this large piece of meat is going to last a while without decaying.

id_details.name: a large piece of smoked, cured mule meat

a large piece of smoked, cured mule meat.name: a large piece of smoked, cured mule meat

a steel key.examine: This is a steel key with a circular handle, allowing it to be put onto a keyring. The surfaces of the key show no signs of corrosion, but the metal is dull, with little shine.
a steel key.name: a steel key

a piece of raw fish.examine: This piece of fat-marbled, raw meat is dark-red in colour. One of the edges is covered with a strip of bright, clean white fat. Dark blood seeps through the  tissue, indicating that the animal was recently butchered.

a dead salmon.examine: This fresh fish stares lifelessly back at you.  Its scales glisten, and it has not begun to smell bad yet...
a dead salmon.name: a dead salmon

a dead bass.examine: This fresh fish stares lifelessly back at you.  Its scales glisten, and it has not begun to smell bad yet...
a dead bass.name: a dead bass

a blue crystal.examine: The crystal is a deep blue and has many facets. It looks to have been cut by an expert and looks flawless. Upon closer examination, it seems to have an inner light, pale and only very faintly glowing.
a blue crystal.name: a blue crystal

a ruby ring.examine: The ring looks old and elven. It is made of some grey metal, with several rubies in a splendid pattern.
a ruby ring.name: a ruby ring

a black heart.examine: This heart is pitch black; dark red blood still drops from the severed aorta and venous. A pattern of barely visible deep green veins stretches like a net over the black heart. Globs of undefined slime keep oozing from the heart, as if it was not entirely dead.
a black heart.name: a black heart

an ancient, jewelled helmet.examine:
Made from a dull, almost blackened metal, and forged by dwarven hands in an era
now long gone by, this helmet is a true masterpiece. A sharp, faded-golden
ridge rises from the nose-guard up onto the helmet's crest. The brim, crafted
from some unknown metal, shines with an array of otherwordly jewelry. At the
edges, a smattering of sapphires give way to a set of topazes. At the center of
a circle of opals is a great crystal, glowing as if it was meant to endow the
wearer with a third, unwavering eye.
You realise that this helmet was enchanted by Khuzdum.
an ancient, jewelled helmet.name: an ancient, jewelled helmet

a slender barbed arrow.examine:
This arrow is made of very hard, dark wood. It is slender and straight, with
long, black feathers glued to one end. The tip is sharp, with nasty barbs of
iron to rip and tear at the flesh of its victims.
a slender barbed arrow.name: a slender barbed arrow

a twisted crown.examine:
It is made from a metal, now blackened by some fire. The design is that of
twisting snakes, and two cobras meet face first in the front of the crown,
in their fangs they hold a single, small but perfect ruby.
a twisted crown.name: a twisted crown

a sturdy reinforced leather helmet.examine:
This durable helmet is moulded from four pieces of thick, hardened leather
that have been thoroughly stitched together and reinforced with additional
layers. The inside is comfortably lined with rabbit fur. Some strips of leather
hang down the back, providing additonal protection for the neck and ears.
a sturdy reinforced leather helmet.name: a sturdy reinforced leather helmet

a bracelet with rainbow-coloured gems.examine:
This bracelet is made of several simple chains linked together to six
settings. Three of the settings are teardrops and three are diamond-shaped,
diamond and tear following each other. No clasp adorns the bracelet, thus it
needs to be pulled over the hand to be worn.
The bracelet has been embedded with brilliant adamants.

id_details.name: a bracelet with rainbow-coloured gems
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a bracelet with rainbow-coloured gems.name: a bracelet with rainbow-coloured gems

a ring with a translucent blue gem.examine:
The ring is round and perfectly shaped to fit around a finger. Only a small
marking can be found on the inside of the ring, a signature of the silversmith
that forged it. The top of the ring features a square, silver setting with room
for a gem.
The ring has been embedded with a star sapphire.

id_details.name: a ring with a translucent blue gem
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a ring with a translucent blue gem.name: a ring with a translucent blue gem

a ring with a pale blue crystal.examine:
The ring is round and perfectly shaped to fit around a finger. Only a small
marking can be found on the inside of the ring, a signature of the silversmith
that forged it. The top of the ring features a square, silver setting with room
for a gem.
The ring has been embedded with a blue crystal.

id_details.name: a ring with a pale blue crystal
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a ring with a pale blue crystal.name: a ring with a pale blue crystal

a ring with a deep green gem.examine:
The ring is round and perfectly shaped to fit around a finger. Only a small
marking can be found on the inside of the ring, a signature of the silversmith
that forged it. The top of the ring features a square, silver setting with room
for a gem.
The ring has been embedded with a lustrous green emerald.

id_details.name: a ring with a deep green gem
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a ring with a deep green gem.name: a ring with a deep green gem

a ring with a chatoyant gem.examine:
The ring is round and perfectly shaped to fit around a finger. Only a small
marking can be found on the inside of the ring, a signature of the silversmith
that forged it. The top of the ring features a square, silver setting with room
for a gem.
The ring has been embedded with a tiger's eye.

id_details.name: a ring with a chatoyant gem
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a ring with a chatoyant gem.name: a ring with a chatoyant gem

a ring with a cerise gem.examine:
The ring is round and perfectly shaped to fit around a finger. Only a small
marking can be found on the inside of the ring, a signature of the silversmith
that forged it. The top of the ring features a square, silver setting with room
for a gem.
The ring has been embedded with a rubellite.

id_details.name: a ring with a cerise gem
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a ring with a cerise gem.name: a ring with a cerise gem

the palantir of Amon Sul.examine:
One of the greatest artefacts ever wrought by mortal hands, this palantir is
considered one of the greater stones, both because of its size and its power.
It is a large spherical stone nearly three feet across, of a black crystal of
unknown composition. The surface of the palantir is perfectly smooth and there
are no marks to suggest any orientation. Yet, what lore one has gathered tells
you that if one can master the stone, then all the lands around are yours to
survey. Around the base of the stone runs a delicate silvery cradle, providing
a base upon which to sit the palantir.
the palantir of Amon Sul.name: the palantir of Amon Sul

a strange black helmet.examine:
The helmet shifts and shimmers in the light as you attempt to examine
it. Strange shapes flit across the surface and your head is filled with
strange whispers that sends a chill down your spine. There is an exotic
looking faceplate which seems made of some translucent material you have
never seen before.
a strange black helmet.name: a strange black helmet

a glass key.examine:
This is a long thin key, the bulk of it made of a single piece of dark glass.
The surface is scratched with small lines and symbols. The stem of the key is
fused with a flat handle of black rock, smooth to the touch.
a glass key.name: a glass key

a metal key.examine:
The key of metal has a small loop at its top, which makes it easier to wear on
a keyring. Some ridges have been cut into its base.
a metal key.name: a metal key

a libram.examine:
This thick tome consists of two square covers, over which the grey hide of a
beast has been sewn. A silver clasp is affixed along the edge of the book,
sealing it. The spine consists of a series of glyphs and wards.
a libram.name: a libram

a silver rod, marked with glyphs.examine:
This is undoubtedly a valuable object, but the small runes engraved into the
silver at one end do not reveal its secrets.

id_details.name: a silver rod, marked with glyphs

a silver rod, marked with glyphs.name: a silver rod, marked with glyphs

a stone club.examine:
This hefty stone club is roughly four feet in height. Its tip is much thicker
than its base, which can be used as a handle. It is stained with blood at the
top, hinting it has already been used as weapon.
a stone club.name: a stone club

the head of a large warg.examine:
Once the head of what must have been one of the largest wargs ever, it is now
but a trophy of a hunter. Huge fangs and a dark matted fur, stained with blood
show that the once strong and powerful beast was a terrible foe in a fight.

id_details.name: the head of a large warg

the head of a large warg.name: the head of a large warg

the Elven shortsword with a runic inscri.examine:
The runes are very ancient and definitely elven-made, but so arcane and old
that you cannot decipher anything.

id_details.name: the Elven shortsword with a runic inscription
special_abilities: It is efficient against Trolls and Orcs.

the Elven shortsword with a runic inscri.name: the Elven shortsword with a runic inscription

the gleaming broadsword.examine:
The broadsword is exquisitely made, and its hilt is studded with tiny
diamonds. On the pommel is a brilliant emerald. The blade shines with
a golden hue, and a faint golden trail follows the blade when swung.
the gleaming broadsword.name: the gleaming broadsword

a silver morion.examine:
This helm shows exceptional craftmanship, the likes of which has not been seen
on Arda in many a year. Its surface gleams in even faint lighting, and has been
decorated with silver filagree, detailing an image of the two trees of ancient
Valinor. While not as sturdy perhaps as dwarven work, it nevertheless must have
been made by experts, undoubtedly Noldorin.
a silver morion.name: a silver morion

a winged metal helmet.examine: Forged in a creative shape, this rare and sturdy piece of armour is lined with a brown textile and reinforced with an additional layer of a dark, scorched metal. The helm protects the wearer through the shape of a five-pointed star that splits at the neck and high forehead, covering the nose and ears as well, and leaving a space for breathing. An enruned insignia of a silvery metal is inlaid at the top and indicates that the helm was wrought by Numenorean smiths. Attached on the two sideplates are three dark layers of thin metallic wings gracefully pointing backwards.
a winged metal helmet.name: a winged metal helmet

the black many-tailed whip.examine:
Each tail of this vicious weapon is over thirty feet, ending with a cruel
curved blade. It appears designed to trap foes, and rend them while they
struggle in its coils.
the black many-tailed whip.name: the black many-tailed whip

the huge flaming sword.examine:
Longer than the height of a man and a half, this is a truly massive weapon.
The metal is strange and black, and there is no wrapping on the hilt.
The blade is continually covered in reddish flames.

id_details.name: the huge flaming sword
properties: evil metal slashing weapon of fiery nature

the huge flaming sword.name: the huge flaming sword

the huge, black mace.examine:
This formidable weapon has been forged from a strange, black material, much
too heavy to be iron-shod wood or even solid iron. The long, smooth shaft
almost seems too slender to support the enormous, cage-shaped head, but the
massive strength of the material makes it hold. Judging from the hilt, the
weapon is supposed to be wielded single-handed, but its sheer weight makes
this seem like an almost impossible task for anyone save the strongest of
warriors. Once swung properly though, this cruel mace is perfectly designed
to pound and smash through anything that might dare stand in its way.
the huge, black mace.name: the huge, black mace

the Axe of Durin.examine: This wonderful dwarven great axe was once wielded by Durin the Deathless, the father and King of the dwarves of Moria. Forged in the mightiest of their great, ancient furnaces, it emanates awe and power. The shaft is shod with truesilver, and both the hilt and the knob at the top shine with the purest of gold. On either side of the top, two huge blades leave you wondering how anyone, save Aule himself, could ever create such a truly magnificent masterpiece of craftsmanship.
the Axe of Durin.name: the Axe of Durin

a sapphire ring.examine:
A translucent, deep blue sapphire, cut in cabochon shape, has been mounted on
this elaborately chiselled and enruned ring; a white six-rayed star shines
in the centre of the jewel.
You realise that this ring was enchanted by Harley.
a sapphire ring.name: a sapphire ring

a dark, silvery stone.examine:
This stone is a perfect sphere, and has a smoothly polished surface covered
with silvery streaks. It is engraved with a small rune that has a shape
resembling a key.
a dark, silvery stone.name: a dark, silvery stone

a golden emerald ring.examine:
An exceptionally smooth, polished band of gold wraps around in an unending
circle to form this ring. Miniature gold vines with intricately engraved leaves
weave around to form a small inset, in which rests a finely cut emerald.
a golden emerald ring.name: a golden emerald ring

a herbal.examine:
The book has a slightly hardened leather cover with an intricate carving
of a dark green plant with long stalks and bulbous white flowers. Upon
flipping the pages, several hand-drawn pictures of various flowers and
herbs adorn each page with shorthand markings you cannot make out clearly.
a herbal.name: a herbal

a black candle.examine:
Your eyes are immediately drawn to the dancing, dark flame. Its flickering soft
light makes you feel suddenly weary, maybe you should rest a while.

id_details.name: a black candle
special_abilities: It has one charge left out of one for a level fourteen sleep.

a black candle.name: a black candle

a wooden ring.examine: Intricate patterns are etched along the outer edge of this ring, which is carved entirely from wood and is light in weight and colour.
a wooden ring.name: a wooden ring

an ivory scroll.examine:
This tightly rolled scroll is woven of rough fibers covering the spectrum
between black and white. Its outer side is densely inscribed with spidery
runes in ivory ink. A large glowing rune \"N\" is written on the top of the
scroll. A golden seal imprinted with a white hand secures it along the middle.

id_details.name: an ivory scroll
special_abilities: It has level twenty spells of call lightning, detect evil, and bless.

an ivory scroll.name: an ivory scroll

a black scroll.examine:
This scroll is an unevenly cut piece of coal-black parchment covered by thin,
silvery letters. The fragile parchment has the look of a scorched leaf that
would crumble if not for the mesh of silvery veins holding it together.

id_details.name: a black scroll
special_abilities: It has level twenty spells of heal, strength, and energy drain.

a black scroll.name: a black scroll

a smelly piece of worm hide.examine:
As you look at the hide, its terrible stench makes you dizzy. An almost
tangible aura of evil emanates from it. However its weight and resistance
make a perfect shield out of it.

id_details.name: a smelly piece of worm hide

a smelly piece of worm hide.name: a smelly piece of worm hide

a pair of white chain mail gloves.examine:
These gloves are made of a strange, non-reflective white material. The links
on the back of the gloves are woven in two layers to resist damage, whilst
the palm and the wrist consist of only one layer to improve mobility.
Permanent equilibrium of temperature makes them comfortable to the touch even
if they are exposed to heat or cold.

id_details.name: a pair of white chain mail gloves

a pair of white chain mail gloves.name: a pair of white chain mail gloves

a black runed sceptre.examine:
This is a three-foot-long sceptre, with a cylindrical shaft that is two inches
in diameter, except at the head, where it widens. It appears to be made of
some rare metal or alloy, robust and yet light, and deep black in colour. On
either side, the shaft is finely inlaid with a band of shimmering silver. On
their surfaces, strange, ancient-looking runes have been engraved, forming an
inscription.
a black runed sceptre.name: a black runed sceptre

a black metal wristband.examine:
This wristband is made of some dull black metal. Not any decorations or other
scratches can be found on it. Its plain black colour seems to absorb every beam
of light. The metal feels cold, and some strange energy seems to flow from the
item when touched.
a black metal wristband.name: a black metal wristband

a shining breastplate.examine: Although it looks as though it has been forged from the purest silver, this breastplate is very light for its size.  Also, the surface seems incredibly hard.
a shining breastplate.name: a shining breastplate

the Dragonhelm.examine:
It is a great helm, capable of covering the wearer's head completely.  It
is in the form of a dragon's head, jaws gaping to reveal the faceplate.  Its
faceplate is perforated by small holes to allow breathing, and two
laen-windows protect the eyes from all attacks.
the Dragonhelm.name: the Dragonhelm

a pungent brew.examine:
Little juniper berries float on the surface of this brew, which emits a strong,
pungent fragrance. Remains of cooked, dark green leaves with rusty brown
backs lie on the bottom of the cup.

id_details.name: a pungent brew
special_abilities: It increases mana by fifteen and mana regeneration by fifteen for two hours.
After that, it increases mana by seven and mana regeneration by seven for four hours.
After that, it decreases mana by five and mana regeneration by three for six hours.

a pungent brew.name: a pungent brew

a tarnished arrowhead.examine:
This tarnished silver arrowhead has lost all the shine and sharpness it once
must have possessed. Nearly three inches in length, with an extremely narrow
and jagged width, it is rather useless, bearing only a hole at its base where
the shaft of the arrow would be attached.
a tarnished arrowhead.name: a tarnished arrowhead

a mottled cloak.examine:
The predominant colours of the cloak seem to be well suited for
concealing the wearer in the woods or in the wild. The cloak seems to be
quite light but warm. However it stinks of rotten flesh and on each side
of the clasp are sewn distinctly elvish ears.
a mottled cloak.name: a mottled cloak

an enhanced herbal kit.examine:
This bag is made of thin, soft leather. Inside, the bag holds several simple
tools wrapped in woolen cloth, and an assortment of small containers, bottles,
vials, and bowls. Seven pockets line the inside of the bag.
You look into the pockets and see:
An exquisite retort of polished copper.
A handful of small, silvery bottles and vials.
an enhanced herbal kit.name: an enhanced herbal kit

a purple scroll.examine:
This carefully rolled scroll is inscribed with crisp runic writings no doubt
written carefully with a sharp instrument. The runes and the fine parchment
itself seem to carry a faint purple aura.

id_details.name: a purple scroll
special_abilities: It has level twenty spells of cure blindness, sanctuary, and poison.

a purple scroll.name: a purple scroll

the scalp of Smiles.examine:
Someone did a really foul job on a fallen (?) foe, rudely cutting this poor
bastard's hair off the head. The hair forms sticky wisps, full of clotted
blood.
the scalp of Smiles.name: the scalp of Smiles

an elven longbow.examine:
This is one of the great longbows of the Galadhrim. No decorations mar the
perfect surface of the bow, made out of a single piece of solid wood. It has
been crafted with great care by the hands of a master artisan. The bow has an
air of lethal elegance. It is truly a tool meant for the hunt - no matter if
the prey is the magnificent deer or the foul orc.
an elven longbow.name: an elven longbow

a silvan satchel.examine:
Soft leather has been woven seamlessly to form a sturdy, flexible container. A
long strap attaches to both ends of the satchel, so that it can be slung over a
wearer's shoulder. The leather has been dyed with mottled colours that would
make for excellent camouflage in a forest.
a silvan satchel.name: a silvan satchel

a soft pair of padded boots.examine:
These boots are made from a supple and pliant material. Soft to the
touch, they have an elfin feel to them.

id_details.name: a soft pair of padded boots

a soft pair of padded boots.name: a soft pair of padded boots

a large, shimmering pearl.examine:
This pearl is as large as a dove's egg. Its surface is flawless, lacking any
mark or scratch. Brilliant motes of light shine through the blue-grey surface,
giving the pearl the sheen of starlight in the foam of the sea.

id_details.name: a large, shimmering pearl
special_abilities: The light of Aman will shine on a Dwarf wearing it.
It can be used to unleash the power gathered within it, causing anyone nearby to be temporarily parched and blinded.
Unleashing its power will bestow beneficial magic on the user.
Its power will slowly build up over time.

a large, shimmering pearl.name: a large, shimmering pearl

a golden garnet ring.examine:
An exceptionally smooth, polished band of gold wraps around in an unending
circle to form this ring. Miniature gold vines with intricately engraved leaves
weave around to form a small inset, in which rests a finely cut garnet.
a golden garnet ring.name: a golden garnet ring

a golden topaz ring.examine:
An exceptionally smooth, polished band of gold wraps around in an unending
circle to form this ring. Miniature gold vines with intricately engraved leaves
weave around to form a small inset, in which rests a finely cut topaz.
a golden topaz ring.name: a golden topaz ring

a belt of fell hide.examine:
This durable belt is made of dark hide covered with thick scales. The scales
make a steady pattern on this thick and broad belt. The inner side is rough
hide, making the belt very robust. The scales feel sturdy and tightly attached
to the hide. Considering the size, the belt is surprisingly light to carry.
a belt of fell hide.name: a belt of fell hide

a wightblade.examine:
The sword is long, longer than most men's legs. Its surface is plain and
black, without markings, and it seems to hide the light around it. The
hilt and handle are cold to the touch.
a wightblade.name: a wightblade

a fell blade.examine:
Though the surface of this weapon is dull and blackened, the sharpened edges
glint with reflected light. The flat of the blade is carven with strange runes
and a thick black binding is wrapped along the handle. The bleached skull of
some small creature is tied loosely to the hilt.
a fell blade.name: a fell blade

a black key.examine: This little key is made from a black metal of unknown origin.
a black key.name: a black key

an archaic copper wristband.examine: This copper wristband designed in a simple, timeless fashion that displays fine craftmanship. It is made of what appears to be solid copper and it weighs considerabely more than one would expect from a bracelet of its size. It is roughly two inches wide and at least a quarter-inch thick. The surface is surprisingly smooth for an item made of copper, and its inside edges are rounded as to not chafe against the skin of the wearer. The only embellishment on the bracelet is a series of archaic runes going full circle around the outside, in line with the centre of the band. The meaning of the inscription is probably lost; however, the runes themselves glow with a faint, barely discernible golden light, revealing that this item may yet possess magical properties.
an archaic copper wristband.name: an archaic copper wristband

a large visored helmet.examine:
This is a huge helm made of compact thick metal. It is, however, very light
to carry. The front mask is shaped into several hideous monsters that glare
at you from every angle. It would take a very brave warrior to fight someone
wearing this helmet.
a large visored helmet.name: a large visored helmet

a silvery crown.examine:
The silvery crown is crafted by a strong shining metal, strong enough
to withstand terrible blows, yet flexible enough to fit any head.
Circling the length of the silver band there are inscribed elven runes
that glow faintly, translating to 'the Guardian'.

id_details.name: a silvery crown
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a silvery crown.name: a silvery crown

a small elven bag.examine:
The bag is round and measures one and a half handspan in diameter. It is made
of various patches of soft leather, all coloured in different shades of brown.
On one of the patches there are some fine silvery stitchings, depicting various
items of everyday use. The bag is attached to a strong but soft string, which
can be used to close it or to wear it on a belt. The inside of the bag is made
of green fabric which seems to shimmer slightly. It almost feels as if
something invisible was moving within.
a small elven bag.name: a small elven bag

a shimmering leaf of metal.examine:
At first this leaf looks as if it just fell from a living tree, while a close
inspection reveals many fine details of elven craftsmanship. The leaf is made
of some silvery metal, yet it has a strong touch of shimmering green running
along the veined surface.
a shimmering leaf of metal.name: a shimmering leaf of metal

a pair of knee-high hunting boots.examine:
The suppleness and comfort of these almost completely black, elaborately
decorated boots is nothing short of surprising, especially when considering
their toughness and durability. The elaborate craftsmanship and uncompromising
attention to detail that went into their making reveal their noble elven
origins.

id_details.name: a pair of knee-high hunting boots

a pair of knee-high hunting boots.name: a pair of knee-high hunting boots

a dented, dull leaf of metal.examine:
This leaf seems like the creation of a great craftsman, yet the metal is
dented in some places. A closer inspection reveals many artistic details, such
as barely discernible veins running along the surface.

id_details.name: a dented, dull leaf of metal

a dented, dull leaf of metal.name: a dented, dull leaf of metal

an elven letter.examine:
This letter was written on a fine, yet robust parchment. The dark ink of the
neat, Elven writing is still clearly visible. The letter looks as if it has
been lying in a dirty, humid place for quite a long time, but is still
readable only thanks to the thin leather envelope that enfolds it.
an elven letter.name: an elven letter

a shop key.examine: You see a small, well-used metal key.
a shop key.name: a shop key

a rusty medallion.examine:
The surface of the medallion is golden in colour with a few silvery threads
running across its surface. Yet its material is neither gold nor silver as it
is very light and tarnished by greenish mould and brownish spots of rust. A
profusion of tiny flowers decorates the finely crafted lid and a daisy-chain
pattern runs along the sides.
a rusty medallion.name: a rusty medallion

the black sword.examine:
This strangely beautiful sword is completely black, greedily absorbing every
ray of light. The razor-sharp blade, covered with magical runes, is in constant
vibration, emitting a faint humming noise.

id_details.name: the black sword
special_abilities: It is efficient against spirits and light.

the black sword.name: the black sword

a herbal draught.examine:
A fragrant armoma comes from the seal of the small clay bottle. The remains of
an indiscernable etiket, whether from the current or from the previous content,
can be spotted on the side of the bottle.

id_details.name: a herbal draught
special_abilities: It increases hit point regeneration by fifteen and constitution by two for four hours.
After that, it increases hit point regeneration by five and decreases dexterity by two for five hours.

a herbal draught.name: a herbal draught

a phosphorescent bottle.examine:
The bottle is partially filled with a strange slightly luminous liquid. On the
ground of the bottle grows a thin layer of phosphorescent moss.

id_details.name: a phosphorescent bottle
special_abilities: It increases perception by three and decreases constitution by one for ten hours.
After that, it increases perception by two and decreases constitution by one for fifty hours.
After that, it increases perception by one for forty hours.

a phosphorescent bottle.name: a phosphorescent bottle

a bound sheaf of papers.examine:
These papers contain within them instructions for making a magical brew.
Holding them and reading them would be more informative.
a bound sheaf of papers.name: a bound sheaf of papers

an ancient dwarven shield.examine:
Standing more than three feet high, this shield is large enough to provide
cover for even the tallest of Dwarves. The shield is constructed from dark,
silvery metal making it heavy and yet it remains well balanced. On the face
of the shield, the raised image of a battle axe crossed with a forging hammer
has been skilfully hammered out. Around the edges are the magical runes used
in the creation of the shield.
an ancient dwarven shield.name: an ancient dwarven shield

a grey tunic.examine: The material is soft and comfortable. It resembles elvish make.
a grey tunic.name: a grey tunic

a circlet of golden flowers.examine:
The delicate green stems of the golden flowers are woven together on the
inner side of the circlet, and its outer side is formed by the golden
star-shaped flower-heads that seem to shine as if the Sun itself was looking
through their petals. Golden and green, with every flower, leaf or stem in it
perfect in shape and colour, the circlet looks like a jewelled ornament, a
diadem fit for a king to wear.
a circlet of golden flowers.name: a circlet of golden flowers

a few golden, star-like blooms.examine:
Like stars tumbled from the heavens, the petite blooms of elanor radiate an
inner luminescence harkening to a long-ago dream...
a few golden, star-like blooms.name: a few golden, star-like blooms

a few flowers of snow-white and palest g.examine:
Small ivory-toned blooms crown slender, pale-green stalks. The flowers seem to
glow with an ethereal light, glimmering even in the faintest starlight.

id_details.name: a few flowers of snow-white and palest green

a few flowers of snow-white and palest g.name: a few flowers of snow-white and palest green

some silvery moss.examine:
A multitude of tiny stars makes up this silvery carpet. This moss, indigenous
to Lorien, is soft and spongy to the touch. It grows in the shape of stars or
snowflakes, all distinct, to match the grey and silver of mellyrn bark. Where
it grows deep, it attains a shade of green, as if a green light was shining
through a snow blizzard in a twilight hour.
some silvery moss.name: some silvery moss

a jade-encrusted key.examine:
The tiny key is made of a light silvery alloy. Its handle is encrusted with
jade that glows with a soft shade of green.
a jade-encrusted key.name: a jade-encrusted key

a blackened pendant.examine:
The pendant is made of blackened stone. Its edges are rough and jagged, and
it fits easily into a grown man's hand. Upon a closer look it appears that
an image of a single white hand has been burnt or printed into the stone. A
soft leather string has been attached to it with a metal hook.
a blackened pendant.name: a blackened pendant

a silvery elven bracelet.examine:
This old bracelet is created by the elven smiths of old. Carefully fashioned
and gently perfected it is polished smooth and shaped into a twisting vine of
silver leaves. The leaves have small golden strands inlaid on the surface and
these faint traces of gold gleam very faintly. What appears to be small cracks
in the metal are present all over the ancient silver piece.
a silvery elven bracelet.name: a silvery elven bracelet

a crumpled scroll.examine:
A dense text has been written on the crumpled scroll. In the margin crude
drawings have been traced, in which a butchered spider and a pile of dead
corpses can be recognised.
a crumpled scroll.name: a crumpled scroll

a silver crown.examine:
A thin silver thread lies in a circle, holding sparkling
diamonds upon it, like a crown of stars.
a silver crown.name: a silver crown

a bracelet with fiery red gems.examine:
This bracelet is made of several simple chains linked together to six
settings. Three of the settings are teardrops and three are diamond-shaped,
diamond and tear following each other. No clasp adorns the bracelet, thus it
needs to be pulled over the hand to be worn.
The bracelet has been embedded with red rubies.

id_details.name: a bracelet with fiery red gems
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a bracelet with fiery red gems.name: a bracelet with fiery red gems

a bracelet with clear, sparkling gems.examine:
This bracelet is made of several simple chains linked together to six
settings. Three of the settings are teardrops and three are diamond-shaped,
diamond and tear following each other. No clasp adorns the bracelet, thus it
needs to be pulled over the hand to be worn.
The bracelet has been embedded with beautiful diamonds.

id_details.name: a bracelet with clear, sparkling gems
special_abilities: It is efficient against long range spells.

a bracelet with clear, sparkling gems.name: a bracelet with clear, sparkling gems

a plain pair of riding boots.examine:
These tall boots are made of smooth leather and reach to just below the knee.
Narrow strips of well-tanned leather serve as laces according a good fit to
the wearer. Thick heels make them useful for holding their place in stirrups
and the thin hard leather soles are lined on the inside with a slim
comfortable layer of animal skin.

id_details.name: a plain pair of riding boots

a plain pair of riding boots.name: a plain pair of riding boots

a bulbous root.examine:
This root, about two handspans long and several fingers wide, is twisted
and full of bulging protrusions. It is a pale brownish-yellow, with hair-
like rootlets coming from eyes. Dirt fills the crevices between bulges.
a bulbous root.name: a bulbous root

a flask of orkish draught.examine:
The flask contains a liquid strangely like whiskey. It burns your nose when
you smell it, but it seems you must gulp it for it to have effect.
a flask of orkish draught.name: a flask of orkish draught

a blue scroll.examine:
The fine-fibered parchment from which this scroll has been made carries a
distinctive blue tint. Most noticeable upon this neatly coiled scroll, however,
are some arcane runes that look to have been written by a careful hand.

id_details.name: a blue scroll
special_abilities: It has a level twenty spell of heal.

a blue scroll.name: a blue scroll

a vellum scroll.examine:
Ancient runes trace a circle around this vellum scroll, with a single glyph
encased in the centre.

id_details.name: a vellum scroll
special_abilities: It has level twenty-five spells of protection from evil, bless, and breath of briskness.

a vellum scroll.name: a vellum scroll

a twisted rock fragment.examine:
This rock, not much larger than a small hand, appears too twisted and
convoluted to be natural. Veins of a silvery metallic substance glisten on
the black surface, like liquid ice. Periodically the rock seems to pulsate,
as if the insides were full of a hidden power waiting for its time to break
free.
a twisted rock fragment.name: a twisted rock fragment

a finely woven cloak.examine:
Almost unmatched in quality, this fine cloak shifts and shimmers, providing
the wearer with cover and warmth in any condition. The cloak seems to fade
into the background, giving the owner an almost unearthly essence and an
eerie ability to evade both blows and foes alike.
a finely woven cloak.name: a finely woven cloak

a shining pair of greaves.examine:
These greaves, made of pure silver, are light and resilient beyond your
expectations. Delicate engravings decorate each plate.
a shining pair of greaves.name: a shining pair of greaves

a shining pair of vambraces.examine:
They shine brightly, reflecting even the smallest light as does burnished
silver. But they are surprisingly light for silver, and the joints are
so well articulated that they barely hinder movement at all.
a shining pair of vambraces.name: a shining pair of vambraces

a silk cap.examine:
The only protection this cap offers is against a chilly morning breeze. It is
made of many brightly coloured silk pieces. The silk shimmers slightly and two
thin strings can be used to secure the cap on the head.
a silk cap.name: a silk cap

a finely woven hood.examine:
This hood is of exquisite quality, woven by some of the finest weavers
known - the Elves of Lothlorien. No discernable pattern can be seen, yet
the hood seems to shift and shimmer by itself, hinting of qualities beyond
what can be seen by the mortal eye.
a finely woven hood.name: a finely woven hood

a leather helmet.examine:
Rabbit fur lines the inside of this skullcap making it both comfortable and
warm. Two small straps at the back of the cap can be tightened to ensure a snug
fit, which will be useful in high winds.
a leather helmet.name: a leather helmet

a reinforced leather helmet.examine:
This cap is moulded from four pieces of dried, hardened leather. The pieces
have been stitched tightly together with two further flaps that you can fasten
under your chin.
a reinforced leather helmet.name: a reinforced leather helmet

a sturdy leather helmet.examine:
This conical leather helmet is joined together with two strips of stiff
cowhide, and fastened with four rather dull metal studs. The rim fits rather
low on your head, just above your eyebrows.
a sturdy leather helmet.name: a sturdy leather helmet

a fine leather helmet.examine:
This conical leather helmet is joined together with two strips of stiff
cowhide, and fastened with four rather dull metal studs. The rim fits rather
low on your head, just above your eyebrows.
a fine leather helmet.name: a fine leather helmet

a pair of lobstered steel gauntlets.examine: These gauntlets are made of smooth steel, patiently brushed and polished to a worn matte grey. The craftsmanship of the gauntlets is clearly the work of a master smith: the scales of steel that form the protection for the bearer's fingers are forged together so that they overlap when forming a closed fist and, smoothly slide into each other when relaxing the grip. This movement offers the wearer both excellent protection and significant flexibility. An old, mostly faded inscription can be seen just below the joint at the wrist, where the gauntlet's design allows it to be connected to a pair of vambraces. The markings are now mostly unreadable, although there is something that may be a stylized symbol involving an 'A', and some runes depicting two crossed swords and a shield.

id_details.name: a pair of lobstered steel gauntlets

a pair of lobstered steel gauntlets.name: a pair of lobstered steel gauntlets

a wooden bear.examine:
This is a small wooden figurine, carved with exquisite care for the shape it
resembles. The wood has been selected and treated to make the bear seem almost
alive and breathing. Standing on its rear legs its mouth is open, as if a great
roar is about to erupt.
a wooden bear.name: a wooden bear

a wooden box.examine:
This box, although simply constructed, is beautiful. The wood is dark and
fragrant, with colours that compliment each other perfectly.
a wooden box.name: a wooden box

an oaken rod.examine:
The rod is made of hard oak wood. It is almost two feet long and one end of it
seems to be shaped into some kind of a key. Along the rod several pictures
have been carved and beside them some glyphs can be seen.
an oaken rod.name: an oaken rod

a mushroom.examine: Brown and cream-white, it is slightly dirty from the forest floor.
a mushroom.name: a mushroom

a brown bottle.examine:
The liquid inside the bottle is thick, kind of like syrup. Smells nice
though.

id_details.name: a brown bottle
special_abilities: It cures amibia, poison, venom, alathen, aganar, minuial, firndal, psylonia, and arachnia.

a brown bottle.name: a brown bottle

a bale of wheat.examine:
A large bundle of ripe wheat, harvested and tied up into a practical bale.
Spanning about two times two feet and about a foot high, the dried bale
contains a considerable mass of food, ready to be stored for harsher times.
a bale of wheat.name: a bale of wheat

a rib-bone of a skeleton.examine:
The rib-bone is dry and well preserved, as magic was holding it together until
recently. It is sharp-pointed and can be used as a weapon, but a rather
ineffective one. Being the bone of a formerly undead skeleton, a sombre aura
fences it, as if it was already partially in the world of the Shadows.
a rib-bone of a skeleton.name: a rib-bone of a skeleton

a leather wallet.examine:
Rough, leather stitches hold together the seam of this rawhide carrying case.
The cured leather that comprises the majority of the wallet is firm but the
stitches permit effortless bending and opening.
a leather wallet.name: a leather wallet

a cluster of yellow flowers.examine:
Grassy, grey-green foliage frames delicate bright yellow flowers, which
have beautiful, glossy petals.
a cluster of yellow flowers.name: a cluster of yellow flowers

a slender-stemmed plant, with a brown he.examine:
These slender, pithy-stemmed plants grow to over four feet in height, and
are topped by long, fat, dark brown heads. Dense clusters of coarse, long
green leaves surround each fruit-bearing stem.

id_details.name: a slender-stemmed plant, with a brown head

a slender-stemmed plant, with a brown he.name: a slender-stemmed plant, with a brown head

a prickly plant with blue flower heads.examine:
The bright, steely blue of this three foot high plant's neat flower heads is
particularly striking combined with the almost white stems. Each flower is an
almost perfect globe-shape, and very prickly. The leaves are grey-green and
covered in cobwebby hairs.

id_details.name: a prickly plant with blue flower heads

a prickly plant with blue flower heads.name: a prickly plant with blue flower heads

a slim silvery wristband.examine:
This wristband is less than an inch wide and has been hammered out of pure silver.
Its surface is so finely polished that it reflects light like a mirror. Small
runes are skilfully engraved into its surface around both edges, and a line of
small sapphires is set into the central line of the wristband.
a slim silvery wristband.name: a slim silvery wristband

the broad Elven blade.examine:
The metal of this sword is white, cold to the touch and yet oddly reassuring.
The runes on the blade are easily recognisable: this weapon was forged by the
highest skilled elves, with the purpose of vanquishing the foul powers of evil.

id_details.name: the broad Elven blade
special_abilities: It is efficient against Trolls and Orcs.

the broad Elven blade.name: the broad Elven blade

a fine pair of hard leather trousers.examine:
Thigh and shin guards constructed from hardened leather have been joined with
extra thick knee guards. Although these trousers-come-greaves offer good
protection, its wearer will suffer quite a bit of discomfort.

id_details.name: a fine pair of hard leather trousers

a fine pair of hard leather trousers.name: a fine pair of hard leather trousers

a sturdy pair of hard leather trousers.examine:
The thigh and shin guards of these trousers-come-greaves have been joined
together with strong hardened knee guards. It seems they will provide the
wearer with decent protection, as well as perhaps shielding from the elements.

id_details.name: a sturdy pair of hard leather trousers

a sturdy pair of hard leather trousers.name: a sturdy pair of hard leather trousers

a pair of hard leather trousers.examine:
Thin thigh and shin guards of hardened leather have been joined together with a
set of thick knee guards, to create a pair of trousers-come-greaves that will
offer the wearer nice protection, whilst allowing some flexibility.

id_details.name: a pair of hard leather trousers

a pair of hard leather trousers.name: a pair of hard leather trousers

an immaculate white tunic.examine:
Crafted with exquisite workmanship, this pure white soft tunic covers one's
entire body. Anyone wearing it would look like a most rich and powerful lord.
an immaculate white tunic.name: an immaculate white tunic

some white-star forget-me-nots.examine:
These beautiful star-shaped blooms have light blue petals and a white-yellow
ring together with a slight minty scent. Some say that this flora will keep
your love from forgetting you and serve as a symbol of love.
some white-star forget-me-nots.name: some white-star forget-me-nots

a red rose with leaves and thorny stem.examine:
A long, straight emerald green stem with a few oval leaves is topped by many
rounds of beautiful crimson red petals which emanate a sweet perfume smell.

id_details.name: a red rose with leaves and thorny stem

a red rose with leaves and thorny stem.name: a red rose with leaves and thorny stem

a white rose with leaves and thorny stem.examine:
Sweetly scented white petals unfold around a pale yellow-fringed centre. The
bloom rests upon a leafy green stem studded with sharp thorns.

id_details.name: a white rose with leaves and thorny stem

a white rose with leaves and thorny stem.name: a white rose with leaves and thorny stem

a rough wooden horn.examine:
The thick and knotted branch from which this horn was carved appears to have
once been a beech tree's mighty bough. Its rough surface, both within and
without, shows that it was either left unfinished or was made with little
appreciation for the wood's quality. It has the shape of a ram's horn but
having no distinct mouthpiece it is a marvel that any sound resonates through
it. A good blow, though, produces a deep, reverberating call. A thin, twisted
vine is secured at either end so that the horn can be easily slung.
a rough wooden horn.name: a rough wooden horn

a small pouch.examine:
The pouch is small and brown, closed with a loop of string. Some dirty-white
powder can be seen on its surface.
a small pouch.name: a small pouch

a gleaming belt.examine:
The belt is a chain of smooth rings linked together and fastened by a buckle
crafted in the shape of a wingless dragon biting his tail. The metal the belt
is made of is marvellously light and golden in colour like the rays of sun
in the hour before the sunset. A faint warm radiance surrounds the rings,
making your eyes linger on their smooth metal as if trying to capture the
elusive glow.
a gleaming belt.name: a gleaming belt

a banded ring.examine:
You see a very old ring composed of two silvery bands wound together. One band
is heavily tarnished from the passage of time, but the other gleams as if new.
Some runes were carved on the tarnished band of the ring, but are no longer
readable.
a banded ring.name: a banded ring

a reinforced oak staff.examine:
About six feet long, this staff was crafted from a perfect branch of oak
by a master woodworker. Runes are carved on its sides, and its surface
is smoothly polished. Truly this is a masterwork of carpentry.
Looking closer, you are able to see some more details: namely, silvery bands
encircle it from top to bottom, an orb of black metal surrounds its tip, a
lustrous fire opal has been inlaid in it.
Atop the staff, a bronze claw holds a large blue crystal, which glows faintly.
This staff fits quite well within your grasp.
a reinforced oak staff.name: a reinforced oak staff

a copper ring.examine:
This band of copper is thicker than most rings, and it is strangely warm
to the touch. It is well wrought, but lacking intricate decorations; three
small knobs disturb the copper, each equidistant from the other.
a copper ring.name: a copper ring

a black runed dagger.examine:
This is the strangest dagger you have ever seen. It is totally black and
has some very ancient runes engraved on its blade, like the legendary
Nmenrean weapons. It is very sharp!
a black runed dagger.name: a black runed dagger

a deep ebony scroll.examine:
This tightly rolled scroll is woven of rough fibers covering the spectrum
between black and white. Its outer side is densely inscribed with spidery
runes in deep ebony ink. A large glowing rune "N" is written on the top
of the scroll. A golden seal imprinted with a white hand secures it along the
middle.

id_details.name: a deep ebony scroll
special_abilities: It has level twenty spells of call lightning, shroud, and earthquake.

a deep ebony scroll.name: a deep ebony scroll

a silver-leaf brooch.examine:
This fine silver brooch, folded over at least a hundred times, is moulded in the
shape of an oak leaf. The intense detail and purity of the metal is reminiscent
of the work done by the long ago vanquished elven-smiths of Eregion.
a silver-leaf brooch.name: a silver-leaf brooch

a pale orb.examine:
This perfectly round orb is made of some milky white crystal. Its stormy
surface is never quiet and entirely non-reflective. Shapes of familiar objects
seem to fade into existence, and vanish just as quickly, but if one
concentrates for a while, a shape of white hand appears, rotating, in the midst
of the stormy eminence. Its forefinger is touching its thumb, as if beckoning
one to look through this makeshift gateway and beyond the material of which the
orb is made.
a pale orb.name: a pale orb

a small marcasite pendant.examine:
This silver pendant is shaped as a six-ray star with tiny marcasite insets.
The multi-faceted metallic stones glitter merrily in their silver cradles. The
back of the pendant is supported by a very fine line of silver-black wire
folded many times to form a symmetric pattern reminiscent of a snowflake. Its
top loop extends slightly to let through a fine-linked silver chain of some
length.
a small marcasite pendant.name: a small marcasite pendant

the Hammer of Belegost.examine:
This is truly an impressive and huge weapon. As you weigh it, you realize that
only the strongest could ever hope to wield it successfully. It seems to be
made of a solid and heavy metal and you can feel a strange vibration from it
when grasped. Strange runes carved on its main body make it look like some kind
of ancient artefact; runes that tell of its purpose and its power.
the Hammer of Belegost.name: the Hammer of Belegost

a sacrificial knife.name: a sacrificial knife

an old length of iron chain.examine:
This is a piece of iron chain, old but not rusted, about a foot and a half in
length. A hook is welded to one end so that it can be wrapped around something
and secured by putting the hook into one of the links. The metal is dark and
cold to the touch; the links are uniform and smooth.

id_details.name: an old length of iron chain

an old length of iron chain.name: an old length of iron chain
